Name: In The Time Of Hangover - Be Vaghte Khomari - به وقت خماری
Story Line: This film tells the story of a crowded family living in a huge house. The ownership of their home is bound to their grandmother's life. If she dies, they will all be evacuated. One day, a young suitor comes to ask for the hand of the only single girl in the house. Everyone celebrates the event, until they figure out that he is a police officer and...

Name: Rhino Horn - Shakhe Kargadan - شاخ کرگدن
Story Line: Sadra has been living outside of Iran for a long time and now he is trying to bring his sister [Baharan] to Ukraine to study and live with him. Baharan arrives at the airport where she is kidnapped by an unknown group. Sadra then has to fight for her freedom…

Name: Confiscation - Mosadereh - مصادره
Story Line: The film starts in the 1970s and is the story of a SAVAK's member (Reza Attaran) who involves in many different adventures and challenges...

Name: Motherland - Zadboom - زادبوم
Story Line: Professor Snider has presented a theory claiming that turtles will go back to their birthplace after 30 years and his theory is pursued by Amirali. Amirali meets Marleneh, the professor's grandchild and gets some documents and evidence regarding the theory which were gathered 30 years ago in Qeshm island. He sends the documents to his mother, Mrs. Sharifi, and after ensuring the results of the previous experiment, Mrs.Sharifi decides to send another generation of turtles to the sea; so she goes to Qeshm.

Name: Tarat - تارات
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )
Mehdi Amini Khah ( مهدی امينی خواه )

Name: Azar - آذر
Story Line: Azar needs to make a strange decision amidst the difficult and complex circumstance she is facing…

Name: Nazli - نازلی
Don't Be Shy - Khejalat Nakesh - خجالت نکش
Story Line: Sanam, the wife of an elderly man gets pregnant under the influence of media ads, but unlike her husband she considers this a disgrace. Therefore, she plans to hide her pregnancy and her child.
Producer: Seyed Amir Parvin Hosseini ( سید امیر پروین‌حسینی )

Name: Slaughterhouse - Maslakh - مسلخ
Story Line: It is the story of a young couple called Ava and Arash. Ava has some conditions before the marriage but Arash fails to fulfil them due to his job and a man enters their life.
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: Growing in the Wind - Rooyidan Dar Bad - روئیدن در باد
Story Line: A fourteen year- old teenager named Aslan has no choice but to take his final test while migrating with his tribe and enduring all its difficulties. He is forced to choose between studying and being a shepherd . He faces some difficulties along the way…

Name: Bearer - Dar Vajhe Hamel - در وجه حامل
Story Line: When Iraj is hospitalized for unknown reasons, his wife Mehri is on his bedside. Iraj has been beaten up and has lost the power of movement and speech. Mehri, confused about the situation, finally learns Iraj has loaned a great amount of dollar, and not yet paid it back! Now she has to find a way to pay back the loan, in the meantime, also has to find out how these dollars have been spent by her husband.

Name: Unwished - Nakhasteh - ناخواسته
Story Line: The lives of several people become intertwined in this mesmerizing drama. A road movie of sorts, the film focuses on a young driver and the fares he picks up. The spirited Nabat and her brother Sadeq are the first to join him, and while it is not clear what their incessant squabbling is about, it is soon apparent that they are on the run from someone. They are shortly joined by a woman of mysterious circumstances, who claims she wishes to be reunited with her husband. The group embark on a fable-like journey and learn more about one another in the process. This film boasts clever use of dialogue and naturalistic performances, while beautiful, dream-like imagery of the country’s topography serve to celebrate the gift of life itself.

Name: One Canary, One Crow - Yek Ghanari Yek Kalagh - یک قناری، یک کلاغ
Story Line: A man injures his wife’s eye with his negligence. His family and friends warn him that his wife is staying home to retaliate. There is a chronic silence between them, and they live in separate locked rooms in a huge house far from town. After a year in gloom, they have to come to a settlement.

Name: Kupal - کوپال
Story Line: KUPAL is the story of a hunter and a taxidermist, called Dr. Ahmad Kupal. On the last day of the year, moments before the turn of the year, he faces an unexpected challenge.

Name: No.17 Soheila - Shomareh 17 Soheila - شماره‌ ۱۷ سهیلا
Story Line: Soheila is a 40-year-old single girl, who is eagerly looking for a man to marry her…

Name: The little combatants - Mobarezane Koochak - مبارزان كوچك
Story Line: A group of professional and dangerous thieves steal an inscription from the national museum and want to bring it out of the country. The inscription falls into the hands of a few kids and teenagers in the north of the country and these kids make a pact to defend it till the cops come. This causes the kids to use their belongings as weapons and this creates funny situations.

Name: Damascus Time - Be Vaghte Sham - به وقت شام
Story Line: The city of Palmyra in eastern Syria has fallen to ISIS and they have surrounded the airport in a nearby city where many of the wounded people and also the last defenders of the airport await their emergency evacuation. A young pilot has to risk his life and reach the airport in order to help evacuate these people while they are under direct ISIS fire. A close confrontation with ISIS fighters determines their fate in a dramatic turn of events.

Name: Woman's Enemy - Doshmane Zan - دشمن زن
Story Line: The story of those who go from a misogynist to feminist after a while.

Name: Immortality - Javdanegi - جاودانگی
Story Line: All the events of this film happen on a rainy night in a train and show the life of six families in a different carriage of a train with the change of time.
Director: Mehdi Fard Ghaderi ( مهدی فرد قادری )
Writer: Mehdi Fard Ghaderi ( مهدی فرد قادری )

Name: Privacy - Harim-e Shakhsi - حریم شخصی
Story Line: Five friends get together to spend a night for a happy and intimate birthday celebration, but the dishonesty hidden in their past ruins the night, leading to an unexpected disaster.

Name: Lottery - Latari - لاتاری
Story Line: Amirali and Nushin are two youngsters at their twenties, who are going to marry each other. However, their families are against it. Nevertheless, the two youngsters are waiting for their families to consent to their marriage. These two have some common wishes; one is winning U.S.A green card lottery.

Name: Alone - Tanha - تنها
Gloomy Celebration - Jashne Deltangi - جشن دلتنگی
Story Line: The film narrates four stories of contemporary man's loneliness. Jahan is a 32-year-old man who aspires fame. Afsaneh and Reza are experiencing new problems in their middle age. Kaveh and Laleh are awaiting the birth of their first child and Sara is a young girl who decides to continue her life with a new identity.

Name: Beehive - Looneh Zanboor - لونه زنبور
Story Line: Saber and Morteza are two cousins who are skilled thieves. They receive a package that will lead them into another complicated story...

Name: Sun Station - Amin Khahim Goft - آمین خواهیم گفت
Story Line: When the bridge is being renovated, Hassan, who is in charge of the old cable car of the river, finds the opportunity to decide which people can cross the river. Each of them has a different story and a different reason to cross the river by the old cable car. Hassan's friend, Asghar, helps him drive the cable car and take the passengers across the river. The eye-catching central location is a burnt-out train wreck that’s home to Qader, a grumpy old railway employee who shares quarters with Hassan. When the friendship between Hassan and Asghar deepens, they both reach a new understanding of the realities of life and their surroundings... Centered on a trio of misfits whose lives intersect along a railroad line in a remote mountain location, the pic is a visually interesting, emotionally rewarding meditation on loneliness and the healing power of friendship.

Name: Zero to Podium - Sefr Ta Sakkoo - صفر تا سکو
Story Line: Zero to podium is documenting the lives of three Iranian sisters who are Wushu fighters from a small town of Semirom in Iran; Shahrbanu, Soheila and Elaheh Mansourian. They were born into poverty. From an early age their father made them work in the fields to get by financially. When their father leaves them they decided to seek out a better life for themselves. They exercise, join the Iranian national Wushu team, win back-to-back championships and they begin to see a brighter future.

Name: House of Paper - Khaneh Kaghazi - خانه کاغذی
Story Line: A famous journalist who was out of job for a few years after being arrested, is living with his only daughter in Iran . She is also a journalist. Death of a writer returns an old love from abroad, making him write again .This time about the economy and its mafia .His daughter also tries to write about politics. But both become victims...
Actor: Alireza Kamali Nejad ( عليرضا كمالی نژاد )

Name: Motherhood - Madari - مادری
Story Line: MOTHERING is a film about two sisters who live in Yazd, a city located in the deserts of Iran. One of the sisters has abandoned her love and the other has been abandoned by hers…

Name: Hailstone and Sunlight - Tagarg va Aftab - تگرگ و آفتاب
Story Line: Yahya, a young warrior, comes to the city unannounced for a few days to rest and is placed in a special situation and is uncertain whether to stay in the city or go back.

Name: Appendix - Appandis - آپاندیس
Story Line:
Due to severe abdominal pain, Zari and her husband, Reza, go to the hospital. However, Zari’s insurance ID has expired and they are forced to borrow her friend Leila Attarod’s ID. Eventually, she undergoes appendectomy using Leila’s ID and the staff at the hospital suspect about this matter. Due to this, they are forced to switch roles to convince hospital staff that the ID belongs to Zari. However, many unfortunate events take place in the
process…

Name: Ferrari - فراری
Story Line: Golnar is a passionate 18 year old girl who travels to Tehran to see and take pictures with a Red Ferrari car. However, she doesn’t know what’s waiting for her…

Name: Rabidity - Hari - هاری
Story Line: Friends since childhood, Shahrokh (Milad Keymaram) and Siavash (Alireza Kamalinejad) have become embroiled in petty crime during their formative years. The hot-headed Shahrokh has a penchant for gambling and has always relied on Siavash for support when his back is pressed up against a wall. While Shahrokh seems destined to continue his life of crime, the married Siavash is seeking to change his ways. One fateful day he chases after a thief and retrieves a bag that he snatched from a woman (Hengameh Ghaziani) on the street. However, when Siavash goes to return the bag to the woman, he finds that there is far more to her than meets the eye...
Actor: Alireza Kamali Nejad ( عليرضا كمالی نژاد )

Name: Yellow - Zard - زرد
Story Line: A group of close friends, who have patented a genius invention, are waiting to emigrate to Europe. Three days before their journey, one of them gets seriously ill and while he’s in a coma the others have to find the money for his organ transplant. The tense situation slowly reveals layers from each character’s past and present, and also creates new and difficult dynamics among them. A film endowed with powerful performances from its lead actors, Yellow keeps surprising until the end.
Actor: Shahram Haghighat Doost ( شهرام حقیقت دوست )

Name: Lovelance - Eshghoolance - عشقولانس
Story Line: Amir is a university student who guides his friends in their romances and manage their love problems. But things get complicated when he himself falls in love...
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: We Are So Cool - Ma Kheyli Bahalim - ما خیلی باحالیم
When I Came Back - Vaghti Bargashtam - وقتی برگشتم
Story Line: The story of a sweet home with two sisters Ghashang and Farang. It’s dreamy, with a hint of reality and a sea of love that holds the house into its  place.

Name: Tamed Killer - Ghatele Ahli - قاتل اهلی
Story Line: The  film  is  about  the  life  of  Dr.  Jalal Soroush.  The  financial  interest  of Pissarro Company is at risk with his activities. Influential people get involved to…

Name: Single Boys - Pesarhaye Torshideh - پسر‌های ترشیده
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: Wakeup Arezou - Bidar Sho Arezou - بیدار شو آرزو
Oblivion Season - Fasle Faramoushie Fariba - فصل فراموشی فریبا
Story Line: An ex-prostitute starts a new life by marrying her loved one but leaving the shadow of her dark past is not as easy as it seemed at first. Now she is the prisoner of her loved one and to earn her freedom she should fight back the patriarchal society.

Name: Sunlight, Moonlight, Earth - Aftab, Mahtab, Zamin -  آفتاب مهتاب زمین
Story Line: Sheikh comes to the village. Religious, calm and sophisticated, he is a stranger to every one! Among villagers, seven-year-old Narges is the only one who warmly welcomes him because Sheikh has saved her horse on the very first day of his arrival. Malek is in love with Nargesâ€™ mother. He sees newcomer Sheikh as his love rival and provokes villagers against him. But, villagers donâ€™t know that Sheikh is the owner of all farmlands they are working on.

Name: A Long Day - Yek Rooz Toolani - یک روز طولانی
Story Line: The film tells the story of a man named Shahin who travels to his birthplace after many years and gets caught in a moral dilemma in which the meaning of good and bad, moral and immoral is not clear.

Name: The Sea and the Flying Fish - Darya va Mahi Parandeh - دریا و ماهی پرنده
Story Line: Along with the entrance of new patients to the Youth Detention Centre, strange drawings begin to appear on its walls. One of the creators is Ehsan, a deaf-mute teenager who communicates through art. During his internment he learns that his sister is in danger. Now he has to find a way to break out of prison to save her. The Sea and the Flying Fish invites the viewers to see the youth and their problems in a fresh way, and takes them on a thought-provoking journey.

Name: Wing Mirror - Ayneh Baghal - آینه بغل
Story Line: To celebrate their engagement anniversary, Morteza and his fiance take a client's posh car without permission. After an unfortunate accident, the car's wing mirror gets broken and the couple who are not in a good financial state has to face the wealthy owner to solve the issue. This Popular comedy was a box office hit in cinemas.
Producer: Seyed Amir Parvin Hosseini ( سید امیر پروین‌حسینی )
Actor: Mohammad Reza Golzar ( محمد رضا گلزار‎ )

Name: Vakil Band - وکیل بند
Bridge Of Sleep - Pole Khab - پل خواب
Story Line: Like most of youth in civil society, Shahab also tries to form his future. On the threshold of marriage, his life faces an accident and it eventually leads to a huge change.

Name: A Special Day - Yek Rooz Be Khosoos - یک روز بخصوص
Story Line: Hamed (Mostafa Zamani) has to make a choice for his sister's (Parinaz Izadyar) heart surgery. A decision that will make him face other paths.

Name: The Good, The Bad, The Corny - Khoob, Bad, Jelf - خوب بد جلف
Story Line: 'The Good, The Bad, The Corny' is a comedy movie about a film director who hires two actors for a crime movie. However the two guys are so stupid that the filmmaker can't get anything out of them. Eventually, he finds a creative and more successful way of directing them by giving them roles that are very similar and close to their own personalities and characters.
Director: Peyman Ghassem Khani ( پیمان قاسم خانی )
Writer: Peyman Ghassem Khani ( پیمان قاسم خانی )

Name: The Temptation - Havas - هوس
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: Chanel - Shanel -  شَنل
Story Line: It will take a long time for you to believe that you would not see me again. You heard it, didn’t you, Sahra?
Actor: Mehdi Hosseininia ( سید مهدی حسینی بمی )

Name: Midday Adventures - Majaraye Nimrooz - ماجرای نیمروز
Story Line: In rageful streets of the city… In the labyrinths of the avenues and the alleys… In the attics of the houses… Dazzled and confused… Would be there an end to this hunt?

Name: Sperm Whale 2 - Nahange Anbar 2 - نهنگ عنبر ۲
Story Line: The film is the sequel to the first part, Nahange Anbar and follows the destiny of Arjang and Roya who are couple now.
Actor: Hesam Navab Safavi ( سید حسام نواب‌صفوی )

Name: Confession - Eteraf - اعتراف
Human Comedy - Komedi-e Ensani - کمدی انسانی
Story Line: Following four stages of a man's life, from childhood to old age, The Human Comedy tells a thrilling story of nostalgia and alienation. A comedy of the tragic life of someone who must live like the people around him despite his own preference.

Name: Oxidan - اکسیدان
Story Line: Aslan's fiance Negar is going abroad the country illegally and without informing him at all. Now he is looking for a way to get a visa and go gets her back.

Name: Fish Lake - Daryacheyeh Mahi - دریاچه ماهی
Story Line:
Reza, who drives the ambulance at the frontline in different operations, has a 
dream and ingenuously re-tells it to his division commander and fellow warriors 
at the night of the operation creating plenty of trouble for himself.

Name: Italy Italy - Italia Italia - ایتالیا ایتالیا
Story Line: Nader, a man obsessed with Italy, sings and dances his love to Barfa, from their encounter to their wedding. After a few years, their romance reaches a crisis point which they need to deal with. This delightful Iranian musical comedy is adorned with references to cinema, literature, music and, of course, Italian culture.

Name: Life is Elsewhere - Zendegi Jaye Digari Ast - زندگی جای دیگری است
Cousins - Dokhtar Amoo va Pesar Amoo - دخترعمو، پسرعمو
Story Line: The story is about two cousins who used to be a couple. Due to their grandad illness, they have to pretend that they are still happy together and are going to marry soon.

Name: Untaken Paths - Mali Va Rahhaye Naraftehash - ملی و راه‌های نرفته‌اش
Story Line: Mali, a young girl, meets Sia and starts a secret relationship with him. Soon Mali’s traditional family find out about their relationship. According to the cultural rules, the only way she can continue her relationship with Sia, is for them to get married. Despite disapproval of Mali’s family, it happens very quickly. Sia, incapable of managing his new life, starts practicing his father’s methods with using physical violence on Mali. Now Mali, with destructed self-confidence and personality and losing her family’s support, becomes more and more depressed as each day goes by...
Actor: Elsa Firouz Azar ( السا فیروز آذر )

Name: The Million Dollar Baby - Azize Million Dolari - عزیز میلیون دلاری
Story Line:
This film is about Ardeshir Meshkinsefat, the richest person in the world who is looking for his grandchild.
Within his journey of looking for the grandchild, he and his family face surprising problems...

Name: Under the Smoky Roof - Zire Saghfeh Doody - زیر سقف دودی
Story Line: To say the least, Shirin, her husband and son don’t get on like a house on fire. Actually, a crisis follows another as resentment and regret haunt this family under the smoky roof. But will they manage to reconnect and find some sort of happiness again? A thought-provoking family drama by Pouran Derakhshandeh that probes into the social values of Iranian society today.
Actor: Shahram Haghighat Doost ( شهرام حقیقت دوست )
Hesam Navab Safavi ( سید حسام نواب‌صفوی )

Name: Conditional Release - Azad Be Gheyde Shart - آزاد به قید شرط
Story Line:
Keyvan Kamali has been convicted to 20 years of imprisonment and after 
10 years of serving, he has been offered a conditional release. Now in an uncontrollable and unorganized society, Keyvan Kamali must face some big obstacles. He must prevent any conflicts, disputes and criminal acts.
Actor: Amir Reza Delavari ( امیر رضا دلاوری )

Name: The Record is Equal to the Document - Sabt Ba Sanad Barabar Ast - ثبت با سند برابر است
Isolation - Enzeva - انزوا
Story Line: On her way home, Zohreh feels that someone's stalking her. As she attempts to escape, she gets hit by a car and dies. Her husband, releases from jail on bail for the  first  time  in  six  years.  He is given three days to arrange her funeral, but he has other concerns...
Director: Morteza Ali Abbas Mirzaei (مرتضی علی عباس میرزایی)
Writer: Morteza Ali Abbas Mirzaei (مرتضی علی عباس میرزایی)

Name: MAHAK: A World She Founded - Bonyan-gozare Mahak - بنیان‌گذار محک
Story Line:
The life of Saideh Ghods changed completely when her two-year-old daughter Kiana was diagnosed with cancer. As she confronted her daughter’s suffering, she became aware of the suffering of so many impoverished families in hospital corridors around the country who were dealing with children afflicted by cancer. When, due to the doctors’ timely diagnosis, Kiana was on the path to a full recovery, Saideh Ghods resolved to prevent the unnecessary deaths of children with cancer caused by lack of access to therapeutic facilities or insufficient financial resources. 
Ghods founded MAHAK over 25 years ago. It quickly gained fame and support throughout Iran. Today it is one of the most highly functioning and trusted charities in the country. Countless children have been helped and saved. A few years after founding MAHAK, Ghods, along with a group of Iranian philanthropists, established a fully equipped hospital in Tehran that specializes in treating children with cancer.
Website: karafilm.ir

Name: Mother of the Earth - Madare Zamin - مادر زمین
Story Line:
This documentary takes a brief look at Hayedeh Shirzadi and her husband’s shared life, love and work and their attempt to put an end to the dumping and burial of urban garbage. Due to their hard work and ingenuity, 100% of the city of Kermanshah’s garbage is now recycled and the bio waste is made into organic fertilizers.
Shirzadi studied recycling in Germany. She returned to Iran in order to clean up the environment, to stop the destruction of arable land, and to curb air and water pollution. Her first attempts were ignored but she kept at the local government until she was successful in getting the job of waste manager, first in her birth place Gilane Gharb and then in Kermanshah. She also traveled around Iran and helped establish recycling center in many cities. Today Kermanshah’s waste is all recycled and converted into useful products.
She is an energetic leader and the fate of the earth is her main concern. Shirzadi has recently launched a site for recycling construction rubble.

Name: Friends at Work - TabarestaniHa - طبرستانی‌ها
Story Line:
In 1983, amidst the hardships of post-revolutionary and war-torn Iran, a group of engineering classmates established a steel foundry near the city of Sari, in the North of Iran. Their main goal was to gain income for themselves and at the same time eliminate the nation’s dependence on foreign steel. They dubbed themselves 'the Tabarestaners' after the name of the province where they first began their successful collaborations. Over the years they have worked together to overcome many obstacles which were mostly due to economic problems at the national level. They founded the Tabarestan Steel Foundry and have since established other factories around Iran. The Tabarestaners have maintained their circle of friends and relatives for years. Now that they have reached retirement age they are thinking about the future of their industries.
The film starts with Mr. Gholamreza Rasoolian, CEO of Tabarestan Steel Complex, traveling to visit his factory. During the course of the film, we get to know the other Tabarestaners one by one and their roles in the development of their projects and their individual achievements. Moreover, the film depicts the Tabarestaners’ cordial relationships. 
Website: karafilm.ir

Name: Poets of Life - Shaerane Zendegi - شاعران زندگی
Story Line:
Shirin Parsi is a rice farmer, but not an ordinary one. After receiving a BA in French literature from the University of Paris, she returned to Iran and decided not to live in the megapolis capital, Tehran. Her husband had inherited land in Shanderman, a village near the Caspian Sea, so they moved there and took up rice farming.
The Parsi family - including their two sons, who have stayed to farm with their parents - has instituted innovations in rice production. They promote sustainable farming and refrain from using chemical pesticides and fertilizers. In a region where more and more farmers are selling their farms at very cheap prices to developers, the Parsis produce 100% organic rice. 
Shirin and her family have chosen an exemplary lifestyle which is rich in indigenous values. In addition to rice farming, she spends time as a social activist and volunteers with several local NGOs. She is especially active in women’s groups where she focuses on raising awareness.
This film follows Shirin preparing the rice paddies until the rice harvest, as well as showing her social activities, as she attempts to bring about social and environmental change.
Website: karafilm.ir

Name: Puzzleys - PuzzleyHa - پازلی‌ها
Story Line:
‘Puzzleys’ is the name of a four-member group of IT students who, in spite of suitable job opportunities and the opposition expressed by their families, want to start up their own business. Other than their education and determination, all they have is an idea. They need backing, experience and business knowledge, so they leave their small town to go to the capital city of Tehran to realize their dreams. They take time off from university and cram into the baggage compartment of a bus for a 15-hour trip to Tehran where the real challenges begin.
Website: karafilm.ir

Name: Flax to Fire - Panbeh ta Atash - پنبه تا آتش
Story Line:
The documentary Flax to Fire depicts the life and work of Aliasghar  Hajibaba, an elite Iranian industrialist and entrepreneur. Originally trained as a quiltmaker in his youth, he manages to start an independent business in the midst of a tumultuous life. With the help of his family, he successfully pursues his endeavors to the point that he eventually becomes known as a founder of Iran’s iron alloys and foundry industry. This film bears witness to Hajibaba’s incessant work ethic throughout his long life. He and his associates also discuss the political struggles, economic problems and social barriers of their times.
Website: karafilm.ir

Name: Sara & Aida - Sara Va Aida - سارا و آیدا
Story Line: Sara and Aida are close friends. The reputation of one of them is in danger. With each other’s help they need to figure  out  how  they  will  resolve  this issue. How strong is their friendship though?

Name: Khaltour - خالتور
Story Line: Three young idealistic musicians are in the single-minded pursuit of making good music and avoiding the popular music market. However, a lack of luck and being ignored by the audience takes its toll on them and they are forced to lower their standards to please the crowds. A very colorful comedy embellished with tunes.

Name: Asphyxia - Khafegi - خفه گی
Story Line: A mental hospital nurse meets a rich patient whose family intends to kill her and take over her wealth.Confused about whether to take her patient’s side who fakes being insane or her family’s side, the nurse comes to a strange decision.

Name: Season of Narges - Fasl-e Narges - فصل نرگس
Story Line: Season of Narges takes the viewer into the lives of three women through three connected stories. A star-studded cast accompanies the sensitive style of film-making from the director of Facing Mirrors.

Name: Don't Step into My Shoes - Pa To Kafshe Man Nakon - پا تو کفش من نکن
Story Line: The movie tells the story of a couple who attend the registry office to get married where an unexpected turn of events causes a tangle in their relationship.

Name: Four Isfahanis in Baghdad - Chahar Esfahani dar Baghdad - چهار اصفهانی در بغداد
Story Line: 'Four Isfahanis in Baghdad' tells the story of a family who gets involved in some local issues. The film also focus on the ups and downs in love relationships.

Name: Mohey - ماحی
Story Line: Based on a true story, director Davood Khayyam uses events that resulted from the PIP implant scandal as inspiration for his cautionary tale. Plucked from an orphanage as a young girl, Mohey is not living the life she hoped for. Separated from her twin sister and abused by her benefactor, she has become ensnared in a life of underhand dealings and illegal trading, where her intellect and beauty are used as commodities. When Mohey is coerced into a temporary marriage to secure a deal, she reluctantly agrees, determined that her cut will finally buy her freedom. However, the underworld is not ready to let her go.

Name: 21 Days Later - 21 Rooz Bad - ۲۱ روز بعد
Story Line: Morteza, a teenager passionate about film, is trying to achieve his dreams. Life, as always, makes things very complicated. He has to face the challenges bravely. The first feature from director Mohammad Reza Kheradmandan, 21 Days Later is a different and powerful piece of story-telling.

Name: 91913 - ۹۱۹۱۳
Story Line: '91913' takes the viewer into the inner world of a prisoner who has been captured for 400 years. As the voices of his consciousness becomes louder and louder, new layers of poetry are born. With an amazing array of actors who perform voice-overs including Kambiz Dirbar, Houtan Shakiba, Roya Teymourian, Siamak Safari, Ahmad Mehranfar and Baran Kosari, '91913' is the first Iranian play that uses 5.1 surround sound system.

Name: Simple Worker Needed - Kargar Sadeh Niyazmandim - کارگر ساده نیازمندیم
Story Line: Qadam works in Rahmat`s store as a simple worker. He falls in love with Mounes, Rahim`s daughter and he wants to marry her but after Rahim`s death, Jahan, a friend of Rahim ask Mounes to marry him. This makes Qadam angry.

Name: Charmer - Afsoongar - افسونگر
Story Line: Shayan (Pejman Bazeghi) is a successful lawyer, who falls in love with a woman and attempts to perform illegal actions on a case. Although he owes his success to his wife Diba (Leyla Otadi), he finds in himself in a similar case and on the verge of losing everything when Rosa (Shaghayegh Farahani), his wife from his temporary marriage, enters his personal life.

Name: Awakening of the Women’s House - Bidariye Khaneye Nesvan - بیداری خانه نسوان
Story Line: Awakening of the Women's House is a play that highlights gender issues, chiefly the condition of women in Iran.

Name: This Woman Wants What's Hers - In Zan Haghash Ra Mikhahad - این زن حقش را می خواهد
Story Line: The story of a woman who is after revenge for something that was forced on her in the past.
Actor: Mina Jafar Zadeh ( مینا جعفر زاده )

Name: The Patrol 2 - Gashte 2 - گشت ۲
Story Line: The story happens five years after the events of first part after Hassan and Abbas's releasing from the jail. Ata came back to life from coma and the old group reunited again. They are looking for a job but when they can't find any, they decide to do what they did before and the events of The Patrol 2 starts from here.

Name: Dracula - Derakula - دراکولا
Story Line: 'Dracula', as the title suggests, is a horror movie that blends comedy and vampire stories. The film charts the adventures of an Iranian vampire played by director and actor Reza Attaran.

Name: The White Heart Of Dandelions - Ghalbe Sefide GhasedakHa - قلب سفید قاصدک‌ها
The Tricky Long Tail - Hoghe Baze Dom Deraz - حقه باز دم دراز
Its Time to Grow Up - Vaghte Bozorg Shodane - وقت بزرگ شدنه
Love in the Time of Cholera - Eshghe Salhaye Vaba - عشق سال های وبا
The Horn of Israfil - Soore Esrafil - صور اسرافیل
Actor: Mehdi Hosseininia ( سید مهدی حسینی بمی )

Name: Coquetry - Delbari - دلبری
Story Line: This film charts the story of Tooba, her love and dedication to her war-disabled and paralyzed husband. He has even lost his speech ability. At the wedding night of his nephew, when the children leave to attend the ceremony, he feels worse and passes away within a few hours...
Director: Jalal Dehghani Ashkezari ( سید جلال دهقانی اشکذری )
Actor: Mohammad Reza Shirkhanlou ( محمد رضا شیرخانلو )
Writer: Jalal Dehghani Ashkezari ( سید جلال دهقانی اشکذری )

Name: The Cherry Garden - Baghe Albaloo - باغ آلبالو
Actor: Karim Akbari Mobarakeh ( کریم اکبری مبارکه‎ )

Name: Old Wound - Nasour - ناسور
The Sofa - Kanapeh - کاناپه
From Basement to the Roof - Az Zirzamin Ta Poshte Baam - از زیرزمین تا پشت بام
Tenant - Mostajer - مستاجر
The Final Exam - Emtehane Nahaei - امتحان نهایی
Story Line: A mathematics teacher meets with his student`s mother.

Name: Profiles - Nimrokh Ha - نیمرخ‌ ها
Story Line:
A young man suffering from cancer is spending his last days of life. In this difficult circumstance, a rivalry occurs between his mother and his wife. 
Unfortunately the director passed away because of cancer just a couple of months after finishing the film.

Name: 3 Fish - Se Mahi - سه ماهی
Actor: Alireza Kamali Nejad ( عليرضا كمالی نژاد )

Name: Arvand - اروند
Story Line: Thirty years after the Iran-Iraq war, there are still some residues from the past that keep crawling back in the lives of those who were involved. Based on true events, ARVAND is a heart-breaking story depicting the search of 175 Iranian captives who went missing during a crucial operation.

Name: Summer Rain - Barane Tabestani - باران تابستانی
Crystal Rain - Boloure Baran - بلور باران
Wife Dot Com - Hamsar Dot Com - همسر دات کام
Stolen - Roboodeh Shodeh - ربوده شده
Story Line: A famous actor and his fiancée are in the process  of  immigrating  to  another country. However, after his backpack is stolen, they postpone their trip. Together they try their best to resolve the different obstacles facing them.

Name: Wander Around Me - Parse Dar Havaliye Man - پرسه در حوالی من
Hanging Steps - GamHaye Moallagh - گام‌های معلق
Pomegranate Stew - Nardoon -  ناردون
Story Line: Nardoon is the story of a young couple that want to get married, however the price to hold such a ceremony is a lot more than what the couple can afford. People in the village decide on ways to tackle this big event and come up with many ideas including sharing the costs with a funeral!

Name: Sometimes - Gahi - گاهی
Story Line: Three couples who have been friends for a long time have been invited to a banquet arranged by one of them to surprise the others. The surprise turns into a tragedy and…

Name: Cyanide - Sianor - سیانور
Story Line:
'Potassium Cyanide' is a social-political drama whose plot hinges on an Iranian couple in the 50s. 

The end to a long silence… Amir and Homa meet once again after a while.  They  have  to  choose  between cyanide  and  life...

Name: Atoosa's Laughters - Khandehaye Atoosa - خنده‌های آتوسا
Story Line: The story takes place on a train from Iran to Istanbul. Majan, a girl with a bag full of money and embezzlement documents, Moosa, a man searching for his lost sister, Atoosa, a beautiful fame fatal, Dr.Taheri, the trains physician and finally a tourist couple are all the passengers of this train. The bag is lost ...

Name: Unknown - Nashenas - ناشناس
Story Line: The story of a man named Mostofi who lost his memory because of some reasons and he tries to find someone whome he can trust so he can rely on him/her in his life.

Name: 5 PM - Saate Panje Asr - ساعت پنج عصر
Story Line: Mehrdad Parham is an attorney that has to make a bank payment before 5 pm in the afternoon to save his home.

Name: Forbidden - Gheyre Mojaz- غير مجاز
Story Line: It is the story of a young girl who comes to Tehran to find her fiancé and faces some harshness that she was not expecting.

Name: Hey, Humans - Ay Adamha - آی آدم ها
Story Line:
Through the charity organization, "Chain of Hope", a team of volunteer Iranian and French medical doctors treat underprivileged child patients from all over Iran in three branches of cardiac, orthopedics and rehabilitation to the highest standards.
Website: karafilm.ir

Name: Never - Hihat - هیهات
Story Line: This episodic film is comprised of four stories, each sharing the central theme of Imam Hussein. A son must do whatever it takes to honor his mother’s dying wish of pilgrimage to Karbala, a war veteran cancels his pilgrimage plans to save his community, a wife searches for her husband who has been defending the holy shrine from terrorists, and a poor paternal orphan learns that the Imam is the only person worthy of pleading to.

Name: Life and Nothing Else - Zendegi va Digar Hich - زندگی و دیگر هیچ
Barcode - بارکد
Story Line: Hamed decides to impress his potential new boss with the story of his life. A tale begins to unfold starring his boy racer friend, clever girlfriend and a strange, beautiful drug-addict. Hamed is dragged into a world of gangs, drugs and guns in this fast-paced and hilarious tale of revenge.

Name: There Will Be Blood On Wednesday - Chaharshanbe Khoon Be Pa Mishavad - چهارشنبه خون به پا ميشود
Story Line: When Arash finds out that his brother will be executed soon, he decides to prepare a hold-up with the help of his sister and friends. One day, the group of friends take staff and customers hostage in an bureau de change. Arash and his friends will only free the people taken hostage, if his brother gets released from jail.

Name: Born in 87 - Motavaled 65 - متولد ۶۵
Story Line: Directed by Majid Tavakkoli, this romantic drama tells the story of dreams and ambitions for a generation of young Iranians who often find those things difficult to come by. In this unique take on a familiar theme, a young couple assume the role of a much wealthier couple in order to spend their days with Tehran’s nouveau riche. The adventure begins with playful games that take the audience on a comic ride but it ends in horror when the young couple find themselves locked up in an apartment, facing a case of mistaken identities. At once twisted, unpredictable, funny and thrilling, Tavakkoli’s film is a masterful, beautifully acted, cleverly composed exercise in building suspense.

Name: Lantouri - لانتوری
Story Line: Lantouri is the name of a gang of thieves and blackmailers in Tehran. Pasha, a member of the gang, falls in love with Maryam, a social activist/journalist who has started a campaign, 'No to Violence' and she tries to convince the families of the crime victims, to forgive the murderers of their loved ones. Maryam rejects Pasha's love, feeling humiliated Pasha decides to take revenge upon Maryam and does irreparable harm to her. Maryam will now have to choose to forgive or seek 'Qesas' (revenge) and request 'eye for eye' punishment according to the Islamic Punitive Laws.

Name: I - Man - من
Story Line:
Forgery, smuggling and oboe lessons make up a few activities Azar is involved with. As she switches between legality and illegality, the risks accompanying her dual life begin to become more apparent, putting into question its continued sustainability. However, it is clear from the onset that if anyone could walk between these polarised worlds, few could achieve it in such a confident and instinctive way.

Synopsis by IMVBox

Name: Inadaptable - Adat Nemikonim - عادت نمی کنیم
Story Line: The volatile Mahtab (Sareh Bayat) suspects her husband Ahmad (Mohammad Reza Foroutan) is having an affair with his student Farnoosh. After being tipped off by close family friend Sima (Hediyeh Tehrani) she angrily confronts her at the University where he works. However, when Farnoosh dies truths are exposed and events become increasingly complex as Sima and her husband Mansoor are inexorably immersed in the tragic situation. Themes of deception and its consequences underline this bellicose drama, with fine performances and an unnerving score that contribute to a relentlessly tense atmosphere.

Name: In the Specified Time - Dar Modate Maloom - در مدت معلوم
Story Line: Meysam, a young aspiring writer, is working on a book about the problems faced by young people in contemporary Iranian society. Near the top of the list is the issue sexual desire and frustration: how to wait until marriage? The controversial legal loophole of temporary marriage comes up as a solution, but in his often comical journey of research, Meysam explores whether it is really ideal. A rare attempt at shining at comical light on some often ignored aspects of modern Iran.

Name: I Am Just a Poet, Officer - Man Faghat Shaeram, Jenab Sarvan - من فقط شاعرم جناب سروان
Story Line: An intimist documentary on Iranian songwriter and poet Yaghma Golrouee. Alternating performance footage, poetic digressions and interviews with the poet, the film explores Iranian music and songwriting through the years, chiefly socio-political songs before and after the revolution. In 'I Am Just a Poet, Officer', Golrouee highlights the importance of poetry in politically engaged music, largelly stemming from the work of seminal Persian poets such as Abu Abdollah Jafar ibn Mohammad Rudaki. Golrouee also discusses and criticizes the content and imagery of Iranian pop music.

Name: Binam Alley - Koocheye Binam - کوچه بی نام
Story Line: Two families live in the same impoverished neighbourhood but their differing outlooks on life brings them many difficulties. Mehdi lives with his devoutly religious wife and three daughters. In the same building, lives Farzaneh who has lost her husband. She lives with her son and a baby girl. The narrative unpacks the lives of these two families, highlighting the generation gap in Iran and the struggle between tradition and modernity.

Name: Hello Mumbai - Salaam Mumbai - سلام بمبئی
Story Line: Ali is an Iranian exchange student from Iran who is studying medicine as a cardio resident in Mumbai. By chance, he saves the life of one of his classmates Karishma, who has attempted suicide. Little by little he tries to talk to Karishma and give her hope and happiness, which eventually leads to the two of them falling in love.
Actor: Mohammad Reza Golzar ( محمد رضا گلزار‎ )

Name: Where Are My Shoes? - Kafshhayam Koo? - کفش‌هایم کو؟
Story Line: Kiumars Pourahmad's latest drama 'Where Are My Shoes?' is a movie adaptation of the American author Lisa Genova's debut novel 'Still Alice'. The film charts Habib Kaveh (Reza Kianian), an elderly man and factory owner who suffers from Alzheimer's disease. Years after Habib has been abandoned by his family, his life is turned upside down and her daughter decides to come back to Iran to reconnect with him. Will his disease bring their relationship back on track? Reza Kianian delivers a powerful and endearing performance in this poignant and relatable story where family relationships are put to test.

Name: Cho's Manifesto - Manifeste Cho - مانیفست چو
Story Line: The play is loosely inspired by Seung-Hui Cho who shot and killed 32 people on Virginia Tech's campus in 2007. The shooting rampage came to be known as the Virginia Tech shooting. In a nod to the events that inspired 'Cho's Manifesto', Mohammad Rahmanian reveals a daring and off-the-chain play. The play, which is in English, boasts an impressive cast including the multi-award winning actress Taraneh Alidoosti, the critically acclaimed thespian Mahtab Nasirpour and the multi-talented actor Afshin Hashemi.

Name: Lollipop - Abnabat Choobi - آبنبات چوبی
Story Line: Lollipop revolves around the disappearance of Maral. Initially it is assumed that she had run off to Turkey, with an unknown boyfriend, but as more time passes, her mother, sister, brother and brother-in-law, Morteza and Farhad, naturally become increasingly concerned. Eventually Morteza and Farhad begin to scour Tehran in search of Maral. As their search continues in failing to produce any concrete leads, her mother becomes steadily convinced the worst has happened as the discoveries they make become progressively more disturbing.

Name: A Romantic Robbery - Yek Dozdi Asheghaneh - یک دزدی عاشقانه
Story Line:
Kamal and Jamal grew up together, thieved together and got caught together. After several years of following this pattern they’re released from prison and meet their accomplice Essi. To their surprise, Essi has invested their share from the last robbery on a film which she has starred in. Unfortunately the film was a complete failure, but the two are offered the parts of extras in the various scenes, giving the three of them a flawless cover to plan a huge heist.

Synopsis by imvbox

Name: Spare Tire - Zapas - زاپاس
Story Line: Borzo Niknejad’s second feature film ‘Zapas’ starring Amir Jafari and Javad Ezzati, is, award-winning comedy. It follows an amateur football team’s unexpected promotion to the professional league. Unfortunately team’s top player picks up an untimely injury, definitively ruling him out for the season. As a result their coach along with the people of the team’s small town, scramble to prepare for championship glory.
Producer: Seyed Amir Parvin Hosseini ( سید امیر پروین‌حسینی )

Name: Word Silent Word - Kalameh Sokoot Kalameh - کلمه سکوت کلمه
Drought & Lies - Khoshksali va Doroogh - خشکسالی و دروغ
Story Line: Omid happily celebrates his birthday with his wife and her family at a beautiful villa near the Caspian Sea. A phone call from Omid's ex-wife puts the festivities on hold as she drops a bombshell that threatens to unravel the new life he is trying to lead. Written by Iranian playwright Mohammad Yaghoubi, this insightful drama tackles marital and social issues with sharp dialogue and knowing humor.
Actor: Mohammad Reza Golzar ( محمد رضا گلزار‎ )
Mehdi Hosseininia ( سید مهدی حسینی بمی )

Name: God of Carnage - Khodaye Koshtar - خدای کشتار
Story Line: 'God of Carnage' is a play by Yasmina Reza. It is about two sets of parents, one of whose child has hurt the other at a public park, who meet to discuss the matter in a civilized manner. However, as the evening goes on, the parents become increasingly childish, resulting in the evening devolving into chaos. The play was a success in its original language, French, and has been equally acclaimed in English-translated productions in both London and New York.
Director: Alireza Kooshk Jalali ( علیرضا کوشک جلالی )

Name: Parting - Raftan - رفتن
Story Line: Two young Afghans, Fereshteh and Nabi, are in love, but Fereshteh has to follow her parents and leave Afghanistan to find refuge in Iran. Nabi decides to illegally cross the border, find Fereshteh and take her through Turkey towards Europe and a better life.

Name: Reihaneh was Lost in the Outbound Flights - Dar Parvazhaye Khorooji Bood Ke Gom Shod Reyhane - در پروازهای خروجی بود که گم شد، ریحانه
Story Line: The play is about two girls named Reihaneh. One is on her way from London to Iran and the other from Tehran to London. They're both situated under similar circumstances and we get to know their concerns and the reasons for their migration.

Name: Metastasis - Metastaz - متاستاز
Story Line: Metastasis tells the story of characters who are the families of cancer patients. The play, whose actresses have been through this experience in real life, tries to highlight the hardship they all had to endure when they found out their close relatives were suffering from the disease. A powerful play that lingers in one's mind.

Name: Broke - As o Pas - آس و پاس
Story Line: Madcap fantasy comedy following a young man's adventures following the death of his father. Hilarity ensues when the man and his friend find a genie in a bottle. Charming comedy blurring the lines between fantasy and reality.
Actor: Hesam Navab Safavi ( سید حسام نواب‌صفوی )

Name: I Am Not Salvador - Man Salvador Nistam - من سالوادور نیستم
Story Line: Naser is on a holiday in Brazil with his family. He does not suspect yet but the family vacation that started out so peacefully is about to take a huge twist. First, he is taken by mistake as the former boyfriend of Angela, a local girl from a rich family. She gets him involved in a deal in order to earn her grandmother's inheritance who is also visiting Brazil. This creates an unstoppable flow of events making things only more complicated. Next to the beautiful setting, this light-hearted comedy offers a great time for the whole family.
Producer: Seyed Amir Parvin Hosseini ( سید امیر پروین‌حسینی )

Name: Mansour Nariman, the Father of Iranian Oud - Mansour Nariman, Pedare Oud Iran - منصور نریمان، پدر عود ایران
Story Line: Director Shahram Mirseraji pays tribute to researcher, writer and Oud player Mansour Namiran (1935 - 2015), the Father of Iranian Oud. The feature length documentary uncovers Namiran's life and passion for the pear-shaped stringed instrument. Eskandar Ebrahimi Zanjani known as Mansour Nariman was born in Mashhad in a family who loved music. Nariman's father played the Tar, Ney and Setar. In 1962 he began to instruct in Tehran conservatory and trained many musicians of later generations of Persian music. The father of Modern Oud has also written several books on the Oud as well. Mirseraji's 2016 documentary film features big-name artists of the Iranian music scene like Ney player Hassan Nahid and Oud players Mohammad Firouzi, Hossein Behroozinia, Ali Pajooheshgar, Negar Bouban, and Majid Nazempour.

Name: Bodyguard - بادیگارد
Story Line: Whilst on a security assignment for an influential politician, the head of security detail encounters a threat from a suicide bomber. The threat is ultimately dealt with, but forces him to examine both the personal and professional ramifications of the event. From acclaimed director Ebrahim Hatamikia, Bodyguard delivers an intriguing and exhilarating narrative. Also recieved Best Actor (Parviz Parastui) and Best Visual Effects awards at the 34th Fajr International Film Festival.

Name: Two - Do - دو
Story Line: A woman comes to work as a housekeeper and enters a man’s life who has returned from abroad in order to sell his father’s house. Their story is told alongside each other and their issues are shown on the screens.

Name: Golden Grave - Goure Talaee - گور طلایی
Story Line: Young slacker Ramin’s father has just passed away. Responsibility falls on Ramin to carry out his late father’s burial requests, as mentioned in the will. However, when Ramin arrives at the cemetery, he is astonished to discover that the grave is worth an extraordinary sum of money. Will Ramin succumb to temptation at the price of his father’s honor? With a catchy soundtrack, well-crafted title sequences and quirky performances, this black comedy provides a refreshing take on dealing with loss.

Name: Bedridden - Esterahate Motlagh - استراحت مطلق
Story Line: 'Bedridden' recounts the story of a woman who leaves her hometown with her child after getting a divorce, But her ex-husband leaves no stone unturned, to block her private and new career.

Name: Sperm Whale - Nahange Anbar - نهنگ عنبر
Story Line: Arjang (Reza Attaran), who was born before the revolution in Iran, has been in love with his childhood sweetheart, Roya (Mahnaz Afshar), for the past 40 years. Roya, however, has brought him nothing but trouble. Now 50, and having experienced a revolution, a war, a divorce and both poverty and wealth, Arjang finds himself still in love with Roya.

Name: Mr. Abdi's Direct Negociations - Mozakerate Mostaghime Aghaye Abdi - مذاکرات مستقیم آقای عبدی
The Little Heroes - Ghahremanane Koochak - قهرمانان کوچک
Different People - Adamhaye Motefavet - آدم‌های متفاوت
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: Night Shift - Shifte Shab -  شیفت شب
Story Line: Nahid follows her husband on the street of Tehran to discover his secret...

Name: My Uncle Hitler - Amoo Jan Hitler - عمو جان هیتلر
Real Estate Agents - Amlakiha - املاکی‌ها
Actor: Mohsen Ghazi Moradi ( محسن قاضی مرادی )

Name: Two Buddies - Do Doust - دو دوست
Parla Medea - Harf Bezan Medea - حرف بزن مده‌آ
Story Line: This show depicts a different view of "Medea", because with the features of postmodernism and a psychological look at "Medea", the position of woman in today's society is on the stage.

Name: Very, Very Confidential - Kheili, Kheili Mahramaneh - خیلی، خیلی محرمانه
Deliberately, Romantically, Murdererly - Amedaneh, Asheghaneh, Ghatelaneh - عامدانه، عاشقانه، قاتلانه
Story Line: The play follows three women accused of murder.

Name: Autumn - Paeiz - پائیز
Veronica's Room - Otaghe Veronica - اتاق ورونیکا
The Fatemakers - Taghdirbazan - تقدیر بازان
The Death and the Maiden - Marg O Dokhtare Javan - مرگ و دختر جوان
Crime and Punishment - Jenayat O Mokafat - جنایات و مکافات
List - Fehrest - فهرست
The Blue Line - Khate Abi - خط آبی
Block 9, Exit 2 - Block 9, Khorouji 2 - بلوک ۹، خروجی ۲
Story Line: Sahar, whose parents are divorced, faces mental problems following the death of her grandmother and her parents, must take her to a short journey. During this journey, the reason behind their divorce reveals. Sahara has to choose one of them now to live with.

Name: The Girl's House - Khaneh Dokhtar - خانه دختر
Story Line: Tomorrow is Samira's wedding ceremony and Bahar and Parisa are shopping excitedly. But at night somebody calls and tells them that the bride is dead and the wedding has been called off. They are both shocked and they cannot believe what they have heard, so they go straight to their friend's fiancé, Mansoor, to find out about the cause of her suspicious death.

Name: Love Story - Hekayate Asheghi - حکایت عاشقی
Story Line: During the war between Iraq and Iran, Saddam Hussein's forces attacked Halabja, a city in Iraqi Kurdistan, with bombs, artillery fire and chemical weapons, in particular nerve gas. Some 5000 people are estimated to have died in the attack. An Iranian war photographer is the first man to enter the city following the massacre. There he meets a woman and a tale of love begins…
Producer: Masoud Jafari Jozani ( مسعود جعفری جوزانی )

Name: Twenty Weeks - Bist Hafteh - بیست هفته
Snake Oil - Roghane Mar - روغن مار
Beginning of the End - Shorooe Yek Payan - شروع یک پایان
The Ride - Darbast - دربست
Director: Ali Khameh Parast Fard (علی خامه پرست فرد)
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )
Writer: Ali Khameh Parast Fard (علی خامه پرست فرد)
Costume Designer: Ali Khameh Parast Fard (علی خامه پرست فرد)
Set Designer: Ali Khameh Parast Fard (علی خامه پرست فرد)

Name: End of the Service - Payan Khedmat - پایان خدمت
Story Line: Pouria is in final days of his military service. While taking an accused to the prison, he encounters a problem and acts against the orders of his superior officer with whom he has a friendly and paternal relationship.

Name: Iran Burger - Iran Berger - ایران برگر
Story Line: This film is about a fictional village in Iran and two candidates that are competing for people's votes in a local election.
Director: Masoud Jafari Jozani ( مسعود جعفری جوزانی )
Writer: Masoud Jafari Jozani ( مسعود جعفری جوزانی )

Name: 40 and Single - Mojarade 40 Sale -  مجرد ۴۰ ساله
Mina's Posssibility - Emkane Mina - امکان مینا
Story Line: Doubt, suspicion and betrayal lead the romantic  life  of  Mehran  and  Mina  to  a new path.

Name: Prince's White Horse - Asbe Sefide Padeshah - اسب سفيد پادشاه
Story Line: The story of "King's White Horse" is about a young girl named Marie who is released from prison after several months. When she is released, it doesn't take her a long time to discover that her lover is on the verge of marrying another girl.

Name: Parallel Shadows - Sayehaye Movazi - سايه‌های موازی
Story Line: Nazanin, who needs money, lends her necklace to the middle aged antique shop owner and receives money for it. After a few days, the antique shop owner falls in love with Nazanin and this is a beginning of unusual love.

Name: My Brother, Khosrow - Baradaram Khosro - برادرم خسرو
Story Line: The film is about two brothers who have to spend some time together. One of the brothers suffers bipolar disorder and stays at his brother’s house for a while. The story is around the annotations and events happening for this family, which are caused by that stay.

Name: Love and Betrayal - Eshgh va Khiyanat - عشق و خیانت
A World Full of Hope - Donyaye Por Omid - دنیای پر امید
Story Line: A World Full of Hope is based on the drama of a household where the mother is the breadwinner since the father of the family is incapable for reasons to be told…

Name: Two Brides - Do Aroos - دو عروس
Story Line: Ardalan is an ordinary man with an ordinary job and ordinary salary but his wife, Pooneh couldn`t  stand it and wants more and more from him. This greediness of Pooneh makes their life face to some problems.

Name: All My Trees - Hamehye Derakhtane Man - همه درختان من
Story Line:
Mahlagha Mallah is Iran’s eldest environmental activist and the founder of the first environmental NGO in Iran. Spending a few days in her home and accompanying her in environmental gatherings and activities is an excuse to portray the critical state of the environment in Iran.
Website: karafilm.ir

Name: A Lifetime in an Hour - Yek Saat az Yek Omr - یک ساعت از یک عمر
Story Line:
Eskandar Firouz, the founder of the Department of Environment is known as "Iran's father of the environment".  This documentation of a few-hours-long conversation of him and three environmental activists presents an oral history of issues of environment in Iran and a brief look at a lifetime of experience and the patriotic concerns of Eskandar Firouz.
Website: karafilm.ir

Name: It's No Big Deal - Khabare Khasi Nist - خبر خاصی نیست
Story Line: Two sisters spend their peaceful life with their educated daughters marriageable age. But organizing a family gathering and the presence of a young stranger as an uninvited guest, greatly challenge the life of the two families.

Name: Mazare Sharif - مزار شریف
Story Line: This is the story of Taliban's attack to Iranian Consulate in Mazar-e Sharif (1998) that resulted in the martyrdom of some Iranian diplomats.

Name: Confessions Of My Dangerous Mind - Eterafate Zehne Khatarnake Man - اعترافات ذهن خطرناک من
Story Line: A man wakes in a wheat field with no memory. Is he dead? Is this purgatory? As he struggles to discover who he is, he is faced with startling revelations about himself and those around him. After being informed that he has a daughter, who has been taken hostage due to his part in a dangerous drug deal gone wrong. Will he be able to find the drugs, save the girl and figure out whom to trust?

Name: Crazy Castle - Rokhe Divaneh - رخ دیوانه
Story Line: A group of young online community members roam the city of Tehran, looking for a good time. What starts as a prank unfolds into a complicated situation as they become entangled in blackmail. In their attempts to escape their predicament, the remnants of their troubled past surface again. Examining the true meaning of friendship and the way we portray ourselves on social media, Crazy Castle is a riveting and sometimes harrowing journey which will have you on the edge of your seat throughout.

Name: It Happened at Midnight - Nimeh Shab Etefagh Oftad - نیمه شب اتفاق افتاد
Story Line: When the resident singer at a venue that hosts weddings and funerals abruptly quits his job, a young, charming new singer (Hamed Behdad) is hired. Unexpectedly, a romantic relationship begins to develop between him and older, widowed woman who also works at the venue, though neither is immediately aware of the other’s emotions. The romance that ensues creates as much chaos as it does tenderness. This is a star-studded and incredibly entertaining ride.

Name: Avalanche - Bahman - بهمن
Story Line: Homa, an accomplished nurse working in a private hospital, has a recurrent dream that brings her a feeling of peace. When an unprecedented snowstorm strikes the area, she is forced to work a 10-day shift, and she finds herself having to care for the unpleasant elderly mother of the hospital's owner. Soon, both women feel increasingly hemmed in by the stagnant hospital, and as insomnia begins to take hold of Homa, she starts to spiral deep into depression. Striking snowscapes lend a haunting melancholy to this thought-provoking interaction between two women.

Name: I Am Diego Maradona - Man Diego Maradona Hastam - من دیه گو مارادونا هستم
Story Line: In this energetic black comedy, a stone thrown through a window becomes the catalyst for a family feud between two sisters and their families. Azar's son, Babak, is to marry Mahshid, Azadeh's daughter. However, things don't quite go to plan, and what begins as tension between the two factions becomes an all-out war. When kidnapping and attempted murder are added to the mix, it is unclear if the family will ever see eye to eye. Narrated by Azar's writer son, Fahrad, the film’s eclectic cast and episodic nature is reminiscent of the work of Wes Anderson.

Name: Resident of Middle Floor - Sakene Tabaghe Vasat - ساکن طبقه وسط
Story Line: 'Resident of Middle Floor' tells the quirky tale of a depressive writer (Shahab Hosseini) struggling for inspiration. He immerses himself into each new idea, playing the roles of his characters before our eyes. Slowly, these fantasies begin to intersect with his own life, blurring the line between his stories' worlds and his own failing existence. Will he ever be able to figure out the story he wants to tell? A throughly entertaining character study that is reminiscent of Walter Mitty's world.
Editor: Morteza Ali Abbas Mirzaei (مرتضی علی عباس میرزایی)

Name: Dying in September - Mordan Be Vaghte Shahrivar - مردن به وقت شهریور
Story Line: This gentle drama follows the story of Sina, a gifted young man with a passion for music. Under his father's authoritarian supervision, Sina juggles studying for university with taking care of his handicapped brother. Sina longs for more adventure from life, and gets exactly what he wished for when he is introduced to the smooth-talking M.J.,  and Sina agrees to sing with him at the studio. However, it  soon becomes clear to Sina that there is more to his new friend than meets the eye. As Sina spends more time under M.J.'s influence, his relationship with his disapproving father deteriorates further. The relationship between fathers and sons is at the core of this film, and its combination of compelling drama and beautiful cinematography makes it a must-watch.
Actor: Navid Layeghi Moghadam ( نوید لایقی مقدم )

Name: Buffalo - Bofalo - بوفالو
Story Line: Shokoofeh and Peyman are a couple who have committed a robbery. They are going to Anzali’s port to meet someone but they don’t know that their greedy path that they have taken is full of danger.

Name: Sky Reaches The Earth - Aseman be Zamin Miresad - آسمان به زمین میرسد
Story Line: Finding himself under pressure during the Kurdish Civil War, a man is forced to divorce his wife three times. Due to Islamic law, he is forbidden to marry her a fourth time. He formulates a plan - his trusted friend will marry and divorce her, thus allowing him to remarry her. This complicated strategy backfires when the friend refuses to divorce his new wife, and the couple are pursued across the post-war country. Bleak desert landscapes and mountain vistas add a dreamlike quality to this atmospheric study of a love triangle.

Name: In Blue - Be Range Aabi - به رنگ آبی
Story Line: A stunning piece of work from Hamidreza Faramarzi, this film focuses on the life of renowned graphic designer Ebrahim Haghighi. Beginning his career in the 1960s, Haghighi's work spanned across several industries, including advertising, film, and the arts. His extensive involvement with the Fajr Film Festival and beyond won him prestige the world over, most notably in the Ukraine, then Czechoslovakia, and of course, Iran itself. Featuring interviews with Rakhshan Bani Etemad, artist Aydin Aghdashloo, and filmmaker Rasoul Sadr Ameli, this documentary is a must for any arts lover.

Name: Unsweet Memories - Khatereh Khoshboo Nist - خاطره خوشبو نیست
Story Line: This incredibly candid short film focuses on the young Sharifeh, an illiterate child whose circumstances have forced her to take a position as a W.C. attendant. As director Azar Mehrabi asks her question after question, Sharifeh's smiling face belies a heartbreaking despair for the hopelessness of her situation. When Mehrabi offers her the chance to operate the camera herself however, Sharifeh's inquisitive spirit and intelligence shine through. By centering on the plight of one young girl, Mehrabi highlights concerning issues affecting contemporary Iran’s impoverished younger population.

Name: Night of Infatuation - Shabe Sheydaei - شب شیدایی
Story Line: This vibrant documentary takes us on a historical journey of Iranian music throughout the 20th century. In order to understand our recent past, however, the film casts its eye back even further; we learn that following the Arab conquest, Zoroastrian musicians placed great emphasis on the expression of emotion in their work. Following a 300 year silence, music gradually seeped its way back into the region, before blooming into the massive industry we know today. Informative and beautifully shot, this film features insight from such experts as poets Simin Behbahani and Ahmad Reza Ahmadi. Of course, Saffarian's retrospective documentary also showcases plenty of music from the 1900s through the early 2000s. Exuding pop and vintage appeal, as well as boasting visually striking and exclusive footage, 'Night of Infatuation' will take you on a nostalgic journey back in time.

Name: Melbourne - ملبورن
Story Line:
Hours before leaving Tehran for a three-year stay in Melbourne, young couple Amir (Peyman Moaadi) and Sara (Negar Javaherian) find themselves looking after a neighbour's newborn, left to them by the nanny. However, this well-meaning favour soon turns tragic and threatens to derail more than just their plans to move abroad. Unfolding in real-time and almost entirely within a Tehran apartment, this psychological drama patiently burrows to the heart of its moral dilemma, where doing the right thing may in fact be the very worst choice for this well-meaning couple. Assisted by excellent performances, intimate cinematography and expert editing, 'Melbourne' is a compellingly universal and thoroughly engrossing movie. A very tense thriller not to be missed!


خلاصه داستان
ملبورن درامی معمایی ست دربارهٔ زوجی جوان که در آستانه سفر ناخواسته درگیر ماجرایی پیچیده می‌شوند

ملبورن فیلمی به کارگردانی و نویسندگی نیما جاویدی و تهیه‌کنندگی جواد نوروزبیگی ساخته سال ۱۳۹۲ است. این فیلم رقابتهای بین المللی خود را با حضور در فستیوال فیلم ونیز(۲۰۱۴) به عنوان فیلم افتتاحیه هفته منتقدین آغاز کرد و بعد از حضور در چهار فستیوال الف (ونیز- توکیو- قاهره- ماردل پلاتا)  از چهار قاره دنیا  و بیش از ۶۰ حضور بین المللی در فستیوالهایی چون ‌آسیا پاسفیک، استکهلم،‌ زوریخ، شانگهای، استانبول، دوبلین، ملبورن، خیخون، براتیسلاوا، لوگزامبورگ، بریزبین، هانوی، ادینبورگ، آلماتی، کرالا، چنای، بنگلور، ویلنیوس، لیسبون، آنونی، آرس و ...  موفق به کسب ۱۳ جایزه ی بین المللی شد.

Name: Three Sisters - Se Khahar - سه خواهر
Story Line: This is part of Four Stage Reading which encompasses the readings of four different plays. Based on a play by Anton Chekhov, this reading is set in a small Russian town at the turn of the 20th century. Three sisters live in hope of returning to their home town of Moscow.

Name: The Man Who Lost His Wife - Mardi ke Zanash ra Gom Kard - مردی که زنش را گم کرد
Story Line: This is part of Four Stage Reading which encompasses the readings of four different plays. This reading is based on a piece by Sadegh Hedayat and narrates the original story from a new perspective.

Name: God of Carnage, Iranian Style - Khodaye Koshtar be Sabke Irani -  خدای کشتار به سبک ایرانی
Story Line: This is part of Four Stage Reading which encompasses the readings of four different plays. This reading begins as two sets of parents discussing their children fighting. However, conversation soon turns to chaos as the evening goes on. A French story told with Iranian flair.

Name: The Man Who Became a Horse - Mardi Ke Asb Shod - مردی که اسب شد
Story Line: An old man living with his only daughter tries to keep her close to him by any means, although she is married. With longing for what was, the daughter becomes attached to the one thing she has left of her deceased mother, a horse. Jealous of her affections, the old and stubborn patriarch sets the horse free, leading to his daughter’s despair. This evocative and at times frightening power game is about isolation, vulnerability and how we can become too dependent on those we love.

Name: The Name - Esm - اسم
Seven Months - Hafte Mahegi - هفت ماهگی
Story Line: Captivating social drama. At seven months pregnant, Rana is worried she may lose her child after having multiple abortions previously. Her husband shows little sympathy for their situation. Worries of infidelity begin to creep across her mind as she feels isolated in her plight. A dreadful turn of events brings him out of his complacency and forces him to re-evaluate his life choices.

Name: Ice Era - Asre Yakhbandan - عصر یخبندان
Story Line: Ice Era is a compelling tale of betrayal and addiction. In the tenth year of their marriage, Babak and Manizheh face the biggest challenge of their lives. When they run into financial problems, Babak is forced to work long hours to support them. This only proves to push them apart and a romantic betrayal leads to drug dependency and psychological collapse. Will the couple find their way out of the maze of ruin they are in? Farhad Aslani and Mahtab Keramati star in this gripping thriller.

Name: 50 Kilos of Sour Cherries - 50 Kilo Albaloo - پنجاه کیلو آلبالو
Story Line: Romantic comedy following a young woman and her peculiar journey to unlikely love. A wedding is sent spiralling into pandemonium after the disreputable groom begins shooting his gun mid ceremony. As the guests disperse, two strangers, Aida (Mona Ahmadi) and Davoud (Saed Soheili), become closer than anticipated when they get into a fender bender involving a police car. Upon lying to the questioning officer that Davoud is her husband, a relationship is sparked that neither party expected. A raucously funny and adventurous comedy.

Name: Nahid - ناهید
Story Line: Nahid, played by Sareh Bayat, has fought her way through a difficult divorce from her gambling-addicted husband. She has escaped with custody of her son, Amir Reza, and her freedom on one condition: that she never remarries. Financially struggling to support herself and the troublesome Amir Reza on her typist's wage, her prayers are answered in the form of Masood, a widower and successful business owner. Will she marry Masood at the risk of losing custody of her son or is there a way to navigate her husband's divorce terms? Reminiscent of Farhadi's 'A Separation', director Ida Panahandeh takes a look at Iran's strict divorce laws, but with the additional complication of the controversial 'temporary marriage'.

Name: Loveable Rajab - Rajab Delbar - رجب دلبر
Story Line: A witty tale that follows a humble milkman who has the arduous task of travelling from village to village to make a living for himself. Sympathetic to his plight, his friend and wedding singer Rajab tries his best to lend his help with hysterical consequences. Loveable Rajab is an endearing and wry experience from start to finish.

Name: Giti`s Problem - Moshkele Giti - مشکل گیتی
Story Line:
Externally Iraj and Giti are happy middle-aged couple. Giti is addicted to her mobile and the internet. On the same day that Iraj complains to Giti about the constant use of her mobile, a woman named Sofia comes to Iraj's company. Iraj seems to be distracted by Sofia and Giti becomes aware of this. As Iraj and Sofia’s relationship develops, Giti’s frustration toward both of them steadily increases. With Iraj’s continual denial and with any proof to validate Giti’s claims seemingly vanishing, tensions run high potentially severing the chance to reconnect with each other.

Synopsis by IMVbox

Name: Chance, Love, Accident - Shans, Eshgh, Tasadof - شانس، عشق، تصادف
Story Line: Hamid is a music teacher for orphaned children who, together with his half-sister Maryam, takes a busload of them on a trip to the seaside. They cross paths with Minou, a young woman struggling to come to terms with her father's remarriage. Sympathetic to the orphans' situation, and hoping to provide a distraction from her attempts to bond with her stepmother, Minou invites them to come and stay on her land. As she and Hamid begin to fall in love, other agencies contrive to prevent them in this bittersweet comedy about chance encounters and love blossoming from the simplest of gestures.

Name: I'm Not Alone Anymore - Digar Tanha Nistam - دیگر تنها نیستم
Story Line: Danial is a talented pottery maker from the north of Iran. A teenager, Danial has grown up without his father, who died in the Iran-Iraq War, and whose identity he often tries to inject into his art. One day he makes a vase and sends it into a competition under his father's name, but when it wins the top prize, questions are raised about the identity of the artist when the man tied to it has been dead for years. As Danial tries to keep the memory of his father alive, he also must come to terms with the truth of his situation in this loving drama about the psychology of letting go.

Name: A Mockery Looks Like a Murder - Mazhakeye Shabihe Ghatl - مضحکه شبیه قتل
Story Line: 'A Mockery Looks like A Murder' is a hilarious comedy play about two widows of Naser al-Din Shah Qajar, who want to pay tribute to their assassinated and beloved husband. While one wants to see performed a mockery of the murder, the other one wants to see performed a traditional Ta'zieh play. By chance, a theater company who is looking for a place to spend the night comes to the castle of the king. Which one of the two widows is going to see her wish fulfilled?
Actor: Shahram Haghighat Doost ( شهرام حقیقت دوست )

Name: Dowry's Sugar Bowl - Ghandoone Jahizieh - قندون جهیزیه
Story Line: Ata (Saber Abar) and Masoumeh (Negar Javaherian) find themselves feeling the pressure when their finances take a turn for the worse in this enjoyable romp. The couple's landlord has decided to put the rent up, and they have only one month to get the extra cash or vacate the property. A race against time ensues, and Ata is prepared to do anything he can to come up with the money. A humorous look at how far a desperate man will go when the odds are stacked against him.
Actor: Afsaneh Chehreh Azad ( افسانه چهره آزاد )
Karim Akbari Mobarakeh ( کریم اکبری مبارکه‎ )

Name: Standing in the Mist - Istadeh Dar Ghobar -ایستاده در غبار
Story Line: Ahmad Motevaselian is a commander who defends his country from invading forces, but his mysterious fate is ultimately determined far from his homeland. Through genuine audio excerpts and entirely narrated by his comrades and family members, this unique biopic meticulously recounts the extraordinary life-story of one of the Revolutionary Guards’ most prominent commanders.

Name: Wednesday, May 9 - Chaharshanbeh 19 Ordibehesht‎‎ -  چهارشنبه 19 اردیبهشت
Story Line: A well-meaning philanthropist places an advert pledging to give away 30 million tomans to someone in need, but the generous act causes chaos among the crowds that arrive to claim the gift. 'Wednesday, May 9' is broken up into three separate narratives: a woman who needs the money for a life-changing operation for her disabled husband, a pregnant woman who needs the money to get her innocent husband out of jail and the third is that of the misguided benefactor himself. This Venice award-winning, debut feature from director Vahid Jalilvand highlights the plight of the poor in Iran and how generosity teamed with faulty judgement can worsen the situation.
Actor: Afarin Obeisi ( آفرین عبیسی - صغري عبيسی )

Name: Three Sessions of Therapy - Seh Jalaseye Terapi - سه جلسه ی تراپی
Story Line: Based on Haruki Murakami's 'A Shinagawa Monkey', 'Three Sessions of Therapy' won the best music, set design and best actress awards at the 32nd Fajr Theater Festival. Directed by Afsaneh Mahian, who also directed the internationally acclaimed, 'Acclimatising' (Ham Havaee), the play uses minimalist sets and monologues to examine the relationships between its protagonists. Showcasing stellar performances by Elham Korda and Saber Abar, this understated piece of theater is unmissable.

Name: Twilight - Sayeh Rooshan - سایه روشن
Story Line: A man awakes to find substantial gaps in his long and short term memory, leaving him unsure of his identity and past. A therapist arrives to help him recollect his lost memories. As she aids him in bringing certain mysteries to light, it becomes evident that aspects of the memories lack cohesion and are rife with confusion. Ultimately providing more questions than answers, the memories start to reveal darker insights into his past. Maybe some things are better left forgotten.

Name: A Persian Melody - Jameh Daran - جامه دران
Story Line:
A Persian Melody - Jameh Daran - جامه دران

Whilst at her father's funeral, Shirin notices a man that looks eerily like her late father. Naturally this raises questions. Shirin’s uncle is initially hesitant to divulge information about the man, but eventually admits he is her illegitimate brother. Shirin’s mother, seeing the effect of this news, decides to unveil the family’s well-hidden secret  surrounding the brother and Shirin’s own origins. As director Hamidreza Ghotbi’s debut feature film received three nominations from the Fajr Film Festival, it is hailed as a one of the seminal screenplay adaptations in the Iranian film industry to date.

Name: Heavy Pieces of Lead - Tekkehaye Sangine Sorb - تکه های سنگین سرب
Story Line: Ghadeh Rahman explains his own account of Mustafa Chamran and how he thinks of him as a violent man. But once he gets to know him, he begins to develop new ideas and opinions of him.

Name: Abu Zeinab - Aboo Zeynab - ابو زینب
Story Line: Abu Zeinab follows the story of a Lebanese family during occupation of the country's lands by Israeli forces. This harrowing war drama portrays the sacrifice of a mother for her family during times of national conflict. A secret she is keeping only makes her situation more burdensome. Carmen Lebbos stars in this wartime feature.

Name: Crossed Out Memories - Khatere Haye Khat Khati - خاطره های خط خطی
Story Line: A fascinating insight into the Iranian pop music industry, Nasser Saffarian examines the history of the 'anti-love song,' a form that rejects the idea of the conventional love song in favor of darker subject matter, such as bitterness, betrayal and regret. Featuring interviews with established musicians and poets such as Shahkar Binesh Pajouh, Pari Zanganeh, and Ahmad Reza Ahmadi, the film details the genre’s emergence in the early 2000s. However, we learn that anti-love song themes have existed as far back as the 1960s. An absorbing, fantastically researched film.

Name: Copper Wire - مس سیم
Story Line: This brief vignette tells the story of a young boy as he scrambles to collect copper wire. Why does he collect it? When his precious wire is stolen by a neighborhood bully, our hero tries his best to recover it. A short tale of dedication and a young man's strong work ethic.

Name: The Lieutenant of Inishmore - Sotvane Inishmore - ستوان آینیشمور
Story Line: Hasan Majooni's 'Sotvane Inishmore' is an outstanding Iranian take on Martin McDonagh's play 'The Lieutenant of Inishmore', first produced by the Royal Shakespeare Company in London in 2001. Masterfully interpreted by Navid Mohammadzadeh and Reza Behboodi, this lunatic and gory comedy was well received and critically acclaimed in Iran.

Name: Ostrich - Shotor Morgh - شتر مرغ
Story Line: When brothers in law Tooraj and Iraj discover a surprising secret about the effects of eating ostrich meat, they feed it to their wives with hilarious results.
