Eager to capitalize on their find, the pair open an ostrich meat restaurant to enable others to benefit from their magical food’s properties. This lighthearted comedy’s vibrant cast and beautiful lighting make 'Ostrich' an unforgettable caper.

Name: Rajab Becomes an Artist - Rajab Artist Mishavad - رجب آرتیست می شود
Story Line:
Rajab and his fiancé come to the city to follow their dreams of becoming actors. They start their career by getting cast as extras. Soon their families find out about their motives and come to the city. 

Synopsis by IMVBox
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: We Have a Guest - Mehman Darim - میهمان داریم
Raspberry - Tameshk - تمشک
Story Line: Rezvan is a surrogate for wealthy couple Hamid and Homa. Despite their different outlooks on the world, the couple have trusted her to carry the child they always wanted. However, when a devastating accident takes place, it looks as if Rezvan will have to give up the child. This is not the least of her worries, as she also has to contend with an emotionally unstable brother-in-law and the painful recollections of her late husband. The coming birth is the only ray of light she can see in a bleak future, and now even that seems uncertain. As the date draws nearer, Rezvan continually wonders if life can be like the raspberry bush and if some good can come from bad circumstances.

Name: Lady - Khanoom - خانم
Story Line: Three days in Tehran, three women from different social classes, engaged with the problems in their lives, but trying to solve them...

Name: Che - چ
Story Line:
In the summer of 1979, during a big crisis in a city in southwest of the country, Dr. Mostapha Chamran, a well known Iranian guerilla along with General Fallahi, commander land forces, enters the city to evaluate the situation.
CHE narrates 48 hours in the life of Chamran when he is directly engaged in action in the city of Paveh, a city surrounded by anti revolutionary forces...
Actor: Amir Reza Delavari ( امیر رضا دلاوری )

Name: Don't Be Tired - Khasteh Nabashid - خسته نباشید
Story Line: When Maryam returns to Iran for the first time since childhood, her adventure-seeking husband Roman whisks her on a road trip, much to her reluctance. Joined by self-appointed tour leader Morteza and his friend Hossein, an unlucky course of events soon forces them to stay at Hossein's aunt's house. What starts out as a sightseeing tour becomes an unexpected personal journey which reignites her lust for life.

Name: Behind the Scenes: Facing Mirrors - Poshte Sahneh: Aynehaye Rooberoo - پشت صحنه آینه های روبرو
Story Line: One of the most groundbreaking titles in the history of Iranian cinema, this documentary gives us exclusive insight into the complex world of Persian filmmaking. Rana is a kindhearted young mother struggling to provide for her son as she awaits her husband's release from prison, while 'Eddie,' or Adineh, tries to escape the clutches of her oppressive father in order to pursue a sex change abroad. As we follow the intertwined lives of these  protagonists, we learn not just what it means to be transgender in contemporary Iran, but how women must bend to fit the roles carved out for them by a patriarchal hierarchy. A chance to witness how a modern masterpiece is formed.
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: Sending Condoleances Ad - Ersale Agahie Tasliat - ارسال آگهی تسلیت
Story Line: Story of a man caught between two roads. Either doing his duty, or keeping his word. He has not much time to decide, and has to choose between two.

Name: Carriage - Kaleskeh - کالسکه
Story Line: A couple's marriage is endangered when they meet a friend from the past.

Name: The Lovers Die Standing - Asheghha Istadeh Mimirand - عاشق‌ها ایستاده می‌میرند
The Little Black Fish - Mahi Siah Kochooloo - ماهی سیاه کوچولو
Who Gave Who Got? - Ki Dadeh Ki Gerefteh? - کی داده کی گرفته؟
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: Mother Courage - Naneh Delavar - ننه دلاور
Actor: Seyed Mir Emad Miri (سید میر عماد میری)

Name: Arsenic and the Old Lace - Arsenic Va Toore Kohneh - آرسنیک و تور کهنه
Be Human - Adam Bash - آدم باش
Story Line: The story of a man whose interpretation in communicating with people is in trouble, but instead he is very good in interaction with the animals.

Name: The Spanish Show - Namayeshe Espaniaei - نمایش اسپانیایی
What Men Don't Know About Women - Anche Mardan Darbare Zanan Nemidanand - آنچه مردان درباره زنان نمی‌دانند
Story Line: A middle age doctor who has wife and two children and a calm peaceful life falls in love with a woman 30 years younger than him and marries her. This put him in many more troubles. The movie theme in connection with the temporary marriage raises the comedic atmosphere.

Name: The Prison Bride - Aroose Zendan - عروس زندان
Coin - Sekke - سکه
A House Beside Clouds - Khaneie Kenare Abrha - خانه‌ای کنار ابر‌ها
Story Line: During the Iran and Iraq war, two young men scam the soldier's family.
Actor: Afarin Obeisi ( آفرین عبیسی - صغري عبيسی )

Name: Time to Love - Dorane Asheghi -  دوران عاشقی
Story Line: Bita is a successful lawyer and her specialty is women's rights. A curious case is brought to her that changes the lives of everybody involved.

Name: Melancholia - Malikholya - مالیخولیا
The Lucky Luke Returns - Bazgashte Looke Khosh Shans - بازگشت لوک خوش‌شانس
The Other One's Dad - Pedare An Digari - پدر آن دیگری
Story Line: The film take place in Tehran 1990s and is the story of a 6 years old boy Shahab who still can not talk and because of that is being teased by every one. Even in his family they care for his bigger brother more than him and only his mother is defending him. He runs away from his family and meets an elderly couple who take him to their home. Their behavior change him a lot but he is back to his home once again. Until his grandmother is come to stay with them for some time.

Name: The Cease Fire 2 - Atash Bas 2 - آتش بس ۲
Story Line: A young couple try to fix their marriage troubles with the help of a psychiatrist.

Name: Camera - Doorbin - دوربین
The Fox - Roobah - روباه
Lamp 100 - Lampe Sad - لامپ صد
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: Shadow - Sayeh - سايه
The Long Goodbye - Khodahafeziye Toolani - خداحافظی طولانی
Love and Madness - Eshgh O Jonoun - عشق و جنون
Charsoo - چارسو
Story Line: Farhad kiani is a young wealthy and proud man, he is having some issues and not feeling happy with his wife Sara. Farhad is so busy with his work and he doesn't know that saeed, his old and good friend, is dealing with his daughter's illness.

Name: Stranger - Biganeh - بیگانه
Story Line: A free adaptation of "Streetcar Named Desire". A trouble-minded woman enters her sister's family and causes problems.

Name: Angels Descend Together - Fereshteha Ba Ham Miayand - فرشته ها با هم می آیند
Story Line: Ahmad is a young clergyman who has a quiet and lovely life with his wife; however, his life changes when his wife becomes pregnant. Economical pressure forces him to work until he is offered to play a role in a film which is the beginning of new events in his life.

Name: Ascending People - Merajiha - معراجی ها
Mobarak - مبارک
Story Line: In this modern adaptation of the ancient Persian poet Ferdowsi’s epic drama, the puppets set out in search of Rostam, an ancient hero who was abducted. After great hardship they rescue ancient heroes’ puppets that are facing crisis due to a conspiracy by modern robot toys.
Actor: Hassan Karim Khan Zand (حسن کریم خان زند)

Name: The Injured Cow - Gave Zakhmi - گاو زخمی
Actor: Mohammad Amin Saheb Zadeh (محمد امین صاحب زاده)

Name: The Last Fifty Steps - Panjah Ghadame Akhar - پنجاه قدم آخر
Story Line: The operations intelligence division is determined to destroy Iraqi radars in one of the frontlines. They manage to persuade an electronics specialist with military experience to help support them with their objectives.
Editor: Varouzh Karim Masihi ( واروژ کریم مسیحی )

Name: Metropole - متروپل
Story Line: The story of two youngsters who one night meet a woman Khatoon who has take refuge in a billiard club. This put them on many challenges.

Name: Bitter But Sweet - Talkh Amma Shirin - تلخ اما شیرین
Love and Pay-Off - Eshgh va Mokafat - عشق و مکافات
Tales - Ghesseha - قصه ها
Story Line: A series of seven interconnected vignettes about different people dealing with their everyday problems in modern day Iran. Featuring stories of love between mothers and sons, husbands and wives, and men and women whose affection gives them the hope they need to overcome life's toughest challenges. A poignant, intimate look behind closed doors, as well as a biting examination of modern Iranian society.

Name: 360 Degrees - 360 Darajeh - ۳۶۰ درجه
Story Line: After a drug bust; Javid, a young man, finds his wife missing and himself behind bars. After he is released from prison, Mahtab (his now to be ex-wife), calls him out of nowhere, and asks for his help. Javid, who still loves Mahtab, starts his search to investigate the reason of his ex-wife disappearance. Javid pushes his way into the underworld of a crime ring to find Nazem, a drug king-pin who is responsible for everything that has happened to Javid and Mahtab.

Name: Acclimatising - Ham Havaee - هم هوایی
Story Line: 'Acclimatising' is a story of women and  generations. The play tells the stories of three women who, despite the fact that they have nothing in common at first sight, bound together by their personal tragedy.

Name: Apparition - Ashbah - اشباح
Story Line: A drunken, boorish general tyrannises his wife and his maid. When the wife discovers that the maid is pregnant with the general's child, she turns the maid out of the house. Years later, the general is dead, and a younger generation has risen with a new outlook on life and new problems to face. This flamboyantly stylised melodrama, loosely adapted from Ibsen, comes from one of the legendary figures of the Iranian New Wave.

Name: Delta X - دلتا ایکس
Story Line: When tenuous couple Siyavash and Elnaz join their friends Hamid and Mahsa for a trip to the coast, they are dismayed by the unexpected arrival of Siyavash's former lover Bita and her husband Babak. Convinced that the chance meeting is a deliberate setup by Hamid, Siyavash starts to descend into a world of distrust and paranoia as his jealousy and resentment take their toll. His relationship with Elnaz jeopardised, his friendship with Hamid strained, Siyavash finds himself willing to dirty his very soul as he attempts to right past wrongs and rewrite fate to his own selfish ends.

Name: Mother Courage and Her Children - Naneh Delavar Va Farzandane Ou - ننه دلاور و فرزندان او
Story Line: Khiali Sabri's 'Mother Courage and Her Children' is an adaptation of one of nine plays that Brecht wrote in an attempt to counter the rise of Fascism and Nazism. In response to the invasion of Poland by the German armies of Adolf Hitler in 1939, Brecht wrote 'Mother Courage' in what writers call a "white heat" - in a little over a month. Puppetry, ingenious set design, and inventive costume all feature in this Iranian take on a Brechtian anti-war perspective. Fatemeh Motamed Ariya was nominated for the best actress award at the 32nd International Fajr Theater Festival.

Name: The Cherry Orchard - Baghe Albaloo - باغ آلبالو
Story Line: The Iranian re-imagining of the classic Russian play, written by Anton Chekhov. The play centers around an aristocratic woman and her family as they return to their old home just before it gets auctioned. The cherry orchard around the house symbolizes the past and also the family. As they lose the estate, the time comes to cut out the cherry orchard for now and forever. The play represents the bourgeoisie and how society becomes fully materialistic in the early 20th century.

Name: Antigone - آنتیگونه
Story Line: Sophocles's Antigone has been put in a modern setting this time. Having the red color dominating on stage, the actors bring all the madness to the surface. Babak Borzooyeh's version of the classic story is unusual and powerful at the same time, putting the old story in a whole new perspective.

Name: The Green Old Tree - Derakhte Pire Sabz - درخت پیر سبز
Story Line: Narrating the journey of one woman who migrates to Iran from Venezuela, 'The Green Old Tree' charts her life before and after the move, as she adapts to the challenges of her new situation. The film presents a sociological view towards life and culture, a fluid, transmutable concept, in keeping with the views of its subject, a university professor. A thoughtful tale of a woman out of kind and a sincere narration of the human spirit, this stirring documentary holds true to its message and contains within it lessons for women everywhere.

Name: Hamlet - هملت
Story Line: Based on Shakespeare's 'Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark', this classic tale of betrayal is retold for an Iranian audience. Hamlet is devastated when, after the death of his father, his mother swiftly remarries his uncle. Affirming his horror with the new situation, he is visited by his father's ghost who tells Hamlet that he was murdered by his new father-in-law. Using a play within a play to bring the killer to the forefront, Hamlet's father will not be the only one to meet a tragic end. Director, Reza Gouran, reinterprets this dark tale skillfully weaving his own culture into the story making it relevant to a new audience.

Name: Unripe Pomegranates - Anar Haye Naras - انارهای نارس
Story Line: A Tehran couple expecting a baby live a suburban lifestyle that is far from glamorous. Both are stuck in dead-end jobs with no real prospects and no end in sight. Despite their precarious existence, the young couple still strive to be happy. However, fate deals them a critical blow forcing them to adapt to new lives while still preparing for their future. Gripping drama examining happiness in the face of adversity.

Name: Guinness - Giness - گینس
Story Line: The story of three brothers who live hard on an ostrich farm out of Tehran. They are trying to register an ostrich in Guinness, which makes them involved in a series of adventures.

Name: We Came, You Weren't There, We Left - Amadim, Naboodid, Raftim - آمدیم، نبودید، رفتیم
Story Line: In this wildly inventive adaptation of the classic tale of Pinocchio, an impressive ensemble cast of well-known cinema stars drive the plot forward. Among others, Hanieh Tavassoli, Babak Hamidian, and Leili Rashidi tell the story of the wooden boy who wants nothing more than to be human. As Pinocchio's guardian Geppetto and a well-meaning fairy try to keep Pinocchio grounded in reality, his new dastardly companions, a cat and a fox, do their best to lead him astray. Hugely entertaining and imaginatively choreographed, this is a truly spectacular piece of theater.

Name: Heavy Makeup - Arayeshe Ghaliz - آرایش غلیظ
Story Line: When a young man Majid gets beaten up and stabbed, his friend Masoud takes to the road with a truck of stolen fireworks. Fleeing customs and his employers, he heads for the border with the woman he loves in a show of defiance and a bid for self-determination. Wrapped in colourful layers of amusing and entertaining stories of thieves, smugglers, lovers, lemon castles and high voltage, 'Hard Makeup' is a stunning piece of arthouse cinema, brutal, honest and affecting.

Name: Azar, Shahdokht, Parviz and Others - Azar, Shahdokht, Parviz va Digaran - آذر, شهدخت, پرویز و دیگران
Story Line: For all of her married life, Shahdokht has been dissuaded from pursuing dreams of her own, constantly living in the shadow of her husband Parviz, a famous Iranian actor. But when necessity grants her the opportunity to seize the spotlight, she takes it with both hands. As she starts outperforming her husband, Parviz's fragile ego comes to the fore and throws their relationship into turmoil, a turmoil made all the worse by their daughter Azar's return to Iran. A searching drama about the double lives people lead, with the illusion Shahdokht and Parviz have to portray at odds with their life behind the scenes.

Name: The Corner - Goosheh - گوشه
Story Line: This extraordinary film centres on Amir, a young Tehrani who decides to tell all in a Youtube video. When Amir is granted a night off from caring for his invalid father, his evening of fun with friends takes a nasty turn with disastrous consequences. Filmed in one single shot, Amir's stark confession brings a level of honesty rarely seen in cinema. We cannot help but be swept up by Abed Abest's anguished performance, delivered straight to the camera.

Name: Thirteen - Sizdah - سیزده
Story Line: Thirteen year-old Bemani struggles to deal with his parents' divorce in this striking coming-of-age film by Houman Seyyedi. Abused by his peers at school, Bemani seeks comfort in a group of older kids from the wrong side of the tracks. They welcome him into the fold, and soon Bemani becomes mixed up in a life of petty crime. When a shocking incident takes place, Bemani realizes that he has become embroiled in something far more complex than he could have imagined. A powerful story of teen rebellion and what it means to be an adolescent in contemporary Iran, 'Thirteen' received awards for Best Picture and Best Cinematography at the 18th Shanghai International Film Festival.

Name: Five Stars - Panj Setareh -  پنج ستاره
Story Line: A shy, reserved young woman, Maryam, takes a position as a cleaner at an upscale hotel in order to provide financial aid to her mother. As she begins her employment in this new environment, she soon comes to realize that every aspect of her work is rife with politics and hidden agendas. The other cleaners are desperate to keep their own jobs and the management is unforgiving of even the smallest errors. With no other option, Maryam must learn to adapt to this environment, but will her naivety lead her into trouble?
Editor: Varouzh Karim Masihi ( واروژ کریم مسیحی )

Name: Glengarry Glen Ross - گلن گری گلن راس
Story Line: Director, Parsa Pirouzfar, presents us with this impressive, Iranian interpretation of David Mamet's Pulitzer Prize-winning thought-provoking classic play. 'Glengarry Glen Ross' tells us the story of four real estate agents using every sneaky trick in the book to sell unwanted properties to unsuspecting buyers. Pirouzfar does a stellar job in creating tension in an office, where the jostling egos of these disreputable fraudsters becomes almost unmanageable.

Name: Dinner with Friends - Shaam Ba Doustan - شام با دوستان
Story Line: Babak Borzooyeh's adaptation of the classic Pulitzer Prize winning drama is bittersweet and provoking at the same time. It centers around two couples who have been friends for a long time but unseen circumstances seem to change things for all of them. Can anything stay the same after all?
Actor: Amir Reza Delavari ( امیر رضا دلاوری )

Name: Whispers Behind the Battle Line - Pech Peche Haye Poshte Khate Nabard - پچ پچه های پشت خط نبرد
Story Line: Set during the Iran-Iraq war, this remarkable play focuses on one central event. In the midst of the Khuzestan province during the month of Ramadan, the Iranian and Iraqi sides put aside their weapons and form an amicable, if somewhat unexpected, truce.  The whole play is staged during one night, when a truce forms between the Iranians and Iraqis during the month of Ramadan. As the soldiers joke, argue, and discuss politics, we can't help but wonder what will become of them in the future. A philosophical look at the role of the individual in the face of war.

Name: Red Carpet - Farshe Ghermez - رد کارپت
Story Line: Satirical view on the film industry and those wishing to become famous. An aspiring actor has hopes of meeting his idol, Steven Spielberg, in his quest for fame. He travels to Cannes, France, to meet and ask his hero for advice on making it big in the film industry. However, in this captivating comedy, the reality doesn't quite match up to his expectations. As we follow this actor's hilarious progress, or lack thereof, we cheer him on in his quest with relish.

Name: A Man for All Seasons - Mardi Baraye Tamame Fosool - مردی برای تمام فصول
Story Line:
Based on Robert Bolt's original play, this clever adaptation focuses on the life of 16th Century Chancellor of England Sir Thomas More. His refusal to grant King Henry VIII a divorce from Catherine of Aragon on the grounds that she did not bear him a son becomes the central dilemma in this riveting play. The king's wish to marry Anne Boleyn, the sister of his former mistress, adds further fuel to the fire. More is seen here as a righteous man, envied by rivals such as Thomas Cromwell and loved by the common man. Reza Kianian's sympathetic and engrossing portrayal of More, under the direction of Bahman Farmanara, proves to be the play's greatest draw.



"
Actor: Amir Reza Delavari ( امیر رضا دلاوری )

Name: Old Songs - Taranehaye Ghadimi - ترانه های قدیمی
Story Line: 'Old Songs' is a nostalgic exploration into a traditional form of theater that mixes traditional Iranian songs with comedic sketches. A group of talented singers perform gathered around a piano. This is infused with a montage of still images of joyous entertainers, including Peyman Moaadi. Interspersed with witty exchanges between comic characters, these well-timed sketches do not fail to amuse. The Director, Mohammad Rahmanian, delights and comforts with his old-fashioned presentation harking back to a time when the simple function of theater was to entertain.

Name: The Fourth Wall - Divare Chaharom - دیوار چهارم
Story Line: Set informally, the audience stands close to the actors, as they perform without elaborate costume or artificial set to distract from the action. Narrated by two solemn guides, director Amir Reza Kouhestani, takes us on a journey through space and over geographical borders. It is a self-reflective piece that considers different versions of similar things. One culture is contrasted with another. A performance space is compared to an exhibition space. With skilled acting from Rambod Javan and Negar Javaherian, 'The Fourth Wall' is a bold and thought-provoking piece of theater.

Name: Where is This place? - Inja Kojast? - اینجا کجاست؟
Story Line: 'Where is This?' is a one-woman play, brilliantly performed by Rima Raminfar. As a single woman waits for her luggage at an airport conveyor belt, she begins to chat to strangers who pass her by. Talking about her life and her reasons for going on her trip, the woman's story begins to unfold in depth. As it does so, the audience are taken on a vivid emotional journey, which climaxes in an unforgettably moving monologue.

Name: I Forgot You This Summer - In Tabestan Faramooshet Kardam - این تابستان فراموشت کردم
Story Line: A beautiful woman wearing a Spanish flamenco dress sits at a dining table in her home. She talks into a dictaphone, as if talking to her lost love. The rain falling outside brings back memories of her time spent in Barcelona. As she dances with her laptop in place of her man, her tone swiftly changes from joyous to wistful. This monologue is broken up with a brief dance sequence set to a lilting Spanish guitar. The second act is more upbeat with a different actress passionately performing an emphatic monologue.  Simply set, director Bahareh Rahnama makes great use of space in this brief, entertaining piece.

Name: Six Centuries, Six Years - Shesh Gharn o Shesh Saal - شش قرن و شش سال
Story Line:
Film portrays the endeavors of a group of Iranian master musicians who are trying to locate, restore and record a repertoire of compositions attributed to Abd al-Qadir Maraghi, a prominent composer who lived six centuries ago and greatly influenced the Middle Eastern classical music. During their six-year journey, the group is finally able to reassemble a major portion of these ballads by sifting through manuscripts and other documents deeply buried in the annals of Iranian and Turkish art history. Film follows these musicians as they rediscover forgotten music that deepens the roots of our music as far as six centuries.
Website: karafilm.ir

Name: Pope - Pop - پاپ
Story Line: This episodic drama focuses on the lives of a minority family in Booshehr. Toomaj, the family's eldest son, hopes to join his love Shirin in London by swimming across the English Channel. His sister, meanwhile, has opted to seclude herself from society due to the colour of her skin, but the upcoming papal election may spell an end to her misery. Finally, young student Hasti searches for a way to free her fiance Ali from prison in time for a trip to Mexico.
Actor: Hadis Chehre Pardaz ( حدیث چهره پرداز )

Name: Toward Freedom - Darbast Azadi - دربست آزادی
Story Line: Sohrab and Bijan are two penniless friends who live in an old, abandoned cinema. One morning they decide to seek out Qader, a man who owes them a lot of money, but Bijan is severely wounded in a fight with Qader's men. Desperate and distraught, Sohrab brings Bijan back to the cinema, where it seems the two of them might have finally reached the end of the line. As Sohrab ponders his next move, Mehrshad Karkhani's film develops into a study of despondency and dependence, of friendship and of two men trying to break free.

Name: The Bald Soprano - Avaze Khane Taas - آوازه خان تاس
Story Line: Based on Eugene Ionesco's absurdist play 'La Cantatrice Chauve' - translated from French as 'The Bald Soprano' is a dreamlike symphony of nonsensical speech and disjointed associations, all intended to expose just how hopeless human communication really is. It holds the world record for the play that has been staged continuously in the same theatre for the longest time. This play had already been recognized as a modern classic and an important seminal work in the Theatre of the Absurd.

Name: Tragedy - Trazhedy - تراژدی
Story Line: Ghasem has a plan. With a wife twenty years younger than him and two children who depend on him for financial support until they can marry, he is in dire need of money. Concocting an elaborate scheme to stage a car accident, Ghasem hopes to ensnare some unfortunate individual, from whom he can then extort blood money to pay off his debts. The trouble with elaborate plans though is that they rarely go smoothly...

Name: Neurasthenia - Noorastani - نوراستنی
Story Line: The film 'Neurasthenia' shares with the audience the particularly arresting story of Shahriah, a young man who suffers from depression. When one of his friends recommends seeking help from a psychologist, little does he realise that this will open him up to the abuse of his past that he tried so hard to leave behind. This strikingly modern film takes a close look at the suffering man's psyche and reveals an incomparable story that will engage the viewer.

Name: Stones in His Pocket - Sangha Dar Jibhayash - سنگ ها در جیب هایش
Story Line: 'Stones in His Shoes' is an Iranian re-telling of the Irish play of the same name. The tragic-comedy story centers around a small rural town, where many of the townsfolk are extras for a production company - including two best friends whom share an intense desire to succeed in the film industry.

Name: Drought and Lies - Khoshksali Va Dorough - خشکسالی و دروغ
Story Line: This modern drama has been put on stage by Farid Bozorgmehr. The story is about the young professional generation of Iranians and their marital and social problems and conflicts. Written by one of the best Iranian playwrights, Mohammad Yaghoubi, whose controversial plays have created a sensation in Iran.

Name: Portable Piano - Pianoye Hamrah - پیانوی همراه
Story Line: Stirring piano improvisation by Kiawasch Sahebnassagh which moves through many different emotional phases and is complemented by intriguing visual images. As Sahebnassagh performs, rotoscope techniques are used to enhance close-up shots of hands playing on the piano keys, providing a stimulating accompaniment to a stimulating performance.

Name: Whose Life Is It Anyway? - Belakhare In Zendegi Male Kiye? - بالاخره این زندگی مال کیه؟
Story Line:
After a car accident, sculptor Ken Harrison becomes a quadriplegic and is no longer able to create art, make love or have any semblance of a normal existence. He hires a lawyer who, reluctantly at first, represents Harrison to petition legally for the right to end his life, while knowing that he is trying to win his client a death sentence.

Staunchly opposed to euthanasia is a by-the-book hospital administrator, who is determined to keep his patient alive even against his wishes, and sympathetic doctor, who develops personal feelings for Harrison. She wants to keep him alive, even though Harrison's girlfriend has accepted his decision.

A young orderly (Thomas Carter) and nurse (Kaki Hunter) do what they can to keep Harrison's spirits up, even wheeling him to a hospital basement where they treat him to reggae music and marijuana. In the end, though, it is up to a judge (Kenneth McMillan) whether the patient has a moral, ethical and legal right to choose to die.

Name: The Eyes That Are Yours - Cheshmhaee Ke Male Tost - چشم هایی که مال توست
Story Line: 'The Eyes That Are Yours' is a one woman play starring Bahareh Rahnama, as a deserted wife reflecting on her life. Shortly after the birth of their child, her husband abandons her. Beginning with her upbeat denial, she talks as if her husband is still there to listen. The disembodied voice of her husband is voiced by Shahab Hosseini, better known from Asghar Fahadi's 'A Separation.' Director, Nasim Adabi, takes us on a journey beginning with upbeat denial leading us through to a gradual descent into the lonely reality of this forgotten woman.

Name: Awakening Cinema - Bidariye Cinema - بیداری سینما
Hamlet, the Little Prince of Denmark - Hamlet, Shazdeh Koochoolooye Danmark - هملت، شازده کوچولوی دانمارک
Story Line: New life is breathed into Shakespeare's classic in this vibrant retelling of 'Hamlet,' directed by esteemed theatre and film actor Reza Babak. When the eight-year-old Danish prince uncovers a plot for his father's murder, he enlists the help of his friend Ophelia to counter it. Will Hamlet succeed? Featuring all the characters from the original play, this brand new storyline, written by Swedish playwright Torsten Letser, puts an original spin on a classic story for adults and children alike.

Name: Peace
Story Line: As a young boy sits at the kitchen table doing his homework, he occasionally glances up at the television, where a war movie plays. A short reflective piece that explores how war has repercussions on today's youth.

Name: The Unclean - Najes - نجس
Story Line: Whilst driving on a dark night, a man hits a dog and injures it severely. His guilt and empathy are evident as he takes the whimpering animal to his home. However, dogs are considered 'unclean' in Islam and his wife and family wish for him to disperse of the dog. With his family arguing that the dog can not be present during an upcoming religious festival, the man drives it back to the roadside where he struck it. As his compassion comes into conflict with tradition, the man is faced with a serious dilemma with what to do with the poor animal. Ark brothers' short screened at over 20 international festivals, including the 2014 Cannes Film Festival.

Name: Foggy Life - Zendegi Dar Meh - زندگی در مه
Story Line: Mahnaz works as a secretary to the mysterious Lady Farkhonde, a matchmaker-cum-psychic who women rely on to secure their futures. As Mahnaz receives calls from clients as far away as L.A., customers from all walks of life await their appointments in the lobby. What do they all want? As they interact, certain truths come to light. An enjoyable short.

Name: The Signature - Emza - امضا
Story Line: Short comedy-drama set in an office. When Karim and Amir argue about work and Amir collapses, is stuffing his body in a closet really the best way to deal with the situation? It may be, seeing as Karim's bosses are about to arrive for an office inspection. But can he successfully hide the body from them? And what will happen when they’re gone?

Name: The Truth is That the Sun Spins Around Us - Vagheiat Ine Ke Khorshid Dore Ma Migardeh - واقعیت اینه که خورشید دور ما میگرده
Story Line: Experimental two-actor play with a refreshing lack of dialogue and an intriguing lack of narrative structure. Set in the apartment of a young couple, music and physical actions convey the couple's changing moods as a day unfolds in their lives. Meloncholy, curiosity, excitement and fun are just some of the states given a unique form of dramatic expression in this absorbing play.

Name: The Return of the Prodigal Son - ‌Bazgashte Pesare Nafarman - بازگشت پسر نافرمان
Story Line: Iranian photographer Khosro has lived and worked in Paris for twenty years. He does everything he can to erase the memory of Iran, while maintaining his bond with his father, who stayed behind. Through their frequent Skype calls, the old man's voice has come to embody the city of Tehran for him. Yet one day, he is confronted with the issue of his return and Khosro's world is turned upside down...

Name: A Requiem for Libricide - Marsiyei Baraye Ketab Sooziha - مرثیه ای برای کتاب سوزی ها
Friar Laurence, A Man Who Talks - Larense Raheb, Mardi Ke Harf Mizanad - لارنس راهب، مردی که حرف می زند
Story Line: Staged in a cafe with the audience standing informally around the artist, this one man show allows actor, Afshin Hashemi, to display his powerful voice with this forceful monologue. With no costume and an unstudied style (the actor refers to his script throughout), directorr, Abbas Ghafari allows the script to speak for itself in this raw performance.

Name: Strange Creatures - Ajayebol Makhloughat - عجایب المخلوقات
Story Line: This grotesque and off-the-wall play is a critical analysis of society and the relationship between the masses and the economic power/state elite. In particular, the play highlights the fact that men are born under the yoke of a ruling or power elite.

Name: Ey Vay Hay - ای وای های
Story Line: An innovative piece of theatre that focuses on themes of love and magic, this puppet show tells the story of a young tailor who falls in love with the King's daughter. However, things are far from straightforward when he realizes that she has fallen under a spell. Accompanied by his father, the intrepid hero takes to the streets and the bazaar to find a way to break the magic. Along the way, the duo meet a mysterious jinn, who promises to help them in their quest. Visually beautiful and full of artistry.

Name: Night on the Wet Pavement - Shab Rooye Sangfarshe Khis - شب روی سنگفرش خیس
Story Line: 'Night on the Wet Pavement' tells the story of Professor Majlesi (Behzad Farahani) who recently retired from academic life and is now living with his widow sister and blind daughter. One day, Dr. Majlesi receives a letter inviting him to come back to teach in university. Given his financial and family problems, the old man turns thigns over his head to see if he should accept the offer or not.

Name: The Godfather of Naples - Pedarkhandeye Napoli - پدرخوانده ناپلی
Story Line: This play is three-act comedy that tells the story of a godfather in Naples who has always tried his best to prevent any bloodshed and avoid any personal involvements with the organised crime. Despite his best efforts to keep out of trouble, things take a dangerous turn after a big dispute broke out...

Name: The Unscrupulous Murderer, Hasse Karlsson - Ghatele Bi Rahm, Hasse Karlsson - قاتل بی رحم، هسه کارلسون
Story Line: Based on Henning Mankell's Swedish play, this play tells the story of Hasse who is on the way to see his estranged mother for the first time in years. She is dying. A bus breakdown puts an end to his hopes for last-minute reconciliation but it affords him an opportunity to ponder the events that wrecked their relationship. Hasse explains that he fell under the influence of a manipulative kid called Swallow. Hasse and Swallow met on the threshold of another world as well as in the process of becoming adults. Hasse became reluctantly involved in Swallow’s thoughts and let himself be guided towards an outrageous action he does not want to perform. 'The Unscrupulous Murderer, Hasse Karlsson' is a tale of innocence lost.

Name: Predicament - Makhmaseh - مخمصه
Story Line:
'Predicament' tells the story of a young couple who moves into their new house. On the night of her birthday, an uninvited guest comes to their house and a series of unexpected events happen.

Synopsis by iMVBox.com

Name: Macbeth - مکبث
Story Line:
A modern take on a classic story. Reza Servati's Macbeth has been shown all over the world. This non-linear adaptation of Shakespeare's Macbeth is set in a nightmarish atmosphere blending minimalistic performance and brilliant stage-work. It focuses mainly on the eternal punishment of Macbeth and Lady Macbeth. This production not only won the Special Jury Award at the Fajr 
International Theater Festival but also received the Russian Association of Theater Critics award in 2016.

Name: For a Fistful of Rubles - Be Khatere Yek Mosht Rubl - به خاطر یک مشت روبل
Story Line: 'For a Fistful of Rubles' is based on Neil Simon's 1973 play 'The Good Doctor', which was, in turn, informed by the short stories of Anton Chekhov. The story centers around an unnamed writer, likely inspired by Chekhov himself, struggling to overcome writer's block. As the story unfolds we see that the main issue holding him back from writing freely is his own difficult, artistic temperament. Featuring a play within a play, 'For a Fistful of Rubles' is a self-reflective piece and an impressive, Iranian reinterpretation of Simon's classic.

Name: Mashti Esmaeil - مشتی اسماعیل
Story Line: In rural Iran, an elderly blind farmer,  Mashti Esmaeil, toils through the seasons of sowing and harvest. Kisari's documentary follows Esmaeil as he goes about his everyday tasks, capturing the farmer's tender moments with his wife and daughter in the process. Despite his disability, Esmaeil manages to retain a sense of child-like wonder at the world around him, and a genuine joy in learning. He also proves in this affectionate portrait to be a serene and wise man with an incredible sense of humour. His life, the camera seems to say, is a lesson in hope and determination. A gracious tribute to a certain predisposition to happiness.

Name: Auntie Nahid - Khaleh Nahid - خاله ناهید
Story Line: This fascinating documentary takes a look at a woman who makes a living from singing at religious events in Iran. These events, which cater for women only, pay extremely well, and our protagonist is able to make a tidy sum. A riveting glimpse into a hidden world, the film sheds light on female singing in Iran, which is usually forbidden. These events, however, are the exception to the rule. A must see.

Name: Dying 21 Times in 30 Days - 21 Bar Mordan Dar 30 Rooz - بیست و یک بار مردن در سی روز
Layover Las Vegas - Tavaghof Dar Las Vegas - توقف در لاس وگاس
Story Line: When Anahita experiences an unexpected layover in Las Vegas on her way back to Iran, a distant cousin is called in to make sure she is in good hands. Ramin and Anahita prove to be exact opposites; with his lack of Farsi and her rather limited command of English, the two struggle to understand one another. A vibrant piece of work.

Name: Thicker than Paint - Faratar az Rang - فراتر از رنگ
Story Line: This deeply intimate portrait of an Iranian woman's life, this film documents the life of Habibeh Bedayat, a self-taught painter who has created over 4000 works of art. Scenes of Habibeh conducting her everyday life allow us a fascinating glimpse into the philisophies of a strongly independent wife, mother, teacher, and artist. As we learn more about her upbringing in Pre-Revolution Iran, we come to understand exactly how much Habibeh has sacrificed in order to become the free-willed person she is today.

Name: An Oak Tree - Derakhte Balout - درخت بلوط
Volpone - ولپن
Story Line: Volpone (The Fox) is a gentleman who pretends to be on his deathbed after a long illness in order to dupe three men who aspire to inherit his fortune. 'Volpone' ('The Sly Fox') is a comedy play by English playwright Ben Jonson first produced in 1605-06, drawing on elements of city comedy and beast fable. A merciless satire of greed and lust, 'Volpone' is recognised as one of Jonson’s major works.

Name: Bleaching - Decolore - دکلره
Ivanov - ایوانف
Story Line: In this modern retelling of Anton Chekhov's 'Ivanov,' the eponymous character's loss of appetite for life is portrayed through his attachment to his mp3 player and headphones. However, while making such innovative changes, this adaptation maintains all the drama and social  insight of the original tale of love, debt, and despondency. As Ivanov attempts to flee from his ill wife and falls in love with the younger Sasha, Chekhov's classic is brought to life with a thoroughly entertaining and thought-provoking flair.

Name: Revelation on a Silent Party - Mokashefe Dar Babe Yek Mehmaniye Khamoush - مکاشفه در باب یک مهمانی خاموش
Story Line:
This surreal piece opens with a group of actors eerily lit on stage. With innovative use of torchlight and cigarette smoke, the actors create a sinister beginning to their story. Comedic scenes of a TV chef creating more mess than any edible meal, are contrasted against upsetting scenes of death and war projected onto the back of the stage. Interspersed with black and white interview footage, director Reza Hadad, creates a multi-layered and passionate piece of theater. 'Revelation On A Silent Party' is a thought provoking creation, showcasing the talents of this dynamic cast.

Synopsis on IMVBox.com

Name: Gronholm Method - Systeme Gronholm - سیستم گرون هلم
Story Line: Based on real events, 'The Gronholm Method' depicts real events surrounding the problem of the contemporary job market. Four candidates apply for the same role, and the audience watches as they gradually come undone in their final round of interviews. The interviewers have opted to use the titular Gronholm Method, an unconventional style of questioning that uncovers weaknesses, secrets, and personal problems. What hidden truths will be unearthed? This in-depth exploration of employment issues by Jordi Gelaceran is a must-see for anyone interested in modern Iran.
Director: Alireza Kooshk Jalali ( علیرضا کوشک جلالی )

Name: Leatherface - Poozeye Charmi - پوزه چرمی
Story Line: Cologne-based Iranian director Alireza Kushk-Jalili heads this production of the German playwright Helmut Krausser's "Leatherface," a study of troubled relationships in the modern world. Dark and brooding, themes such as loneliness and coldness within partnerships abound. War is also touched upon, and the play shows how efforts to change the world through violent means are ultimately fruitless. Starring Bahar Katuzi and Mohammad Valizadegan, this atmospheric production is unmissable.

Name: The Past Continuous - Mazi Estemrari - ماضی استمراری
Story Line: A theatrical take on tradition in the face of modernity, this play examines attitudes towards constructions taking place in Tehran by the Municipality. Is there space for traditional values in the 21st century, or are the two opposing ideas doomed to clash for all eternity? The play was nominated for the best script and the best actress awards at the Fajr Theatre Festival.

Name: Death of a Salesman - Marge Forooshandeh - مرگ فروشنده
Story Line: A seasoned salesman is beginning to suffer with memory loss and episodes of confusion. His wife appeals to his boss and he is moved closer to home. He begins to reflect on his life. Disappointed that his sons have not yet made successes of their respective lives, he argues with them and painful memories resurface. Directors Nader Borhani and Sina Pakdel bring us this Iranian re-imagining of Arthur Miller's Pulitzer Prize-winning classic.

Name: East is East - Shargh, Shargh Ast - شرق، شرق است
Story Line: This amusing comedy is centered around a family full of eccentric characters. Set in the family home we are shown a glimpse into their everyday lives. 'East is East' opens with a young boy playing with a soccer ball. Acting as our narrator, he guides us between scenes of his father at work, his mother at home with her hair in curlers watching soccer on their TV and the adventures of his listless siblings. Directors Masoud Rayegan and Arvand Dashtaray do not fail to charm their audience with this energetic and entertaining performance.

Name: Letters to the Fever - Namehaee Be Tab - نامه هایی به تب
Story Line: 'Letters to the Fever' is inspired by the Greek myth of Oedipus and Sophocles' play 'Oedipus Rex'. In Greek legend, Oedipus' father and king of Thebes Laius received a strange prophecy warning him not to have a child with his wife Queen Jocasta, otherwise he will be killed by his own son who will also have an incestuous union with his mother Jocasta. Unfortunately, one night while he was drunk, Laius fathered Oedipus with his wife.

Name: The Pillowman - Marde Baleshi - مرد بالشی
Story Line: This Olivier-award winning, 2004 play, by Irish playwright Martin McDonagh, centers around a writer whose violent short stories bring him to the attention of police. The stories, which often feature terrible violence against children, are frighteningly similar to a string of murders that have been perpetrated in the town. The writer and his brother are implicated. An ambitious take on McDonagh's brutal and unforgettable play from directors Mohammad Yaghoubi and Aida Keykhaie.

Name: Thrones Trilogy - Seganeye Ourang - سه گانه اورنگ
Story Line: 'Thrones Triology' broaches the theme of social classes through three different episodes and stories, taking place in different time and presenting people from different classes.

Name: Tintin and the Secret of Moundas Castle - Tan Tan Va Raze Ghasre Moundas - تن تن و راز قصر مونداس
Story Line: Arvand Dashtarai's adaptation of Tintin has been rewritten by Mohammad Charmshir. Tintin is a young reporter who is drawn into dangerous international intrigues in which his quick thinking, bravery and chronic good luck save the day. This comic is one of the most popular of the 20th century Europe. The play, based on the book has been shown in the Iranian Artists Forum and become known worldwide since.

Name: P2 - پی ۲
Story Line: 'P2' is an experimental play loosely based on a story from the ancient poet Ferdowsi's Book of Kings. It references the story of Zahhak, a righteous man until an evil spirit convinces him to kill his father and transforms him into a power-hungry killer. The play puts a unique and visually stunning spin to the tale, with minimalist costume and set design. Futuristic and industrial in appearance,  "P2" brings new dimensions an old theme.

Name: Wound - Kozmak - کوزمک
Story Line: This excellently-shot, touching drama tells the story of an unlikely friendship that occurs between two outcasts from different generations. The elderly captain Ali remains living defiantly on his vessel, despite the lake it resides on having been drained years ago. Then one day he encounters a young runaway named Artan, who seeks escape from a troubled home life. Realising the boy's father is a drunken bully, Ali decides to harbour the young misfit. The pair form a close bond, and together they revamp the boat, and in the process help each other heal old wounds.

Name: Extra - Siahi Lashgar - سیاهی لشگر
Everything is For Sale - Hameh Chiz Baraye Foroush - همه چیز برای فروش
Story Line: Akbar is a simple worker who is living with his brother, Amir. As Amir will soon finish his time in military service, Akbar is trying to find a good job for him in the same place he is working. Finally he persuades his employers to help Amir out, but after Amir attended a football game in a stadium, his eyes are severely injured, when one cracker hits his face. Akbar sells everything he has for his little brother's treatment, but that is not enough. He is obliged to start a journey into ruthlessness to bring Amir back to life...

Name: Honey Loan - Vame Asal -  وام عسل
Actor: Mehdi Amini Khah ( مهدی امينی خواه )

Name: Haj Kazem - حاج کاظم
Story Line: Masoud Najafi's documentary film 'Haj Kazem' is about war veterans and post war trauma.

Name: You Are a Big Question to Me - To Yek Alamate Soal Bozorgi - تو یک علامت سوال بزرگی
The South Street Pickpocket - Jib Bore Khiyabane Jonoobi - جیب بر خیابان جنوبی
Story Line: A thief comes out of prison and begins searching for his sister. Along the way, he meets another thief, a girl, they work together to gather money, but things don't go well.

Name: Surrounder of Fate - Taslime Sarnevesht - تسلیم سرنوشت
I am a Worker - Man Kargaram - من کارگرم
The Cold Shadows - SayeHaye Sard - سایه‌های سرد
Pomegranate Season - Fasle Anar - فصل انار
Story Line: This beautiful work from Mohsen Sharafinia examines the treatment of those with disabilities in contemporary Iran. Reza, a handicapped young man, joins an activity centre where he finds a connection with his disabled cousin. Smitten, he is keen to marry her as soon as possible, and sets out to seek her grandmother’s consent. Boasting stunning cinematography and nuanced performances, 'Atomic Heart' provides a touching glimpse of a young man’s wish to move forward in life.
Actor: Mah Chehreh Khalili ( ماه چهره خليلي )

Name: Straw Dogs - SagHaye Pooshali - سگ‌های پوشالی
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: The Golden Egg Chicken - Morghe Tokhm Tala - مرغ تخم طلا
Two Hours Later, Mehrabad - Do Saate Bad, Mehrabad - دو ساعت بعد، مهرآباد
Story Line: Sholeh is grieving for the death of her husband Khosro in an airplane crash. When she finds the picture of a woman in Khosroâ€™s stuff, she travels to the south of Iran, where Khosro was a university teacher, in search of the unknown woman.

Name: Six and Eight - Shish O Hasht - شیش و هشت
Specific Audience - Mokhatabe Khas - مخاطب خاص
A Time to Glorify - Zamani Baraye Shekoftan - زمانی برای شکفتن
The Little Sparrow - Gonjeshkake Ashimashi - گنجشکک اشی مشی
Story Line: Episode one (Dead End): The story is about Jalil, a fifteen year- old teenager who has come out of the juvenile detention after three years, but cannot find his mother who is hiding from him. Episode two (Breathe): About a woman that needs to get her daughter left to Sepideh years ago because of the return of her husband from the hospital. Episode three (Hear Me): About Narges, a fifteen year-old girl who is a successful teenager and everyone pays attention to her. But her father wants to force her to marry Alireza and this forced marriage is the end of her hopes and dreams.
Director: Vahid Nikkhah Azad ( وحید نیکخواه آزاد )
Producer: Vahid Nikkhah Azad ( وحید نیکخواه آزاد )
Writer: Vahid Nikkhah Azad ( وحید نیکخواه آزاد )

Name: Once Upon a Time... Love and Betrayal - Roozegari Eshgh O Khiyanat - روزگاری عشق و خیانت
Miser - Khasis - خسیس
Runner - Davandeh - دونده
Peridot Stone - Zebarjad - زبرجد
Director: Seyyed Mojtaba Asadi Pour (سید مجتبی اسدی پور)
Producer: Seyyed Mojtaba Asadi Pour (سید مجتبی اسدی پور)
Actor: Mehdi Amini Khah ( مهدی امينی خواه )

Name: The Corridor - Dehliz - دهلیز
Story Line: When Shiva’s husband Behzad is sent to prison on a manslaughter charge, she does all she can to maintain a sense of normality for herself and her young son, Amir Ali. Amir Ali, a first grader, has never met his father, and, at their social worker’s suggestion, Shiva decides that it is best for Amir Ali to meet Behzad. After initial trepidation, Amir Ali forms a close bond with his father. However, with the threat of execution looming on the horizon, Shiva must scramble ask the victim’s family for forgiveness. A heart-rending tale of a child’s newly discovered affection for his father, this film questions whether forgiveness for death is ever possible.
Actor: Afsaneh Chehreh Azad ( افسانه چهره آزاد )

Name: Annunciation to a Third Milennium Citizen - Besharat Be Yek Shahrvande Hezareye Sevom - بشارت به یک شهروند هزاره سوم
The Wedlock - Zendegi Moshtarake Aghaye Mahmoudi Va Banoo - زندگی مشترک آقای محمودی و بانو
Story Line: Sanaz and her new husband Ramtin, an architect, visit her aunt and uncle to renovate their old home. However, Mohadeseh and Mansoor disapprove of their niece's modern behaviour, and worry about her influence on their teenage daughter. When it is revealed that Sanaz and Ramtin's marriage is only temporary, Sanaz’s stay becomes increasingly strained. Fraught with tension, 'The Wedlock' examines changing attitudes across several generations. Taraneh Alidossti gives a shining performance as the provocative Sanaz in this intriguing drama.
Actor: Peyman Ghassem Khani ( پیمان قاسم خانی )

Name: Fireworks - Atish Bazi - آتیش بازی
With Others - Ba Digaran - با دیگران
Story Line: Arezoo and Amir-Hossein are a couple very much in love. Desperate to have children, but unable to conceive, they persuade one of Arezoo's colleagues, Tahereh, to act as a surrogate. Tahereh's own circumstances are less than desirable; a mother herself, she currently lives with her uncle, as she has no place of her own. Her husband is in prison and Tahereh makes ends meet working as a cleaner. Moved by the couple's request, Tahereh accepts the role of surrogate knowing that the money she will receive will help pay for a place of her own. Complications arise however when her husband is released from prison early and discovers the pregnancy in this powerful, introspective drama.

Name: Room 311 - Otaghe 311 - اتاق ۳۱۱
Story Line: Two medical interns on the verge of failing their course frantically seek an opportunity to prove themselves to their professor. This leads them to attempt to assume control, taking over the welfare of injured patients brought to the hospital - without informing the doctor. Meanwhile, a hapless thief whose every attempt at robbery ends in failure, gets injured while trying to jump over a building. He's coincidently brought to the hospital where the interns work.

Name: Bardou - Ou Khoob Sang Mizanad - او خوب سنگ میزند
Story Line: Bardou is a 16-year-old teenager who has recently lost his father. Living in arid lands along with his sick mother and his younger brother, he tries to convince his mother to leave their home and move to a village where she'll have better medical care. But to do this the family must get back the money his father had lent to his friend Nasir, who lives on the other side of the desert. The young Bardou begins an epic journey into an inhospitable world, in a story of familial love and determination in the face of adversity.

Name: We Are All Alone - Ma Hameh Tanhaeem - ما همه تنهاییم
Story Line: A devastating event brings three estranged friends back together after 15 years. Has all that time affected them drastically as people or are they still able to be as close as they once were? Arash Taghva Shoar's drama is filled with tension and emotional suspense topped with brilliant performances.

Name: Soil And Coral - Khak Va Marjan - خاک و مرجان
Story Line: Ghader, who had lost his wife years ago during the war, returns to Kabul for the wedding of his daughter. When in Kabul, he unwillingly faces an internal conflict.
Producer: Seyed Amir Parvin Hosseini ( سید امیر پروین‌حسینی )

Name: Jordan Street Thieves - Dozdane Khiabane Jordan - دزدان خیابان جردن
Little Big Man - Bozorg Marde Koochak - بزرگ مرد کوچک
Story Line: Showcased at Zanzibar and Tirana International Film Festivals, 'Little Big Man' charts the story of Behnam Mahmoudi who became known as the first teenage martyr in the Iran-Iraq war. When the Iraqi army began to invade Khorramshahr, he, along with people of the city, tried to resist against the Iraqi soldiers.

Name: Fish and Cat - Mahi Va Gorbeh - ماهی و گربه
Story Line: Based on true events 'Fish and Cat' centers around a group of students travelling to the Caspian region in order to participate in a kite-flying event during the Winter solstice. Next to their camp is a small restaurant, run by three cooks, who are just about to leave for a hunt. They are in desperate need of meat. However, there is nothing around, other than the students. Shahram Mokri's second feature combines formal experimentation with terror and a sly sense of humor, perfectly blended in this highly unusual piece of Iranian film history.

Name: No Heaven for Gunga Din - Baraye Gungadin Behesht Nist - برای گونگادین بهشت نیست
Story Line: A documentary detailing the publication of the book 'No Heaven for Gunga Din' and the history of its mysterious author. Written in 1965, translated into six languages, and a UK and US best seller the book describes the journey of 83 British and American officers and their servants on their way to heaven in the year 1984. A surprise hit from an unlikely talent, the film gives us a glimpse of the author's life before the book's release and then the search for the missing writer.

Name: Hush! Girls Don't Scream - Hiss Dokhtarha Faryad Nemizanand - هیس دخترها فریاد نمی زنند
Story Line: Hours before her scheduled marriage, young bride-to-be Shirin murders a man. The crime is completely unexpected and goes against everything we know of her. We learn that Shirin has had two unsuccessful marriage attempts, and is deeply psychologically troubled. But as the dark secrets in her past are slowly revealed, exposing a childhood of neglect, abuse, and the tragic history of two previous failed marriages, the characters must face their own battles with justice, retribution and morality.

Name: The Shallow Yellow Sky - Asemane Zarde Kam Omgh - آسمان زرد کم عمق
Story Line: This film tells the story of young couple Ghazal and Mehran whose relationship becomes intensely complicated after Ghazal suffers a mental breakdown caused by the death of her family in a car crash. No longer able to appreciate beauty, and constantly apprehensive of the world around her, Ghazal seeks to preserve a sense of her life before the crash, and in doing so remembers the old poem 'The Shallow Yellow Sky'. As she explores its layers of beauty, the poem intertwines with the narrative and draws stunning parallels between nature and the couple’s failing relationship. An enthralling and mysterious drama about absent beauty and the search for forgotten meaning.

Name: The Painting Pool - Hoze Naghashi - حوض نقاشی
Story Line: Maryam and Reza are a married couple with severe learning disabilities. When their son's school work starts to surpass their own abilities, he grows frustrated with them, and after a heated argument, runs away from home. Maryam and Reza are left to struggle with work, money and heartbreak in this affecting exploration of love and family that balances its more tragic moments with warmth and humour. Charming, devastating and unique, 'The Painting Pool' manages to treat a subject often neglected by mainstream cinema with honesty and compassion, and won multiple awards at the Fajr Film Festival.

Name: The Queen - Malakeh - ملکه
Story Line: This thrilling film takes place during the Iran-Iraq war, and questions the idea of what it means to follow the righteous path. Scout Siavash endeavours to reveal the geographical coordinates of Iraqi soldier ambushes, in the hope of giving the Iranian army an advantage over the enemy. Meanwhile, he is confronted with the soul of a deceased scout (Mostafa Zamani) who worked on the same task. Siavash engages in an internal struggle as he is contemplates the morals of killing innocent people just because they are labelled as the enemy. A refreshing perspective on the Iran-Iraq war.
Director: Mohammad Ali Ahangar ( محمدعلی باشه آهنگر )
Writer: Mohammad Ali Ahangar ( محمدعلی باشه آهنگر )

Name: Paat - پات
Story Line: A dog, a big city, two men, three women, one great adventure. The light and shadows of human society is beautifully captured through the eyes of a dog in this episodic narrative. After his master dies, faithful canine companion Paat goes on the run in Tehran, a city where dogs are illegal. Prone to following any person who seems friendly, Paat ends up in the company of successive troubled souls. As he interacts with them, we are granted access to private slices of modern life, seen from an ankle-eye perspective. A singular vision and a minimalistic approach to filming, as well as its adorable four-legged star, cement this film as an entertaining and charming romp.

Name: Do Not Worry Sara - Negaran Nabash Sara - نگران نباش سارا
Story Line: Elaheh and Siavash are filming a wedding tape for their friend Sara, who cannot attend the ceremony. In it, they record testimonials from family and friends congratulating the couple on a perfect match. Through the eyes of the hopeful, impressionable Elaheh, we witness the single event that changes everything, and that may spell disaster for her 'happily-ever-after' ending. 'Do Not Worry Sara' is a creative and intense drama that confronts us with an intimate perspective on life itself, and the way feelings change profoundly without explanation or preparation.

Name: From Iran, A Separation - Az Iran, Yek Jodaie - از ایران یک جدایی
Story Line: In the morning of 27 March 2012, the Iranian movie 'A Separation' won the Oscar Award for the Best Foreign Language Film. For the Iranian people who were impatiently glued to their TV screens, this was more than a cinematic award. When sanctions and threats of war with Iran covered the world headlines, Asghar Farhadi talked about Iran's love for peace and the rich culture of the Iranians when he went on the stage to receive his award. This time the Iranians felt that their voice was heard through someone other than the government officials. This documentary depicts the importance and the difference of receiving an Oscar award for 'A Separation' for the Iranians and has a general view on Iran's society of today. The documentary is narrated with an ironic language and uses animation in some parts.

Name: Nowhere, Nobody - Hich Koja, Hich Kas - هیچ کجا هیچ کس
Story Line: When a down-and-out couple, Mehran and Marjan, plan the audacious robbery of a jewellery store, it seems like it will be an easy score. That is, until they involve their friends Davood and Yalda. Davood is completely penniless, having married Yalda in secret, and together they hope to raise enough money to flee the country and escape her disapproving father. But a larger crew means a smaller share, and the friends soon find themselves divided by greed and betrayal. As the situation escalates, the would-be robbers find themselves in more danger than they ever anticipated, where the greatest threat could be the very people they trust the most.
Actor: Afsaneh Chehreh Azad ( افسانه چهره آزاد )

Name: Broad Daylight - Rooze Roshan - روز روشن
Story Line: Kindergarten teacher Roshan finds herself in a quandary when she embarks on a quest to save the life of her student's father, who has been accused of unintentional homicide and faces the death penalty. There are witnesses to support him, however it soon becomes clear that they are afraid to comply because of the victim's powerful family's influence, and they are terrified of repercussions in their own lives. Roshan doggedly sticks to her goal in this tale of one woman against a corrupt judicial system. Winner of the Crystal Phoenix at the 31st Fajr Film Festival, this drama is not to be missed.
Actor: Amir Reza Delavari ( امیر رضا دلاوری )

Name: The Sealed Secret - Sar Be Mohr - سر به مهر
Story Line: Leila Hatemi stars as Saba, a young woman who has an anonymous web blog in which she discloses the various day-to-day battles she faces. Contrasting her shy and insecure nature in person, Saba bears all on her blog, giving us an idea of her true nature that she hides from the world. Fortunately, with the help of her friends, family and a new love interest, she just might come out of her shell. A stunning representation of the fighting spirit of a lonely girl who gradually overcomes her problems through the support of the people around her and her belief in God.

Name: Nazanin - نازنین
Story Line: When the unassuming Mansour loses his factory job, he heads to Tehran on the promise of gainful employment working for his friend Eskandar. Upon arriving in the unfamiliar city with no sign of Eskandar, Mansour meets quarreling siblings Nader and Nazanin, who befriend him. As he learns more about their private lives, he becomes inextricably drawn into the murky world of drug peddling, where crossing the wrong person could mean losing more than just his employment...

Name: The Invisible Rooms - Otaghak Haye Namarei - اتاقکهای نامریی
Story Line: As a young couple moves into a building ready to start their marriage, another couple is divorcing and moving out, through the process of moving both couples confront the issues that are facing them.

Name: Actors Studio - Kelase Honarpishegi - کلاس هنرپیشگی
Story Line: An intriguing observation of a large family constantly fighting over their internal politics - lust for money, power and relationships perpetuate their loves amongst the fictitious environments of an actors studio. Borrowing elements from a wide spectrum of media - from documentary to reality television - the film offers a thought-provoking story complimented by an original concept. The director interacts with the actors, which triggers a collection of engaging scenes. The story remains exceptionally thrilling throughout, as the audience gets to watch a live performance from backstage.

Name: Sensitive Floor - Tabagheye Hasas - طبقه حساس
Story Line: 'Sensitive Floor' touches greatness with its unusual yet amusing story of grief, jealousy and neglect. When his wife tragically dies, Haj Kamali, more concerned with his own reputation than his family's grief, organises an exuberant but hasty memorial service to commemorate the woman he always neglected. Returning from China after the funeral, Kamali is horrified to discover that in his absence, another man was buried in his wife's two-storey grave. Overcome with jealousy and determined to avoid the disgrace this will bring, Kamali decides to set things right by removing the dead man and reclaiming his wife.
Actor: Peyman Ghassem Khani ( پیمان قاسم خانی )
Writer: Peyman Ghassem Khani ( پیمان قاسم خانی )

Name: Mastaneh - مستانه
Story Line: A stark criticism of the Iranian justice system, Farahbakhsh's film focuses on Mastaneh, an established actress and national star. When she is sexually assaulted by the corrupt Jaami, her sister's piano teacher, Mastaneh appeals to the courts for justice and a fair trial. Already traumatized by Jaami's attack, she receives another shock when the system decides to punish her instead. Sahar Dolatshahi gives a powerful performance as a woman struggling for justice in this unsettling examination of the treatment of women in the legal system.

Name: Good to Be Back - Che Khoobe Ke Bargashti - چه خوبه که برگشتی
Story Line: Dentist Farzad has returned to Iran after many years abroad to escape his anxieties and daily stresses. Farzad is delighted to be reunited with his old friend, Kambiz, who has been his seaside neighbor for years. However, the appearance of a mysterious object scuppers any hopes of a straightforward homecoming. When a doctor, Yasamin, gets dragged into the story, Farzad and Kambiz find their friendship threatened. A tale of chaos and the nostalgia of home, this comedy offers superb performances from its leads.

Name: Objects In Mirror Are Closer Than They Appear - Ashya az Anche dar Ayne Mibinid be Shoma Nazdiktarand - اشیاء از آنچه در آیینه میبینید به شما نزدیکترند
Story Line: An intimate drama following the story of Leila, a wife and mother. Expecting her third child and living in a small apartment in Tehran, she divides her time cooking, cleaning and caring for her children. After breaking a plate following a party with neighbors, Leila must search the city to find a replacement and save face with her family. This character study steadily reveals the hopes and desires of a woman unable to achieve her true potential within the confines of her impoverished background.

Name: Trapped - Darband - دربند
Story Line: This fascinating moral thriller is centered on the bristling relationship between two very different young women in contemporary Tehran. Moving to the city for her studies and desperate for a place to live, the quiet, scholarly Nazanin (Nazanin Bayati) rents a room from vivacious shop girl Sahar (Pegah Ahangarani). The two become unlikely companions as Sahar coerces Nazanin into joining her circle of friends. But when Sahar ends up in trouble, Nazanin is drawn into a complex web of debt and deception that surrounds her roommate. With pitch-perfect performances by the two female leads, 'Trapped' draws an intelligent portrait of the subtleties of inter-personal power dynamics.

Name: The Rule of Accident - Ghaede Tasadof - قاعده تصادف
Story Line: A group of young theater students rehearse for a play they will perform at an upcoming festival. As their individual personal issues arise, a new group dynamic develops. With laughter and tears they share their troubles and experiences. Through the strength of their friendship, they learn to overcome their obstacles together. 'The Rule of Accident' is a touching story about another kind of family.

Name: Special Line - Khate Vizheh - خط ویژه
Story Line: A computer science genius ropes his sister into some online hacking. Together they manage to get into the bank account of a big time investor. However, they fail to anticipate the lengths this investor would go to to take back what is rightfully his. A great crime drama that will glue you to your seat.

Name: A Cradle For Mother - Gahvarehie Baraye Madar - گهواره ای برای مادر
Story Line: Completed her degree in Russian Literature at Moscow University, young Narges is studying at a seminary now. She is supposed to go to Russia to teach the students newly converted to Islam, but...
Director: Panah Bar Khoda Rezaei (پناه بر خدا رضایی)
Producer: Panah Bar Khoda Rezaei (پناه بر خدا رضایی)

Name: Tale of Khatereh - Ghessye Khatereh - قصه خاطره
Story Line: Farhad and his wife are trying for a baby without success and Farhad finds himself in the doghouse as a result. His wife sets off on a trip abroad to seek a solution. However, things only become more complicated when Farhad's maid reveals that she is pregnant. When the news reaches Farhad's wife, she is less than thrilled to hear it. A complex drama about a couple’s wish to conceive, this film boasts vibrant cinematography and a compelling narrative.

Name: The Next Morning - Sobhe Roze Baad - صبح روز بعد
Story Line: A woman wakes up to find that no one recognises her, through the course of her day she starts to come to some shocking realisations.

Name: No One Cares About Jungles! - Kasi be Fekre Jangalha Nist! - !کسی به فکر جنگل ها نیست
Story Line: An environmental documentary that focuses on the importance of persevering the forests of Iran.

Name: The Stoppage Dam
Story Line: This short documentary follows villagers as they try and battle against the construction of a dam that could threaten their land, livelihoods and lives.

Name: Impression Xps160
Story Line: A post-apocalyptic tale of a blind photographer who lives in a dark room.

Name: The 17s - Hefdah Saleha - ۱۷ ساله ها
Story Line: 'The 17s' is a vibrant and edgy documentary film following the lives of four ebullient and endearing teenagers in contemporary Iran. We are introduced to theater lover Shayan, who lives with his uncle following his parents' divorce, Mehrnaz, a girl in his theater class, party animal Amir Reza, and the introspective Romina, whose mother is suffering from illness. During a year and under the supervision of the filmmakers, the teenagers film themselves and share with the camera and us a little bit of their lives. The result makes for mesmerizing, addictive viewing; the youngsters views on life and society are often insightful, and at times, painfully poignant. A must see.

Name: The Last Migration - Akharin Kooch - آخرین کوچ
Story Line: 'The Last Migration' documents an unspeakable tragedy that affected two nomadic tribes in Iran. When a man fatally shoots his son-in-law, the groom's aunt and her one-year-old son while firing his gun during the celebrations, the groom's relatives' susicicions are alerted. Although this is often seen in ceremonies, the intactness of the bride's relatives causes concern among the groom's relatives, who belong to a different tribe. While each side contemplates the incident, the film captures nomadic life on camera and discusses customs, law and the place of guns in tradition.

Name: The Lesson - Dars - درس
Story Line: This film consists of a single shot of a classroom as it undergoes a tumultuous period of history, during the Iran-Iraq war. The Iranian army are shown using the room as a staging area, preparing for the Iraqi invasion. Students are taught lessons on how to operate a Kalashnikov rifle rather than the normal education they may have hoped for. From here, the ebb and flow of the Iranian-Iraqi war is shown, as the classroom changes hands and, eventually, is left desolate. But will the sound of the laughter of children ever return to the classroom?

Name: God Doesn't Make a Mistake - Khoda Eshtebah Nemikonad - خدا اشتباه نمی کند
Story Line: Behroov Nouranipoor's documentary explores the role Islamic faith plays in the life of one family after a highly specific death. Told from the perspective of Aylar, whose father Atly was killed by a camel in controversial circumstances, the film unfolds the events which lead to his death and the repercussions it has for Aylar and her family. In wake of her loss, the young girl struggles innocently to understand her father’s actions and the way they are interpreted through Islamic scripture.

Name: The Poets of the Constitution - Shaerane Mashrooteh - شاعران مشروطه
Story Line: This enlightening documentary provides a comprehensive history of the nation's rise to modernity through individuals' efforts to bring poetry and scholarly works to wider audiences against the backdrop of the Constitutional Revolution. Revolutionary Mirza Jahangir Khan Shirazi's decision to publish the independent weekly newspaper, Sure Esrafil, for example, brought a voice to the common people for the first time. We follow the progress of the Revolution, and how corruption, despotism, and dependency were exposed through the tools of learning. A fascinating exploration of the importance of literature and freedom of speech.

Name: Roshanak - روشنک
Story Line:
Roshanak and Masoud love each other, but Roshanak's father who is in prison is against their marriage. By committing a pity crime, Masoud goes to prison to get Roshanak's father's blessing. 
Synopsis by IMVBox.

Name: I'm Sleepy - Khabam Miad - خوابم می‌آد
Story Line: Reza is a simple and hardworking teacher that is middle aged and has problems connecting with people. He meets a girl who sells gummy candies. This girl has problems with her sister’s kidney transplant and gets Reza to do things that he is not comfortable with...

Name: A Simple Love Story - Yek Asheghaneye Sadeh - یک عاشقانه ساده
Story Line: A simple village girl, Gandom, has been secretly in love with Ali, but no one knows about it in the village. Though it could lead to a scandal in a rural setting where the elders decide about the future of their children, Ali and Gandom are determined to keep their love alive.

Name: I am His Wife - Man Hamsarash Hastam -من همسرش هستم
Story Line: Life of a young couple gets into serious problems after an accident, leading them to distrust and betrayal.

Name: The Guidance Patrol - Gashte Ershad - گشت ارشاد
Story Line: The movie 'The Guidance Patrol' is the story of three young southern city to earn money, to something dangerous attack. Guidance was also the story to police related issues .

Name: Lover's Turn - Piche Oshagh - پیچ عشاق
Bulletproof - Zede Golooleh - ضد گلوله
Story Line: The 1980's. It's in the middle of Iran - Iraq war. There is a fifty-year-old man involved in the black market of Tehran-Gelesian music and video films. Finding out that he has got at most a couple of months to live, as there's a tumour in his head, he decides to go to a different way.

Name: Operation Kindergarten - Amaliyate Mahde Koodak - عملیات مهد کودک
Story Line: Some children decide to keep their parents at home with the assistance of an angel so they can play with them.
Actor: Hesam Navab Safavi ( سید حسام نواب‌صفوی )

Name: Mashdi Mamdali's Car - Mashine Mashdi Mamdali - ماشین مشدی ممدلی
And Now, Heaven - Va Inak Behesht - و اینک بهشت
These Women - In Zanha - این زن‌ها
The Beggars of Tehran - Gedayane Tehran - گدایان تهران
Story Line: When he finds himself fallen on hard times, Aslan (Mehran Ghafoorian) moves to Tehran to find a job to provide for his family and settle his outstanding debts. However, a temporary solution begins to turn into a lifestyle as he falls in with a group of beggars. Ali Sadeghi stars in this light-hearted comedy.

Name: The Golden Collars - Ghaladehaye Tala - قلاده های طلا
Story Line: As part of a conspiracy orchestrated by the British intelligence service, a group of Iranian expatriates recruited mainly from Mojahedin-e-Khalq organization plan to instigate riots in the aftermath of 2009 Iran presidential elections.

Name: The Greyish Morning - Sobhe Khakestar - صبح خاکستر
The President's Cell Phone - Telefone Hamrahe Raiesjomhour - تلفن همراه رئیس جمهور
Story Line: An old man who is a simple worker decides that he wants to buy a cell phone. He goes to buy some second hand ones but by accident the president's used cell phone is the one which he buys.
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: 33% Neil Simon - 33% Nil simon - سی و سه درصد نیل سایمون
Scandal - Rosvaei - رسوایی
Story Line: Afsaneh is a poor girl who because of many debts of her father has stole her father's demand notes and escaped. She then meets a pious clergy who decides to help her but this is only the beginning of the problems.

Name: Back Door - Mianbor - میان‌بر
Setareh - ستاره
Saturday's Hunter - Shekarchie Shanbe - شکارچی شنبه
Story Line: The film's plot focuses on a boy and his grandfather, who execute Arab civilians in order to steal their land.

Name: The Moon Face - Maah Jabeen - ماه جبین
Actor: Ateneh Faghih Nasiri ( آتنه فقیه نصیری‎‎ )
Afarin Obeisi ( آفرین عبیسی - صغري عبيسی )

Name: Totol and the Chest Secret - Totol O Raze Sandoghcheh - تتل و راز صندوقچه
Story Line: Totol opens the chest without his grandfather’s permission in order to learn its secret but can’t answer the chest’s questions and Mr. Wolf learns the hidden location of the goats. Totol begins a long journey in order to find his mother and save the goats.

Name: Hotchpotch - Shir To Shir - شیر تو شیر
Story Line: A mother dies giving birth to a baby. Responsible of taking care of the newborn child singlehandedly, the father faces so many problems as the baby does not want to be bottle-fed. The problem continues even when heâ€™s grown up...

Name: Be Half a Kilo But Be a Man - Nim Kiloo Bash Mard Bash - نیم کیلو باش مرد باش
Mr. Trivial - Aghaye Naghabel - آقای ناقابل
Actor: Mehdi Amini Khah ( مهدی امينی خواه )

Name: Pool - Estakhr - استخر
Everything is Calm - Hameh Chi Aroomeh - همه چی آرومه
Story Line: A young man who is due to be married is taken out by three friends on his last night of freedom in a true The Hangover style bachelor party. After eating some strange food things take a surreal turn for the four. They wake up in luxurious surroundings far removed from their daily life and discover that they are fabulously wealthy. Just as the friends grow accustomed to their new dream lives, a visit from Ebi's in-laws threatens to bring them back down to Earth. Majid Salehi leads this raucous comedy.
