Actor: Mohsen Ghazi Moradi ( محسن قاضی مرادی )
Writer: Mohammad Reza Arian ( محمد رضا ارين )

Name: Parole - Azadiye Mashroot - آزادی مشروط
The Cheque - Chek - چک
Story Line: Despite their different characters and beliefs, four people are obliged to spend two nights and one whole day together as they are going to have their shares after cashing a cheque. Although they contradict each other in very possible way, each of them has to respect the others for at least thirty hours. But there is something else going on: everyone is looking for a way to take the whole money!

Name: Love Again - Dobare Asheghi - دوباره عاشقی
Golden Diet - Rejime Talai - رژیم طلایی
Story Line: When Pari and Mehdi are not able to have children, Mehdi's mother suggests Mehdi has a second marriage. This pushes Pari to seek revenge by requesting her promised dowry, which is supposed to be equal to the combined weight of her and her husband. This triggers a constant wave of strange, funny and twisted events, such as the hilariously unappealing sight of Mehdi gobbling everything in sight in order to increase her weight. A quirky, unforgettable comedic drama.

Name: Men of the Earth - Mardane Zamin - مردان زمین
Back Alleys of Shemroon - Pas Koocheh haye Shemroon - پس کوچه های شمرون
Story Line: Amir is a young, promising musician who is about to release his first CD. His success however is overshadowed by the events of his personal life, his marriage on the brink of collapse. As Amir's infidelity is revealed, the estranged young couple goes through a series of events and misadventures that reveal well-hidden secrets, but life, whether cinematic or real, is always full of surprises.
Actor: Hadis Chehre Pardaz ( حدیث چهره پرداز )

Name: Here is The End of The World - Inja Akhare Donyast -  اینجا آخر دنیاست
Story Line: In this dramatic horror, we join student Golrokh, who is devastated by the death of her brother Said. Determined to see him once more, Golrokh enrols in a spirit society. Little does she know that contact with spirits is more than one-sided - she soon discovers that ghosts are just as eager to contact her. In time, Golrokh finds herself the constant target of ghostly encounters. A trip north culminates in a series of mysterious deaths. Clever camera angles and quality performances build suspense in this unusual film.

Name: The Freeway - Azad Raah - آزاد راه
Story Line: Salman, a clergyman in education, is making plans to get married with his fiancé. Everything turns upside down when the couple is attacked on the street and Salman’s future brother-in-law gets involved. Now torn between his hopes for the future and his devotion to God, Salman faces an ethical dilemma. Which path should a man walk when forced to choose between love and faith?

Name: The Orange Suit - Narenji Poosh - نارنجی پوش
Story Line: Hamed Aban, a professional magazine photographer, is suddenly affected by a book on Feng Shui and becomes profoundly interested in environment cleanliness and protection. He goes as far as getting employed by the city council, wearing an orange uniform and becoming famous for his hygienic prowess. As Hamed's credit and fame start having an effect on his personal life, he begins to face severe emotional issues which change his outlook. A unique comedy from acclaimed director Dariush Mehrjui  that should not to be missed.

Name: The Wooden Bridge - Pole Choobi - پل چوبی
Story Line: Wooden Bridge was a passage over the northern trench of old Tehran, connecting the capital to the countryside of Shemiran. A connection between old Tehran and modern Tehran.

Name: Metro Images - Negarehaye Metro - نگاره های مترو
Story Line: This ambient glimpse of life in Tehran's underground stations offers an alternative way to view the capital. Directed by Jamshid Raoufi, this short film conveys a sense of what it means to be a citizen in contemporary Iran. Beautiful murals and bustling crowds combine to create a unified serenity in this fascinating study. Excitement and malaise in turn are both found in the faces of commuters, young and old alike.

Name: Days of Life - Roozhaye Zendegi - روزهای زندگی
Story Line: When the resolution is accepted for ceasefire between Iran and Iraq, the inhabitants of a Mobile Army Surgical Hospital are confronted by a sudden attack by the Iraqi army. A physician couple frantically try to save the lives of the many injured people sprawled around the increasingly bloody hospital. An intense drama from director Parviz Sheikh Tadi.
Editor: Varouzh Karim Masihi ( واروژ کریم مسیحی )

Name: For No Reason - Bikhod va Bi Jahat - بی خود و بی جهت
Story Line: Farhad and Elaheh are moving into a new house to start their married life. Arriving with all their worldly possessions stacked in boxes, they are surprised to find  the former residents still in the house. Trying to negotiate around the other couple as they move their things in, Farhad and Elaheh find themselves unwittingly caught up in a wedding ceremony that is being hosted at the house that very night. Zany family comedy from Abdolreza Kahani.

Name: One Line of Reality - Yek Satr Vagheiat - یک سطر واقعیت
Story Line: Kasra, a film journalist, and his wife face the collapse of their publication due to political, financial and legal troubles. In despair that their once-flourishing office is now little more than a store room, the couple seek a way to save their business. Their luck seems to change when a generous offer is made by the mysterious legal department head of a Swedish company. Worried about the repercussions of receiving foreign aid, the couple prepares to travel abroad to collect the funds. An intimate portrait of how social change affects the lives of even those who eschew politics. This suspenseful drama is a touching look at a couple’s determination to save their livelihood.

Name: At the End of 8th Street - Entehaye Khiyabane Hashtom - انتهای خیابان هشتم
Story Line: Gripping race-against-time drama which pulsates with tension from start to finish. Desperate to save the life of her brother Saeed, Niloofar must pay 100 million Tomans in three days. So with the help of her husband Bahram and friend Mousa, she struggles frantically against the odds to raise the money. But with time running out, and prepared to do anything to keep Saeed alive, the lives of Niloofar, Bahram and Mousa may be torn apart by their own actions before they’re finished.

Name: The Last Step - Pele Akher - پله آخر
Story Line: We focus on the story of Leili, a successful actress in the aftermath of the death of her husband, Khosrow. Khosrow is still very much alive to her, and returns to her in key moments of her life. Khosrow's narration, seemingly from beyond the grave, introduces a new perspective on the process of mourning in this beautifully shot drama with a strong cast.
Editor: Fardin Saheb Zamani ( فردین صاحب زمانی )

Name: Kissing The Moonlike Face - Boosidane Roye Mah - بوسيدن روي ماه
Story Line: Foroogh and Ehteram are two old ladies with a close bond and a shared sense of loss. While they have been neighbors for more than 40 years, both their sons were also declared missing in action over 20 years ago. When Etheram is suddenly given the news that parts of her son's body have been found, she feels relief at finally knowing the truth. Yet she wants the same relief for Foroogh, who is struggling with a serious condition and has only a few months left to live. In a unique story of persistence, love and loss, Etheram sets out to make the authorities tell Foroogh that the body parts belong to her own son. But can Etheram find peace of mind for her dear friend after her 20 year wait?

Name: Bright Shadows - Sayehaye Roshan - سایه های روشن
Story Line: Farhad Saremi makes a successful living as a movie actor. One day, however, his heart gives out on set and he realises that he must cut down on his roles in order to recuperate. Fearing a relapse, Farhad makes the decision to travel to his wife's hometown to fulfil an old promise. Once in the village, however, he is confronted by some unusual events. As we follow Farhad on his journey, we learn more about his past in this ponderous tale of discovery.

Name: Laboratory - Azmayeshgah - آزمایشگاه
Story Line: Comedy chaos and misunderstandings aplenty develop in this heart-warming film which follows the misadventures of Champion, a socially awkward genius who works in a hospital lab. Dealing with his own slapstick clumsiness amidst the many colorful characters of the hospital, Champion searches for love and tries to become a success. But our likeable hero must first avoid the ploys of an old rival if he is to earn respect at the workplace and gain the attention he wants from Miss Pakzad. Filled with laughs from start to finish.

Name: Rose's Charm - Afsoone Gole Sorkh - افسون گل سرخ
Story Line: Shirin is a strong, independent young woman whose parents are on the brink of divorce. She isn't too affected by their decision, however she is concerned about her ailing sister. Sometimes we all need an escape, and for Shirin that means starting anew. Faced with repeating difficulties in her life, Shirin has a difficult choice to make: whether to stay and face them as they come or whether to migrate and for the first time enjoy her latent freedom.

Name: Modest Reception - Paziraei Sadeh - پذیرایی ساده
Story Line: It is clear from this film's explosive opening sequence that there is more to Leila and Kaveh than meets the eye. Armed with sacks of banknotes, the pair are on a mission to donate millions to the needy of rural Iran - whether the targets of their philanthropy want the money or not. The couple's ambiguous relationship shrouds them in mystery, and as we follow them on their quest, it becomes clear that Kaveh's increasingly sadistic nature threatens to overwhelm their good deeds. There are subtle nods to Tarantino’s dark humour in this gripping drama, which questions the very nature of charity itself.

Name: 33 Days - 33 Rooz - سی و سه روز
Story Line: It is 2006, and a small village on the border of Lebanon and occupied Palestine is about to find itself at the heart of a brutal conflict. As young couple Yousef and Nasrine prepare for their wedding, an attack by Israeli forces turns the happy occasion into a ceremony of mourning. Separated from her new husband as the fighting intensifies, Nasrine finds herself sheltering from the bombing in an underground tunnel, while Yousef, their friend Mohammad and a number of other fighting men prepare to defend their village from the enemy incursions...

Name: Ekbatan - اکباتان
Story Line: Absorbing social street drama by Mehrshad Karkhani, which is freely adapted from the 1971 Jalal Moghadam film "Escape from the Trap." When Alborz gets out of prison, he goes off in search of a peaceful life in the city. Yet living within the high walls of the Ekbatan Apartment Complex in West Tehran, he can’t seem to find it. Soon enough he finds himself caught up in new criminal activities, and must face a deadly situation before he can be free of them.

Name: The 7th - Haftom - هفتم
Story Line: On a girl's 7th birthday, her father is coming after a long absence to take her away from her mother.

Name: A Fugitive from Bagboo - Yek Farari az Bagboo - یک فراری از بگبو
Story Line: Unhappy with life on his home planet, an extra-terrestrial comes to Earth with hopes of a more fulfilling existence. Through a series of compromising situations and wacky events, he discovers new love and friendship. Heart-warming comedy starring Ali Sadeghi.

Name: Purple Clouds - Abrhaye Arghavani - ابرهای ارغوانی
Story Line: Physician Reza has been in prison for six months for a crime he did not commit, which resulted in the death of his brother in law. One day, he is granted a chance to prove his innocence through a mysterious guarantor. Reza has one week to gather evidence that can ensure his freedom. With steely determination, he tracks down childhood friends Shahram and Fahrad, whom he holds responsible for his incarceration. This dramatic thriller tells a satisfying tale of redemption, and one man’s attempt to reconnect to his old life.
Editor: Varouzh Karim Masihi ( واروژ کریم مسیحی )

Name: Robot - Robit - روبیت
Story Line: In the pursuit of international fame and fortune, two hardware engineers succeed in developing a technologically advanced robot with high levels of artificial intelligence. Overjoyed with their achievement, they initially resist the suggestion of their broker to put the machine to other uses, but as the prospects become increasingly enticing, the scientists find their resolve start to crack. A thought-provoking drama about the limits of technology and the reach of man exceeding his grasp.

Name: National Alley - Kooche Meli - کوچه ملی
Story Line: 'National Alley' focuses on a son's agonised efforts to help his mother, Touran, recover from an illness that left her in a vegetative state. When he gets hold of an old photograph that portrays his mother with another man, Mansour, he teams up with Mansour's niece and tries to track him down. The couple travels around the city and visits the old cinemas where Mansour used to work, for the audience to take a quick glance at the history of Iranian Cinema.

Name: The Snow on the Pines - Barf Rooye Kajha - برف روی کاج‌ها
Story Line: Romantic drama following piano teacher Roya and her relationships both old and new. Roya teaches her students from her marital home which leads to distressing circumstances. A new man enters her life and a strong bond is formed as they share a passion for music. As this relationship begins to develop, Roya is confronted with a painful dilemma.

Name: Roots in the Sky - Rishe Dar Asman - ریشه در آسمان
Story Line: A team of scientists conduct research on rice genetics and wishes to develop an agriculture department at the university they work for. The academic administrators have suspicions and are unwilling to approve a project that makes team members feel uneasy. All of this takes place whilst the lines between memory and reality become increasingly blurred. A car accident the team leader witnessed in the past pierces this perplexing story enough times to unravel it.

Name: Africa - Afrigha - آفريقا
Story Line: Three young hoods, eager to make a quick buck, find themselves saddled with Shirin, the sister of a drug smuggler from their criminal organisation. As they puzzle over how to handle their hostage, the three must confront their personal demons. Bumbling Shahram finds himself caught between the volatile Kasra and recovering addict Shahab, who Kasra blames for his brother’s paralysis. Meanwhile, Shahab begins to develop feelings for Shirin. A successful combination of action-packed adrenaline and intense drama.

Name: Private Life - Zendegi Khosoosi - زندگی خصوصی
Story Line: Intense thriller following a religious newspaper editor who is faced with temptation. When Ibrahim (Farhad Aslani) meets a young writer who is seemingly interested in a job, things quickly take a turn. A gripping story of paranoia and obsession then ensues, culminating in the most unexpected of climaxes.

Name: Because of Pooneh - Be Khatere Pooneh - به خاطر پونه
Story Line: Majid and his wife Pooneh run into a crisis because of Majid's severe drug addiction. In order to save their marriage, Majid decides to check into a rehab camp. However, his resolve does not last long, and he soon harbours plans of escape. When he eventually returns home, he encounters a scene that arouses suspicion about Pooneh's fidelity to their marriage. The conflict between Majid and Pooneh soon accumulates to unbearable levels. A poignant look at how addiction can destroy marriage, this film boasts strong performances from its leads.

Name: Ziba and I - Man va Ziba - من و زیبا
Story Line: Although Mousa is an outcast in his village, he holds the important community position of caring for a sacred horse that is at the centre of an annual ritual. When Mousa starts suffering from a recurring dream in which he dies every night, his son consults the village imam and council of elders to help save him from his torment. Although they refuse, Mousa begins to find comfort in a young village girl named Ziba. As the time of the ceremony approaches, the two strike up a touching relationship that will change them both and lead towards a climax which affects the whole village.

Name: Gamberon Port - Bandare Gamberoon - بندر گمبرون
Story Line: Non-linear stories are interwoven with interconnecting tales in and around the port town of Bandar Abbas, as mystery and tension builds to a bloody conclusion.

Name: In the Cold Silence of the Winter - Dar Sokoote Sarde Zemestan - در سکوت سرد زمستان
The Neighbours - Hamsayeha - همسایه ها
Story Line: A couple decide to invite a group of neighbours in their apartment building over for lunch, along with their children. What starts out as a pleasant afternoon, soon turns vicious when an argument between the neighbours erupts as a result of a disagreement. The film slowly builds up tension, as their discussion escalates and it results in one final aggressive confrontation.

Name: Burnt City - Shahre Sukhteh - شهر سوخته
Story Line: Soudabeh Moradian's short documentary is an experimental collage of different footage interspersed with fascinating facts about a Bronze Age ruins called Burnt City. Wonderful shots of the archaeological site, located in the southeastern part of Iran, capture the raw beauty of the ruins. However, cutting back and forth between images of this once significant urban settlement and footage of modern day Los Angeles, the film is much more than a simple image of Burnt City. Through image and sound editing, it creates an internal poetic journey into city atmospheres of past and present.

Name: And Suddenly You Went Missing - Nagahan To Gom Shodi - ناگهان تو گم شدی
Story Line: Hozeh Honari's poetic documentary takes us back to 1980, to the town of Khoramshahr. Based on Martyr Behrooz Moradi's notes and report, 'And Suddenly You Went Missing' leads us through the events of the 35-days of resistance of the city, against the attacks from Iraq. Photos come to life in front of your eyes as the narrator shares his personal experiences, all accompanied by original footage and photos of a time when life took on a new meaning. Based on a true story.

Name: Roots in Self - Risheh Dar Khish - ریشه در خویش
Story Line: This remarkable documentary focuses on the lives of Iran's Afghan population, and its trials and tribulations. Mostly made up of refugees fleeing the 1978 Saur Revolution, the community faces problems obtaining citizenship, and as a result, sustainable education and work. We take a look at several Afghans’ fight to survive, as well as listen to their conflicted views on life in Iran. Despite the daily struggle to get by, we learn that many flock to one outlet to escape – poetry. Honest and touching, this is an eye-opening look at Iran from an alternative perspective.

Name: The Builders - Abadgaran - آبادگران
Story Line: When filmmaker Mihandoost is invited by his friend Ali to make a documentary about the Saraye Omid charity project in Orumiyeh,  he simply cannot refuse. A group of civil engineers have donated and supported the project to construct a dormitory with facilities for parents of sick children who accompany them from villages around to a centre of cancer treatment and chemotherapy in Orumiyeh. Some well known actors and filmmakers have also supported this cause.

Name: Dirt Game - Khak Bazi - خاک بازی
Story Line: Shot in black and white, Shahyar Kabiri's visually stimulating short film revolves around themes of love, attraction, betrayal, and death. Cuts back and forth between time frames provide the story of a bored young man who meets a mysterious female stranger with an ominously fractured personality, while philosophical narration gives the film a melancholy and reflective tone.

Name: The Buried - Dafineh - دفینه
Story Line: Childish imagination is contrasted with real-world devastation caused by warfare in this affecting short film. A young boy playfully imitates an aircraft on a sunny, cloud-free day, running through a grove of trees and approaching a stretch of water. Here a war-plane flies directly overhead casting a reflection in the glimmering water ahead, which the boy scoops up with a discarded military helmet. This film effectively questions whether this boy’s generation will be able to bury war, rather than bury more of the war-dead.

Name: Where is My Home - Khaneye Man Kojast - خانه من کجاست
Story Line: The interactions between a street vendor and a potential customer act as an allegory in this cleverly conceived short film. Filmed in black and white on a Handycam, the piece oozes with the authenticity of a real life encounter. A strangely meta and subversive piece that demonstrates the lack of demand for artistic, independent cinema in Iran.

Name: Superficial Humans - Adamhaye Sathi - آدم های سطحی
Story Line: Opening with a shot of the busy streets of Tehran, the film follows an old man who lives in isolation, in his apartment. He occasionally sits outside his apartment, reflecting on the world around him. He is visited by a woman who provides him with the companionship he clearly needs.

Name: Face of the Inside - Chehreye Daroon - چهره درون
Story Line: In this documentary portrait, the pioneering modernist Iranian painter Mansooreh Hosseini (1926-2012) reminisces on her life and work. Hosseini gives a tour of her artworks and paintings, which innovatively combined calligraphy with figurative and abstract art, while looking back on her formative years and the turbulent history she lived through.

Name: Motograph - Poshte Nevisi - پشت نویسی
Story Line: As we learn in this snapshot of life film, poetry is everywhere; even on vehicles. We take to the streets in this touching series of interviews, where we briefly connect with drivers from all over the country. Verses etched, delicately painted, or scrawled on bumpers, trunks, and side panels range from the profound to the sweetly sentimental. The reasoning behind the need for artistic expression is equally diverse, and provides wonderful insight into the drivers’ personal lives and the society that surrounds them. A fantastic glimpse into working people’s daily lives.

Name: Oblation Painting - Naghshe Nazr - نقش نذر
Story Line: Farshid Azari's documentary tells the story behind a group of stunning murals located in a snow-covered hilltop village in Iran's Gilan province. Made at times of immense upheaval in Iran, and deeply connected to the traumatic history of the Gilan province’s people, the murals portray scenes of past battles and invasions. Yet they also provide a spiritual outlet for the people of the area; bringing this to light, 'Oblation Painting' explores the whole depth of history and culture attached to these unique artefacts of Iranian heritage.
Writer: Azizollah Haji Mashhadi ( عزیزالله حاجی مشهدی )

Name: Absolute Past - Mazi Motlagh - ماضی مطلق
Story Line: A young man named Saeed suffers from a disability that forces him to lead a solitary life. He is frustrated that his disability has forced him into a state of arrested development, unable to venture far into the outside world. However he excels at mathematics from his room at home in his spare time. When his window is deliberately broken, Saeed suspects a local child named Omid. However, upon observing him from his window, Saeed sees that he is a good-natured boy. The two proceed to form an unlikely friendship as Saeed tutors Omid on the mathematical problems he is struggling with.

Name: Together Again - Dobareh Baham - دوباره باهم
Story Line: A husband and wife meet a wealthy man while looking for a job, after which we are witness to a series of events.

Name: Clowns - DalghakHa - دلقک ها
Story Line: Karim and Atabak are the titular clowns in this comedy drama about two friends from the wrong side of town. The pair always manage to get themselves into some sort of trouble, and their quests for a better life often lead to nowhere. However, the duo suddenly find themselves involved in a situation where they realize just how much they need to change their behavior, for the sake of themselves and their friendship. A solidly entertaining piece of work with striking opening visuals.

Name: Absolutely Tame is a Horse - Asb Heivane Najibi Ast - اسب حیوان نجیبی است
Story Line: One night, a policeman rings a doorbell to put a stop to a private party. Of course, there’s always room for a nice bribe. Through the rest of the night, the policeman meets different people who have committed small crimes: he scolds them, meanwhile holding out his hand. Ultimately, quite some cash ends up in that hand.

Name: Self Harm - Khodzani - خودزني
Story Line: The story is about a man who has been released from prison and in order to find his wife and children goes to one of his old friends.
Editor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: Mixed Pizza - Pizza Makhlout - پیتزا مخلوط
Story Line: Cousins Manouchehr and Gholam live and work in a pizza shop owned by their friend Haji. When Haji goes on pilgrimage, he leaves his house keys with Manouchehr under instruction to take care of the place while he is away. Manouchehr's wife Elaheh meanwhile works with her sister Elham in a shop that sells wedding dresses, but their employer Molook is threatening to sell the shop in order to pay off the debts of the man who jilted her at the altar. In love with Elham, Gholam agrees to help Manouchehr save the women's jobs by getting Molook to fall in love again, and the men decide to use Haji's empty house as a base of operations while they plan their hilarious campaign.
Actor: Mohsen Ghazi Moradi ( محسن قاضی مرادی )

Name: Tehran Secret - Mahramaneh Tehran - محرمانه تهران
The Private Life Of Mr. & Mrs. M - Zendegie Khosousie Agha Va Khanome Mim - زندگی خصوصی آقا و خانم میم
Story Line: Mohsen is improving his business life to higher levels, but when his wife gets involved in the business, he finds it difficult to tolerate the underlying conflicts.

Name: Cursed Sneezes - Atsehaye Nahs - عطسه‌های نحس
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: You and I - To Va Man - تو و من
Story Line: Two youngsters are forced to fake that they are engaged but that leads them to more adventures and finally they fall in love for real.
Actor: Mohammad Reza Golzar ( محمد رضا گلزار‎ )

Name: Naive - Sadeh Del - ساده دل
Tajrish Unfinished - Tajrish Natamam - تجریش ناتمام
Story Line: Soroor and Amir first met 20 years ago. Since then, she has been widowed and is now the single mother of a child. And he got married. But their friendship has remained.

Name: Snow on a Hot Tin Roof - Barf Rooye Shirvani Dagh - برف روی شیروانی داغ
Story Line: By the time of a famous poet's doubtful death, his last poem is found. The indication of its code would help to find out about the mysterious parts of his life and death. Any of his relatives is trying to do so in order to achieve the truth.But all these attempts will result in misunderstanding within them and with their past relationship with the poet.

Name: Principles - Yeki Az Ma Do Nafar - یکی از ما دونفر
Story Line: The film is a love story of two architects who come from two different worlds and worldviews are different and thought-provoking.
Actor: Elsa Firouz Azar ( السا فیروز آذر )

Name: Without Farewell - Bi Khodahafezi - بی‌خداحافظی
Recipient - Girandeh - گیرنده
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: Abandoned Memories
Story Line: The aftermath of a tragic fire.

Name: Our Story Your Story - Dastane Ma Ghsseye Tow - داستان ما قصه تو
Misplaced - Ja Be Ja - جا به جا
Actor: Afsaneh Chehreh Azad ( افسانه چهره آزاد )

Name: Joys of Life - ShadiHaye Zendegi - شادی‌های زندگی
Three People on the Line - Se Nafar Rouye Khat - سه نفر روی خط
Requirement of Marriage - Sharte Ezdevaj - شرط ازدواج
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: Romantic Nostalgia - DeltangiHaye Asheghaneh - دلتنگی‌های عاشقانه
Daryakenar - دریاکنار
Near the Highway - Havalie Otoban - حوالی اتوبان
Story Line: Pasha and Sima are a young couple who believe their lives are going nowhere. When they encounter Pardis, a middle-aged woman on the highway out of Tehran, they realise this chance meeting could bring about a dramatic change in their future. A beautiful and emotive film about two sets of people who have come to a crossroads, both literally and metaphorically.
Actor: Afsaneh Chehreh Azad ( افسانه چهره آزاد )

Name: Blood Orange - Porteghale Khooni - پرتقال خونی
Story Line: Vala is on the verge of separating from his wife when he meets Termeh, a young girl who comes to redesign his office. Against his better judgement, he starts developing feelings for her. As he has endured difficult relationships in the past, Vala is very cautious about moving forward his affair with Termeh. But then photographer Siavash arrives on the scene and Vala realises the time has come: he must choose a future for himself and Termeh or run the risk of losing her forever.

Name: Story of Pariya - Ghesseye Pariya - قصه پریا
Actor: Sharareh Dolat Abadi ( شراره دولت آبادی )
Writer: Rahman Seifi Azad ( رحمان سیفی آزاد )

Name: Network - Shabakeh - شبکه
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: See You Tomorrow Elina - Farda Mibinamet, Elina - فردا می بینمت الینا
Story Line:
My daughter, “Baran”’s childhood in the 1980s coincided with the Iran-Iraq war and the bombardment of large Iranian cities such as Tehran. Terrifying sleepless nights were followed by the next morning’s involvement in daily life which had to go on. Every morning when I took Baran to nursery school I used to wonder how the kids could bear this amount of stress during the day and the hours that they are away from us parents. The curiosity stayed with me for years for knowing what effects will the reflection of social circumstances have on children, and how “Mahnaz”, the caring principal of the nursery school would answer the endless questioning by children who don’t know the meaning of violence. In February 2011, after twenty odd years, I went to see Mahnaz and her nursery school with my camera. These days happened to coincide with the Iranian people’s demonstrations against the presidential election results of 2010 and the children who witnessed the violence and clashes of those days.
Website: karafilm.ir

Name: 21 Days and Me - 21 Rooz va Man - بیست و یک روز و من
Story Line: In '21 Days and Me,' experimental documentary filmmaker Shirin Baraghnavard examines a complicated moment of her own life. As a 35 year old woman who has been married for 11 years, Baraghnavard believes she still has plenty of time to decide whether she wants to become a mother or not. However, the discovery of a fibroma in her womb suddenly makes the decision more urgent. Because the fibroma requires surgery to remove it, and Baraghnavard's doctor has told her the best time to get pregnant is directly after the surgery, she can no longer afford to wait. With compelling openness, Baraghnavard records the emotional journey she takes during the 21 days leading up to the operation as she struggles with the issues of her decision.

Name: Laughter in the Rain - Khandeh Dar Baran - خنده در باران
Story Line: A lovelorn doctor trying to invent a way to prevent brain damage in comatose patients manages to create a device that can digitally store an individual's memories. After he is jilted at the altar by his fiancee, he accidentally swaps her memories with those of a serial womaniser and realises that the device can perhaps help him erase the painful events in his own past. Hilarity ensues as he tries to perfect his invention in this memorable romantic comedy that asks the question: "Can you remember who you are if you forget who you were?"

Name: Crime - Jorm - جرم
Story Line: Played out in black and white, Crime tells the story of a young man, currently imprisoned for his crimes. After being released, the man reunites with the woman and young boy who have his heart. But though some aspects of his life look to be on the up, it slowly becomes apparent that not all of his troubles are yet behind him. Can he overcome them? Or will he be seduced back into a world of crime and violence?

Name: The Criminals - Khalafkaran - خلافکاران
The Retired - Bazneshasteha - بازنشسته ها
Here Without Me - Inja Bedone Man - اینجا بدون من
Story Line: This contemporary Iranian adaptation of Tennessee Williams' 'The Glass Menagerie' portrays the clash between the dreams and the harsh reality of life in contemporary Tehran. Ehsan struggles to make a living as a writer. Hemmed in on all sides by his dysfunctional family, including his his disabled sister Yalda and his frantic, overworked mother Farideh, Ehsan frequently seeks to escape his claustrophobic life by going to the cinema, where he can daydream his malaise into happiness. As each member of his family pursues their individual dreams, a tiny string of hope for a better future keeps them together. But for how long can this string last? Winner of Best Actress at the 2011 World Film Festival in Montreal (Fatemeh Motamed-Aria).

Name: Gold and Copper - Tala va Mes - طلا و مس
Story Line: A mullah in training struggles to take care of his ailing wife Zahra and their children in this moving melodrama. The film puts a human face on Iran's Muslim clergy with its unusual tale of a man forced to become a better husband and father. Seyed has just moved with his family to Tehran to study and he relies on his wife to look after everything else. Their lives change dramatically when Zahra is diagnosed with a progressive disease that results in paralysis.

Name: The Bird Keeper - Parandeh Baz - پرنده باز
Story Line: Fereydoon is a pigeon keeper. After returning home from a long journey to Mecca, he realizes that he forgot to perform an important ritual while he was there. His marriage and his whole existence is in crisis. As he tries to fix the trouble he has caused, he manages to get himself into deeper trouble and endless unfortunate situations. Is everything truly hopeless? This light-hearted comedy perfectly balances impossible situations with witty characters in a highly unusual story.

Name: Mourning - Soug - سوگ
Story Line: In this darkly comic road trip, a deaf couple take responsibility for their nephew, Arshia, following the death of his parents. Most children are ignorant to the problems of adults by sheer ignorance but Arshia literally cannot understand the frantic signing between his aunt and uncle. What follows is a film that stands out for its cinematic poetry by conveying the premise that even where disability is present, compassion is universal through even the simplest of gestures.

Name: No Men Allowed - Voroode Aghayan Mamnoo - ورود آقایان ممنوع
Story Line: In order to prepare her best and brightest for the upcoming chemistry Olympiad, strict, conservative headmistress Ms. Darabi is forced to break her lifelong rule of not allowing male teachers in the school and reluctantly hires the bumbling Mr. Jebeli. Little does she know though that several of her students, led by the self-assured Paria, have a plan to get her to fall in love with him. 'No Men Allowed' is a hilarious, rollicking romcom, chock-full of witty dialogue and zany antics that will have you coming back time and time again!
Writer: Peyman Ghassem Khani ( پیمان قاسم خانی )

Name: Salma and the Apple - Salma Va Sib - سلما و سیب
Story Line: This parable-like story focuses on Sadeq, a young cleric visiting home after a spell at a seminary. Once there, his mother urges him to visit nearby relatives to ask for his cousin's hand. On his way, he encounters a series of characters, all upon whom his gentle positivity has a warming effect. As his journey continues and romance rears its head in the form of the beautiful Salma, begins to question whether his blithe optimism is simple naivety. An almost biblical tale full of heartwarming drama.

Name: Unwelcome in Tehran - Nakhandeh Dar Tehran - ناخوانده در تهران
Story Line: Mina, the director, is a girl from Shiraz who gets married in order to move to Tehran. Influenced by her own life, she decides to make a documentary about the girls nationwide who, like Azar, move to Tehran  to start an independent life away from their families' watchful eyes and restrictions. The film is about Mina and Azar's constant struggle to find the answer as to why families and the society have difficulty in accepting an independent life for a single girl.

Name: The Abandoned Archive - Arshive Matrokeh - آرشیو متروکه
Story Line: This documentary propels us back in time to explore the diverse range of archive film collected and maintained in Iran. An archivist takes us on a cinematic journey through his personal collection of film reels.

Name: Nadarha - ندارها
Story Line: Unintentionally trapped in a dead-end, after contemplating the social dilemmas, considering a personal way to serve the justice, three youngsters decide to steal from the rich and help the poor. Pleased by the successful heists and human aids, they keep on going without thinking of the consequences. But they gradually begin to see.
Editor: Varouzh Karim Masihi ( واروژ کریم مسیحی )

Name: Hit the Target - Be Hadaf Shelik Kon -  به هدف شلیک کن
Story Line: A gang of professional bank robbers embarks on a city-wide crime spree, but a relationship between two of them threatens to jeopardise the whole enterprise. At the same time, this 'new generation' of criminals comes under scrutiny from the old masters, while two detectives pull out all the stops to bring them in. A pulse-pounding action thriller about the youth of today trying to find their way in a morally ambiguous world.
Actor: Ardalan Shoja Kaveh ( اردلان شجاع کاوه )

Name: Moving Up - Kami Balatar - کمی بالاتر
Story Line: Shahriyar is a both a garbage collector and an unpublished novelist who has a passion for literature and poetry. Shahriyar finds it impossible to conform to society’s expectations; rather, he aspires to be Jack London or Dostoevsky. He writes imaginative stories to escape from his dull, prosaic life in Kermanshah, a city in Iran’s Kurdistan region. But his wife, his family, his neighborhood and all the people around him constantly conspire to hold him back from Moving Up. 'Moving Up' is a powerful, inspiring and deeply affecting story of an outsider, who wants to be an artist, seemingly impossible in the provincial town of Kermanshah. Loghman Khaledi builds sympathetic portraits of both his protagonist and his family members.

Name: Tear and Silence - Ashk o Sokoot - اشک و سکوت
Story Line: A mother and daughter go back to their homeland of Iran to visit an ailing relative. Secrecy between the two becomes all too much to bear for the daughter as it becomes clear her mother is trying to hide her past. However, secrets are revealed in the scandalous climax of this intense drama.
Actor: Mina Jafar Zadeh ( مینا جعفر زاده )

Name: Passing the Buck - Taghsire Astinam Bood - تقصیر آستینم بود
Story Line: Rajab is the only illiterate man in the village. When he receives a letter through the local teacher Bahador, to whose daughter Rajab is engaged, the contents of the letter strain relations between Rajab and is soon-to-be father-in-law, and the wedding is postponed. Desperate to uncover the true meaning of the letter, Rajab has no choice but to take it to different people in the villagers, both well-wishers and party crashers, who try to help him make sense of it. A comedy of errors about a search for deeper meaning and a game of Chinese whispers.

Name: Alzheimer - آلزایمر
Story Line: Asieh has put an advertisement in the newspaper every year since losing her husband, begging for information on his whereabouts. Her relatives however have all but given him up as lost, and to gain some closure hold a funeral ceremony for him. But when a man who resembles Asieh's missing husband shows up claiming to be him, none of the family are quite sure who to believe...

Name: A Cube of Sugar - Yek Habbeh Ghand - یه حبه قند
Story Line: Pasandide is to marry an American man and join him in his native country. Pasandide's family comes together for the wedding ceremony at the home of Uncle Ezzatolah. The women cook and sew; the young children play hide-and-seek; one uncle looks for missing treasure in the garden. All is well in the run-up to the wedding ceremony. But before the ceremony that will unite Pasandide and her fiancé in marriage gets underway, a single cube of sugar brings great misfortune to the family.

Name: Facing Mirrors - Aynehaye Rooberoo - آینه های روبرو
Story Line: Two very different women, Adineh and Rana, team up to claim their well-deserved freedom and happiness in this mesmerizing drama. Adineh, a rebellious and likeable transsexual woman, meets the conservative Rana while running away from her home and an arranged marriage. Rana is driving a taxi to pay off her imprisoned husband's debts, and her meeting with Adineh becomes the catalyst for pursuit of a better life. As the pair grow to understand one another, both women feel increasingly responsible for one another's happiness. Unmissable.
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: Three and a Half - Se Va Nim - سه و نیم
Story Line: 'Three and a Half' tells the story of three female convicts recently released from prison. Outside the confines of the prison walls, the trio plan to escape Iran by crossing the border. Though the women revel in each other's humor, their mission is a serious one. If caught trying to escape Iran, they will find themselves in deep trouble. An exciting tale about three women who are both resilient and troubled in equal measure.

Name: Hatred - Boghz - بغض
Story Line: Zhaleh and Hamed are two third generation Iranian immigrants who have settled down in another country against their will. Their families, who find Iran's living conditions unsuitable, take refuge in Turkey in order to have a peaceful life. 'Hatred' includes two parallel stories from two periods of Zhaleh and Hamed's lives. The first one focuses on happier times when they first meet, while the second focuses on eight crucial hours when they commit a robbery in hopes of raising enough cash to start somewhere else anew. However, the pair discover that the path to new beginnings is far from smooth. An intriguing look at the lives of immigrants.

Name: The Day I Became A Man - Roozi Ke Mard Shodam - روزی که مرد شدم
Story Line: In this coming-of-age story, Gerdafarid, a tenacious young man, learns to open up and finds himself along the way. This comedy brings an unexpected trip through Teheran and a series of misadventures to see him change, literally and figuratively, with the help of his father and his neighbor, into the man he will become.
Producer: Seyed Amir Parvin Hosseini ( سید امیر پروین‌حسینی )

Name: Crime and Punishment - Jenayat va Mokafat - جنایت و مکافات
Story Line: Rasoul Rasekh's life seems on a downward turn when he is expelled from university. In need of fast cash, he gives his mother's cherished necklace to the elderly Molouk, a shrewd money lender. Things become complicated when the two begin to clash, and their battle leads to calamity. An intriguing drama with compelling performances from Ateneh Faghih Nasiri and Rabeeh Oskooee.
Actor: Ateneh Faghih Nasiri ( آتنه فقیه نصیری‎‎ )

Name: Beloved Sky - Asemane Mahboub - آسمان محبوب
Story Line: Master filmmaker Dariush Mehrjui stuns audiences with this magical realist drama. Shayan (Ali Mosaffa), a successful young doctor, is shaken by the discovery of a seemingly incurable brain tumor. His determination to end it all is thwarted, however, when he encounters a village seemingly untouched by time. A mysterious herbalist and a traumatized woman (Leila Hatami) become key figures in Shayan's life; a life he thought he would have to bid farewell. A fantastic ensemble cast, stunning landscapes, and beautiful visuals make this film shine above the rest. Winner of Best Director at the 2011 Fajr Film Festival.

Name: Azar - Azar - آذر
Story Line: After the death of her husband, Azar is forced to try to make ends meet, providing for herself and her disabled child through any means she can. Despite multiple proposals from several different men, she has so far refused to marry on principle, even though it could spell the end of many of her troubles. Now however, all that has changed. Azar has met someone who fits the bill and decides it is about time she accepted his hand. The only problem is she now needs to secure the permission of her son, and that will be no easy feat. By turns a domestic drama and a traditional romance, 'Azar' delves beautifully into one woman's struggle to balance family life with work commitments and maintain her persistent hope for the future.

Name: Someone Wants to Talk to You - Yeki Mikhad Bahat Harf Bezane - یکی میخواد باهات حرف بزنه
Story Line: Powerful family drama. After an unhappy first marriage, Leila is reluctant to ever marry again. Her daughter Yasaman, however, has other ideas. She is eager for Leila to marry her dentist, Alireza; and as the conflicting issue puts a strain on their relationship the film deals poignantly with some of the tensions which can arise in a mother-daughter dynamic. Yet buried traumas from Leila’s past are set to disrupt their lives in a much deeper way, and tragedy looms within their future.

Name: Mr Yousef - Agha Yousef - آقا یوسف
Story Line: Agha Yousef is living with his only daughter. He does everything he can for a living and for his daughter's sake hoping she is his forever. But a misunderstanding makes everything really complicated for him.

Name: Thirteen 59 - ۵۹ سيزده
Story Line: What if you lived by the sea, and one day you stopped hearing the sound of the waves? What would you do then? That's the question posed by Saman Salur in 'Thirteen 59', an introspective study of the psychological side of war. A chief commander in the Iranian army wakes up from a coma years after the war in which he fought has ended. Unable to define himself by the conflict anymore, he struggles to move on from what he has always known and find the peace within himself. Habit is the hardest addiction to kick...
Actor: Afsaneh Chehreh Azad ( افسانه چهره آزاد )

Name: Like A Butterfly - Parvanegi - پروانگي
Story Line: Journalist Behrouz, inquisitive by nature, muses over a question he has long asked himself: 'Why do intellectuals from the East die in the West?' He embarks on a journey to Paris to decide for himself. Once there, he makes an attempt to connect with an old friend, Ala, only to receive an enormous shock. Behrouz resolves to get to the bottom of things, with the assistance of Parvaneh, Ala’s love. A brooding, intriguing mystery in a Parisian setting, this film contemplates life, love, and loss overseas.

Name: The Meeting - Molaghat - ملاقات
Story Line: This beautifully shot contemplation of mortality, broken into three chapters, examines the ways we view death in contemporary society. We meet Hasti, who bonds with her driver while preparing her husband's funeral before his actual death. The second episode centers on a ritual mortician and a pitman who struggle to deal with paperwork concerning their pre-purchased apartment. The pair feel swindled, and the authorities' lack of cooperation exasperates them further. The final episode focuses on a young couple's meeting at Behesht Zahra, the biggest cemetery in Iran. These powerful vignettes are a refreshing reminder of the impermanence of life, and how beauty can be found in all things.

Name: I am a Mother - Man Madar Hastam - من مادر هستم
Story Line: 'I Am a Mother' tells the story of Nahid, a young mother who claims responsibility for the murder of Saeed, the man who raped her daughter, in order to spare her daughter from qisas, the law of equal punishment. As Saeed's relatives clamour for capital punishment and close families clash in the courtroom, Nahid ponders the sacrifice she has made for her child, a decision she believes any mother would make. But will that be enough to liberate her from the barbs of her community and help her on the road to redemption?

Name: Bita is Restless - Bitabi Bita - بی تابی بیتا
Story Line: Bita's struggle to provide for her mother, who is unable to work, takes an unexpected turn when some of her patients accuse her of theft. Her claims of being innocent fall on deaf ears until one of her colleagues confesses something that changes everything. With her reputation ruined, Bita grapples with the mistakes in her life as she searches for a way out of her predicament. Beautifully written and atmospherically compiled, Mehrdad Farid's arresting drama perfectly captures the indecision and uncertainty of its main character, with superb performances from its multifaceted cast.

Name: A Love Story - Yek Dastane Asheghane - یک داستان عاشقانه
Story Line: Feeling 'strange' about reaching the age of 50, and badgered by his producer to finish an important screenplay he is writing, Anis begins to reflect upon his past. He finds himself drawn to the moments of his childhood when he first formed his love of books, and above all recalls the complex situation in which his first love blossomed. As the memory of his childhood sweet-heart, Fanous, echoes in his present, can Anis find new meaning for his life through the tender-hearted desires of his young self?

Name: Lifeline - Galogah - گلوگاه
Story Line: Constructing electricity pylons across northern Iran, Salam and Emran are happy. As they and their team scramble across flimsy scaffolds and camp out at night discussing love and life, they find comradery in their dangerous work. But as the job goes on, new troubles and dangers keep emerging, and a personal conflict begins to cause tensions between the two friends. Will Salam and Emran let their differences affect their work, and make an already dangerous job become fatal?

Name: Death is My Profession - Marg Kasbo Kare Man Ast - مرگ کسب و کار من است
Story Line: An uncompromising depiction of poverty and the people who live on the fringes, 'Death is My Profession' follows the interwoven stories of several individuals, among them the lovelorn Ghassem, struggling father Atta and reluctant thief Shokri, as they are forced to accept any work to survive. A sombre study of desperation, of lives spent toeing the breadline and of the everyday struggles of a neglected society. Amir Hossein Saghafi's powerful drama is a cinematic tour-de-force of gritty realism and impassioned biographical storytelling. A must-see.

Name: Honeymoon - Mahe Asal - ماه عسل
Story Line: In the aftermath of a traumatic event a young man argues with his wife and struggles to come to terms with what has happened.

Name: Grandmother - Mamaji - مادر بزرگ
Story Line: Short experimental film set in a realm suspended between the real and the unreal, the film endeavours to create a cinematic portrait of the filmmaker's grandmother. An endearing ode to the bond between a granddaughter and her grandmother.

Name: Baba - بابا
Story Line: Baba performs himself in this tale about a lonely Iranian exile working in traffic management and remembering a radical past. As he tries to break free from his monotonous life, Baba must address the trajectory of the film's narrative - leading to an unconventional confrontation over how the film should end.

Name: Day and Night - Shabane Rooz - شبانه روز
Story Line: This intricately woven narrative of four intersecting stories focuses on the lives of several women, each striving for happiness. Fouzhan is due to marry her cousin, but when the handsome young Babak enters her life, she finds herself facing a dilemma. The sickly Marjan, meanwhile, is struggling to cope with her ailing mother as well as the breakdown of her marriage. We also follow rheumatic watercolor painter Siavash and his wife Bahar’s relationship, who soon find their joyful existence is under threat. A melancholic royal daughter, meanwhile, seeks solace in revisiting the past with her painting tutor. An eerily beautiful, fragmented piece of work, this film is as intriguing as it is atmospheric.

Name: Inheritance - Ersieh - ارثیه
Story Line: This film begins with a young boy sifting through reels of film. It appears he is an apprentice of some sort, but what lesson will his mentor teach him? A brief film that is beautiful in its poignancy.

Name: Delete - دیلیت
Story Line: Experimental short film revolving around the relationship between a playwright and a photographer. Using sound effects and various innovative visual techniques, 'Delete' coveys different moments in the lives of Shahriar and Mina, creating an ambiguous and atmospheric glimpse into the feelings of love and loss.

Name: Going - Raftan - رفتن
Story Line: The atmosphere is tense as a mother wakes her son, Saro, in the dead of night. The family must now risk the deadly feat of border crossing in order to flee the country, and the uncertainty of their situation comes across powerfully in Salem Salavati's short film. Told mainly from the naive perspective of Saro, who doesn’t understand why he must leave his life behind so suddenly, the story is one of regret and incomprehension, as well as fear and suspense.

Name: Nakedness and Wind - Berahnegi Va Bad - برهنگی و باد
Story Line: This unsettling psychological piece begins with an ambulance driver bringing home a naked, discombobulated man. The man and his wife attempt to settle the disturbed man, who remains unresponsive and seemingly in a state of 'limbo'. The ambulance patient then rests on their bed, appearing to be close to death. A perplexing switch in the film then makes the viewer question everything they saw in the first half, and ask whether the couple were truly being benevolent to a man in need of help.

Name: Spring Movement - Jonbeshe Bahar - جنبش بهار
Story Line: Reza Menbachi's 'Spring in Sorrow' serves as perfect accompanying music to a mixture of news footage of the Arab Spring and buoyant performing street dancers. The film contrasts shots of violent protest and oppression and the free artistic expression of the dancers, and in doing so, it beautifully portrays the initial idealism and optimism that buoyed the Arab Spring protests. Snippets of interviews with protestors exemplify their desire to see a new social order that would allow for the freedom and joy felt in Reza Menbachi's music.

Name: To Become the Sea - Darya Mishavad - دریا می شود
Story Line: This masterful, beautifully told drama details the relationships between a young boy, his grandfather and the sea. In the beginning, a family visit the hospital where the doctor informs them of the grandfathers ill health. Wishing to teach his grandson about life on the sea, the pair embark on a fishing trip. Sound is used to great effect in this film, as the peaceful melody of the water and birds contrast with the cacophony of noises on the mainland. This poignant drama deals with themes of family, tradition and the passing of time, and will resonate deeply with its audience.

Name: Persian Pasta - Pastaye Irani - پستای ایرانی
Story Line: Student Vahid Sedaghat films and narrates this biographical documentary about a year he spent living in Italy. Interviewing Iranian friends he made there, and depicting the low and high points of his life through raw hand-held footage, the film explores his reasons for leaving Iran while revealing the joys and difficulties of living in a foreign country. Thought-provoking themes of belonging and alienation run throughout this self-portrait of a young man who wants to make a change to his life.

Name: Gangs - Obash - اوباش
Adam's Son Eve's Daughter - Pesare Adam Dokhtare Hava - پسر آدم دختر حوا
Story Line: Mina Bozorgmehr and Farhood Zandi are two young lawyers who start working at the same time. They share an apartment, but Mina thinks that Farhood is an author and Farhood thinks that Mina is a photographer.
Actor: Mohsen Ghazi Moradi ( محسن قاضی مرادی )

Name: Women Are From Venus, Men Are From Mars - Zanan Venusi, Mardan Merikhi - زنان ونوسی، مردان  مريخی‬‎
Story Line: The wife of a young architect named Saeed forces him to borrow a lot of money to send her skiing and holidaying in the French Alps. In the Alps, while skiing, the women falls into a natural glacier and dies. Saeed, after coming out of shock because of his wife’s death, marries another girl but soon after their marriage, the frozen body of his former wife is found in the Alps and is accidentally brought back to life and returns to Iran...

Name: Farewell Baghdad - Bedrood Baghdad - بدرود بغداد
Story Line: The Polish-American boxer Daniel Dalca (Mazdak Mirabedini) escapes his problems by enlisting in the army. After four years when his mission is over, he is sent back home where he would have to face his past problems. So he decides to desert the army. In the middle of a desert he gets bitten by a scorpion. On the very day of her marriage, 29 March 2003 Rebecca (Pantea Bahram) lost her husband during the British-American attack on Iraq. Today she is managing a little restaurant on the Iraqi borderline where she hosts Iraqi and American soldiers. She goes to the landmines to clear mines in order to plant trees and palms at the very same places. Saleh Al Marzouk (Mostafa Zamani) is an Iraqi math teacher who lost his family on the 29 March Baghdad bombings. Meanwhile, he detained and later imprisoned at the infamous Abu Ghraib prison for three years. Disguised as a woman, he plans to blow himself up at a restaurant on Christmas Day in 2009. There, he suddenly discovers a picture of himself on the wall, when Rebecca enters the restaurant. Shocked, Saleh runs away.

Name: The Other - Digari - دیگری
Story Line: This movie follows a boy who lives with his mother in a village. The boy has lost his father and needs to travel to Tehran with his soon to be stepfather.

Name: 3 Degrees of Fever - Seh Daraje Tab - سه درجه تب
Story Line: Elham wants to marry a rich young man. Her future mother in law complains about her nose and suggest that she fixes it as soon as possible. Elham tore up her id card because it has the picture of her before surgery and goes to get a second one but in the new one, there is a strange man’s name that is put down as her husband.

Name: Leila's Dream - Khabe Leila - خواب لیلا
Story Line: A 26-year-old girl who lives alone in the house inherited from her parents. It's been a while that she is wildly attacked by a 6-year-old girl who has great powers. Dr. Pouria believes her only escape is to seek her forgotten childhood memories
Actor: Mohsen Ghazi Moradi ( محسن قاضی مرادی )

Name: Along the City - Dar Emtedade Shahr - در امتداد شهر
Story Line:
A tension building thriller at every turn, Dar Emtedad Shahr opens with the begins of a jewelry store robbery, and then goes back in time to explore the events leading up to it. In doing so, the major players are introduced: the pair of robbers themselves, the jewelry storeowner, his ill wife and doctor mistress and a disenfranchised celebrity. When the robbery goes wrong and the jewelry storeowner is shot, all stories begin to collide as a hostage situation escalates. Who exactly will survive? And what will be left of those who do? 

Synopsis by IMVBox
Actor: Mohammad Reza Golzar ( محمد رضا گلزار‎ )

Name: Saint Petersburg - San Peterzburg - سن پطرزبورگ
Story Line: When the last Russian Tsar is overthrown, his son Nikita Ivanovic Romanov is sent to Iran and raised in a typical Iranian family. Nikita, or 'Karim,' as his family refer to him, is a petty crook and hops in and out of prison with alarming regularity. One day Karim sees an old man get hit by a car. The car driver had orders from some unknown people to do this. Karim and the old man get on another car, thinking it is a taxi. The taxi driver is also a criminal called Farshad. The old man who is a Russian, tells Karim about the treasur and Farshad overhears them. After the old man's death, Farshad and Karim both try to get their hands on the treasure. An enjoyable farce about hidden identity, legacy, and greed.
Actor: Peyman Ghassem Khani ( پیمان قاسم خانی )
Writer: Peyman Ghassem Khani ( پیمان قاسم خانی )

Name: Living with Closed Eyes - Zendegi Ba Cheshmane Baste - زندگی با چشمان بسته
Beauty and the Beast - Div O Delbar - دیو و دلبر
Director: Vahid Nikkhah Azad ( وحید نیکخواه آزاد )
Producer: Vahid Nikkhah Azad ( وحید نیکخواه آزاد )
Writer: Vahid Nikkhah Azad ( وحید نیکخواه آزاد )

Name: Poopak and Mash Mashallah - Poopak va Mash Mashallah - پوپک و مش ماشالله
Story Line: It's a funny social story about a family in Iran, see a few days of their life and clash of cases.

Name: Ruin - Tabahi - تباهی
Director: Hojjat Ghasemzadeh Asl (حجت قاسم زاده اصل)
Editor: Hojjat Ghasemzadeh Asl (حجت قاسم زاده اصل)
Writer: Hojjat Ghasemzadeh Asl (حجت قاسم زاده اصل)

Name: Thesis - Payanameh - پایان‌ نامه
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: The Shy Groom - Damade Khejalati - داماد خجالتی
Mr. Smart Guy - Aghaye Zerang - آقای زرنگ
Writer: Ali Asghar Ahmadi Moghadam (علی اصغر احمدی مقدم)

Name: Boomrang - بومرنگ
Marriage Agency - Ajanse Ezdevaj - آژانس ازدواج
Story Line: Aziz and Balabes are two close friends that live together and work in the village’s mortuary. One night Balabes dreams of numerous women shoes and sandals. When he wakes up he reads the interpretation of his dream and finds out that the shoe is the symbol of marriage. He becomes sad because he cannot marry. Balabes is depressed but Aziz considers this a divine gift that every time Balabes decides to marry a girl, that same girl marries in one week or sooner, so that no girl, spinster or widow, is left in the village. One day when Balabes is fixing the roof of the mortuary, a woman comes and asks him to help in distributing votive food. When Balabes recognizes Nora, a girl that he had intended to marry years ago, he faints. Nora explains to Balabes that after he asked for her hand in marriage, another suitor comes forward from outside the country and she goes to Turkey to marry him, but the man turns out to be a con artist and Nora, after returning from Turkey, is too ashamed to go back to the village and lives in Tehran with her sick mother. After Nora leaves the village, Balabes talks to Aziz and decides to ask for Nora’s hand in marriage once again, but this time more cautiously. To cover the expenses of his wedding, Balabes goes to his cousin Solomon in Tehran to get back the five million Tomans he had borrowed for his wedding expenses. Solomon who is known as “Sasy Monkan” owns a shoe shop and is a manipulative man. As soon as he finds out that Balabes has decided to come to Tehran, he tries to send him back but Balabes is far more serious than that. In his late uncle’s house, Balabes meets some of Solomon’s friends that are a group of rappers, but he does not try to befriend them. The next day Balabes goes to Nora’s workplace to see her and also to find a job but…

Name: Nora - نورا
Director: Alireza Kooshk Jalali ( علیرضا کوشک جلالی )

Name: Assassin - Adamkosh - آدمکش
Story Line: A young forensic psychiatrist visits an old friend whose fiancee ROYA has been accused of murder. Though he learns about ROYA's psychological disorders, the more he finds, the firmer he insists on her innocence.

Name: First Tombstone - Sange aval - سنگ اول
Story Line: Hassan Ali is the first person in the village who buys a tombstone for himself from the city. This causes the villagers all to wonder and make fun of him. On the other side, his wife also nags about why he didn't spend the money for her or at least didn't buy a tombstone for her too.
Writer: Houshang Moradi Kermani ( هوشنگ مرادی کرمانی )

Name: The Aram Tower - Borje Aram - برج آرام
In Love Swallows - ParastooHaye Ashegh - پرستو‌های عاشق
Golchehreh - گلچهره
A Walk in the Fog - Parse Dar Meh - پرسه در مه
Story Line: After marrying a theater actress called Roya, Amin who is a music composer and pianist, encounters lots of problems which influence their marriage . He quits his work and loses his wife so he misses the balance of his life.

Name: Ungrateful - Nasepas - ناسپاس
Story Line: 'Ungrateful' is a romantic drama that takes place at the time of prophet Moses and charts the stories, alliances and feuds between a number of Jewish tribes. Among other stories and subplots, 'Nasepas' tells the story of two Jewish cousins, Amil and Ashel, who both want to marry Anael.
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: Six and Five - Shisho Besh - شیش و بش
Story Line: Two fellows found themselves in prison for thieving but it actually is their fortune because an old man before his death gives them a treasure map so after their release they try to find it but there are some problems.
Actor: Mohammad Reza Golzar ( محمد رضا گلزار‎ )
Writer: Mohammad Reza Golzar ( محمد رضا گلزار‎ )
Peyman Ghassem Khani ( پیمان قاسم خانی )

Name: Melody of Birth - Saze Zad - ساز زاد
Humans - Ensanha - انسانها
Actor: Mehdi Amini Khah ( مهدی امينی خواه )

Name: Accusation - Az Ma Behtaroon - ازما بهترون
Story Line: In this satirical comedy, which pokes fun at the oppressive treatment of journalists in Iran, Ehsan is an endlessly down-on-his-luck journalist struggling with a messy divorce. So even when he finds success writing an article about superstitious beliefs amongst the urban middle classes, his new found popularity turns out to be a burden. His work is misinterpreted by the authorities, who attempt to imprison him for fraud! Aided by the quirky and flirtatious Nasim, he sets out on a desperate bid to save himself, uncovering a web of shadowy conspirators as he goes. But with his superstitious ex-wife at the centre of the conspiracy, can Ehsan clear his name?

Name: Somewhere Above the Clouds - Jaee Balatar Az Abrha - جایی بالاتر از ابرها
Story Line: Sick of all the smoke and pollution that comes with living in a major city, Rana has had enough of life in Tehran. She makes the decision to start anew, and journeys to the countryside. Once there, she reunites with her childhood nanny Mah Titi in the heart of nature. As she adapts to her new life, she meets a host of colorful characters who come to mean a lot to her.

Name: The Big Trouble - Dardesare Bozorg - دردسر بزرگ
Story Line: 'The Big Trouble' is a delightful comedy brimming with action, suspense and countless moments of laughter. A group of amateur crooks find themselves working with a helpless womanizer who, as it happens, is also a successful criminal - all in the aid of uniting and stopping their internal disputes. The unforgettably animated performances of the cast highlight their clumsy efforts to steal money and an assortment of other valuables. Coupled with their remarkable failures, this team of unlawful amateurs are masters at causing trouble.

Name: Daughter of the King of Angels - Dokhtare Shahe Pariyoun - دختر شاه پریون
Story Line: Arjang, a wealthy businessman, is having a bad day. After suffering a theft and a car accident in the same day, he must also try to deal with the greed of the wife he is trying to divorce. When he meets Afsaneh, a beautiful pickpocket, these two very different worlds collide and an incredible adventure begins.

Name: Please Don't Disturb - Lotfan Mozahem Nashavid - لطفا مزاحم نشوید
Story Line: Three interwoven stories about life in modern day Iran that explore the redemptive qualities of human nature. A TV host tries to prevent his wife from telling authorities that he assaulted her, a clergyman tries to get legal documents back from the man who robbed him, and a thief suffers a crisis of conscience when an elderly couple force him to reconsider his values. Taking a voyeuristic look beneath the veneer of ordinary tragedy, Mohsen Abdolvahab's Please Don't Disturb is a dramatic tour-de-force about our innate capacity for forgiveness.

Name: All My Mothers - Hameye Madarane Man - همه ی مادران من
Story Line: During the 30 years of the Baath ruling under Sadam in Iraq, thousands of Iraqi Kurds and Shiites were either killed or simply vanished into thin air. Around 182,000 people lost their lives when 4,500 villages and townships were destroyed in Kirkuk, Soleimanieh, Dahouk and Erbil regions, with the aim of exterminating the Kurds and to arabise Kurdistan. Having found one of the mass graves after 24 years in the southern deserts of Iraq, the film describes the living conditions of these villages inhabited by mostly mothers, daughters, wives or sisters of the victims. A harrowing documentary that sheds light on the realities of the situation in Iraq.

Name: Tehran Tehran - طهران تهران
Story Line: When an ordinary family joins a group of wealthy people on a tour of Tehran, they don't know what they're in for. Visiting historical buildings and tourist attractions is just the beginning of their journey, and they will discover much more than the landmarks of Tehran before they're through. As the tour unfolds, they find themselves embarking on a series of sweet and unforgettable adventures in this heart-warming family story from Dariush Mehrjui.

Name: Care for Me Lady - Banoo Mara Daryab - بانو مرا دریاب
Story Line: 'Care For Me Lady' focuses on the life of Ahmad Reza Ahmadi, one of the greatest poets of the New Wave in Iranian poetry. His distinctly unusual and surreal style is easily recognizable, setting him apart from his peers. Nasser Saffarian's documentary guides us through his career using interviews with friends and family, and original recordings of readings and talks. An intimate portrait of a key figure in the cultural history of Iran.

Name: Hunters Are The Best Followers - Shekarchian Behtarin Peyrovannad - شکارچیان بهترین پیروانند
Story Line: We are granted a view into a relatively unexplored world in this fascinating film about life as a member of the clergy. Several clergymen give frank, often warmly amusing details about how they embarked on their lives of religion, and how their recreation, routines, and family lives are affected by their duties. We also learn that some clergymen have conflicting ideologies of religion and modernity; some find the two at odds, while others find that one cannot exist without the other. This film boasts hypnotically beautiful imagery that creates a ponderous, meditative tone.

Name: The Scent of Wheat - Booye Gandom - بوی گندم
Story Line: Erfan and his friends decide to hold a concert on an oil platform in which Erfan`s father martyred.

Name: Mind Your Manners - Akhlagheto Khob Kon - اخلاقتو خوب کن
Story Line: After Ebi has a near-death experience, he sees a vision of heaven. Upon returning to Earth he encounters an unconventional angel who gives him information about the future of a beautiful woman he has become enchanted by. Ebi feels he must convince the woman to mend her immoral ways to avoid her terrible fate. With the aid of an incompetent friend and the angel, they attempt to track her down and encourage her to repent.
Producer: Seyed Amir Parvin Hosseini ( سید امیر پروین‌حسینی )

Name: Anahita - آناهیتا
Story Line: Khorshid is a young, aspiring scientist in Tehran. Working together with her best friend Mehrnaz, she hopes to prove that human consciousness and positive energies can affect the molecular structure of water, a theory she believes could help her comatose friend Fahmieh. Everything is going fine until the people around her start dying in mysterious circumstances. Fearing for her life, and ignoring the warnings of others, Khorshid must race to complete her experiments and uncover the truth behind these deaths in this thrilling and creative mystery.

Name: The Orion - اوریون
Story Line: A student named Elham falls in love with the charming Amir, and loses her virginity. But her lover doesn't intend to marry her and so Elham finds herself in a desperate situation. When it transpires that the girl is no longer a virgin, she and her former boyfriend end up in court. Under such pressure, Amir quickly changes from an understanding friend into a pragmatist... A sympathetic drama that examines misplaced trust and betrayal.

Name: Rainy Seasons - Fasle Baranhaye Mousemi - فصل باران های موسمی
Story Line: Sina is a middle-class sixteen-year-old growing up in Tehran. His previously idyllic life becomes fractured, however, when his parents announce their impending divorce. Adding to his sense of abandonment is the threat of a local thug who believes that Sina owes him money. In the face of his parent's constant absence, Sina has no one to turn to, and in a defiant act of rebellion, he allows an older girl, Nahid, to temporarily move in with him. A thoughtful coming-of-age story about the prospect of making difficult choices that potentially threaten your very body and soul.
Actor: Navid Layeghi Moghadam ( نوید لایقی مقدم )

Name: Women Are Incredible - Zan ha Shegeft Angizand - زنها شگفت انگیزند
Story Line: After the legalisation of polygamy in Iran, things come to a head for Ardalan when he is involved in an unfortunate car accident. Injured in the crash, the secret of Ardalan's multiple marriages is suddenly unearthed, as his many wives vie for his attention. All from different backgrounds and with varying situations at home, the three women react very differently to the news, and as the inevitable comic clash reaches its height, Ardalan finds himself pulled in literally three different directions. Can he reconcile with the women before he is washed away by an encroaching sea of debt and bitter spouses?

Name: Awakening Dreams - Bidariye Royaha - بیداری رویاها
Story Line: Hamid's brother has been missing in action, presumed dead, for twenty-two years. Coming to terms with the loss, Hamid has now moved on and, as custom dictates, married his brother's widow. But his future happiness is cut abruptly short by the unexpected return of his brother from the frontline. With the local clergy decreeing that the second marriage be annulled, Hamid can only watch as the life he has strenuously built crumbles around him, and he is now faced with the question of what he will do to protect it.
Director: Mohammad Ali Ahangar ( محمدعلی باشه آهنگر )

Name: Salve - Marham - مرهم
Story Line: When Marham runs away, she first feels seduced by the frivolous attitudes of the youth culture scene she finds herself in. Yet she soon finds new kinds of hardships and must make uncomfortable compromises in order to find her way. Shifting time frames provide an enigmatic edge in this raw and gripping drama, which passes beautifully from moments of nerve-wracking tension to the more intimate scenes of household affairs and familial support.

Name: There Are Things You Don't Know - Chizhaie Hast Ke Nemidani - چیزهایی هست که نمیدانی
Story Line: Late-shift taxi driver Ali works the mean streets of Tehran and in the process he meets an eclectic variety of people. Most notable is the lonely Leila whom he has to collect every night. With rumors of an upcoming earthquake spreading, the normally taciturn Ali slowly breaks his silence in Leila's presence. Behind banal conversations full of unfinished sentences, the protagonists’ pasts betray deep traumas which have deflected them from their original paths in life. With a nod to Scorsese’s Taxi Driver (1976), debut director Fardin Saheb Zamani’s weaves together a melancholy, disquieting drama about alienation and identity.
Director: Fardin Saheb Zamani ( فردین صاحب زمانی )
Editor: Fardin Saheb Zamani ( فردین صاحب زمانی )
Writer: Fardin Saheb Zamani ( فردین صاحب زمانی )

Name: Forty Years Old - Chehel Salegi - چهل سالگی
Story Line: 'Forty Years Old' is about a lost love re-found. Negar is a married woman who works at a musical company. When she is given an assignment to collaborate with an Iranian expat Orchestra leader, she comes face to face with a former lover. Meanwhile, Negar finds herself in a compromised situation with her husband, who turns out has had a hand in her falling out with her former lover.

Name: The Tree - Derakht - درخت
Story Line: Mysterious short drama in which a studio photographer loses the ability to associate people with their pictures.

Name: Mr Treadmill - Hajji Treadmill - حاجی تردمیل
Story Line: A short sweet art film in which an old man sets up an exercise room for his wife at home.

Name: Like Hafez - Hamcho Hafez - همچو حافظ
Story Line: 'Like Hafez' explores the lives of Afghani children through a lens of passion and love, enlightening the viewer to their backgrounds and revealing an emotional core. The documentary also begins delving into the rich and varied nature of Persian poetry and literature. A thoroughly engrossing and poignant snapshot into a world and culture you might not be familiar with.

Name: Coffin - Taboot - تابوت
Story Line:
An elderly man drags what appears to be a coffin up a steep mountain pass in the boiling heat. As the man continues with his arduous task, a man in black encounters him, and laughs derisively at his efforts. The man in black arrives at a beach where the cyclist and two other men wait, followed much later by the old man. However, the man in black and his compatriots are left stunned as the coffin they presumed the man was struggling with turns out to be something else entirely. 

Synopsis by IMVbox.com

Name: Behind the Scenes: Women Are Angels - Poshte Sahneh: Zanha Fereshte And - پشت صحنه : زن ها فرشته اند
Story Line: Director Mehrdad Farid indulges us with a documentary commentary on his hilarious comedy 'Woman Are Angels'. His original film focuses on a group of women that find themselves in amusing, yet complex, situations. Aided by their husbands they navigate the absurd positions they find themselves in. This behind the scenes look at the action, provides us with honest discussion and personal opinions from the actors and crew that make up the movie. An intriguing look at the societal expectations of women living Iran.

Name: Empty Paper Bag - Kaghaz Khali - کاغذ خالی
Story Line: Sam suffers from a mental disorder which prevents him from recognising faces but still enables him to recognise voices. Affected deeply by the death of his wife, his problem escalates as he begins to speak to her and hears her speaking back, and director Majid Sarvini creates some wonderful scenes of paranoia and tension as a woman comes across his delusion in the opening scenes. But as Sam's brother then tries to help him, the paranoia and delusion creates an even more deadly tension.

Name: My Silent Shadow - Saye Khamooshe Man -  سایه خاموش من
Story Line: A woman finds herself in a mortal predicament as wandering across the desert she is left stranded amidst a minefield. A rocking explosion sends a group of sheep scurrying and the corpse of a dead sheep forewarns her of her likely fate. With her strength waning, the woman spots her son Hammad among a procession looking for a missing girl. However, with even Hammad unable to immediately find the help, the woman panics, ready to collapse at any moment. It is only with the help of her family and friends that the woman may escape alive; however, this is not possible without them risking their own safety.

Name: With Open Eyes - Ba Chashmane Baz - با چشمان باز
Story Line: A worn-out looking soldier on guard duty has flashbacks to his civilian life and begins to feel addled. Angrily, he accuses another soldier of stealing a box of matches from him. Abandoning his post and weapon he chases after the other soldier in a manic state. Their superiors arrive and detain him for abandoning his post, casting him to a prison where his tormenting flashbacks continue. In a hallucinatory state lying in his prison cell, the soldier addresses his mental fragility and issues stemming from childhood. Will he be able to reconcile his familial trauma with his present state and let go of trivial issues such as the stolen box of matches?
