Name: The Enemy of God - Doshmane Khoda - دشمن خدا
Story Line: Director Mehdi Boustani demonstrates just how influential Hollywood has been among the younger generation of Iranians. This new generation of film fans discuss their love for U.S. cinema, including films such as 'Taxi Driver' and 'The Silence of the Lambs'. Expressing their great admiration for these American classics, they re-enact key scenes, taking on the roles of industry stalwarts Robert De Niro and Anthony Hopkins. 'Enemy of God' is a thought-provoking exploration of the changing attitudes to controversial cinema.

Name: Behind the Scenes: Women are Incredible - Poshte Sahneh: Zanha Shegeft Angizand - پشت صحنه زنها شگفت انگیزند
Story Line: A behind the scenes presentation of the techniques used in the production of 'Zahna Shegeft Angizand'. Interviews with both the audience and crew shed light upon their views on the law of polygamy. This documentary also provides a compelling insight into the thoughts of the director regarding the themes and issues raised.

Name: Last Station - Istgahe Akhar - ایستگاه آخر
Story Line: Many Afghans decide to immigrate in order to flee the violence of war. While some of them do not make it, many reach Europe illegally, ending up in refugee camps and unable to speak the language of the country they find themselves in. Majid Akbari is one of them, and this thought-provoking documentary tells his story.

Name: Behind the Scenes: A Very Close Encounter - Poshte Sahne Barkhord Kheili Nazdik - پشت صحنه برخورد خیلی نزدیک
Story Line: A documentary about the film 'Very Close Encounter', offering insight in the script, directing and editing process, as well as interviews with the writer, director and major actors. Combining scenes both of the film and backstage, a documentary that peels back the curtain to lay bare the complete moviemaking process.

Name: Memories for All Seasons - Khaterati Baraye Tamame Fosool - خاطراتی برای تمام فصول
Story Line: Directed by Mostafa Razagh Karimi, this documentary follows injured patients from the Iran-Iraq war that were sent to Vienna for treatment and recovery. Using war footage and images of casualties to dramatize personal accounts, the stories of wounded soldiers and medical staff reveal the aftermath of war in all its explicit horror. A special emphasis on the chemical weapons attack on Halabja, and the impossibility of describing its immense destruction to human life, gives the film a unique and powerful edge which leaves no doubt about the senselessness of war.

Name: Life - Zendegi - زندگی
Story Line: This profound film gives us a meditation on life and the passing of values between generations. A woman named Karhaal is about to give birth, but the doctor is not around to help. Meanwhile, an elderly woman knows that she is at death's door, but does not wish to disturb the birth of new life. A young boy ferries between tasks for the two women, helping with the stages of both death and life, and the duality between the two is clearly demonstrated.

Name: Without Money - Bi Pooli - بی پولی
Story Line: A haughty acclaimed newly married fashion designer named Iraj is shown the door by his boss after the boss's son arrives at Iran to take over his father's company. Iraj reluctant to promulgate the loss of his job, starts using his savings, trying to conceal the truth from his naive wife. Having squandered all the money he had on trivial matters, he tells his wife about being axed & that's when the tables turn on him.

Name: I'm scared so I Lie - Mitarsam Pas Dorough Migooyam - می‌ترسم پس دروغ می‌گویم
Actor: Mehdi Amini Khah ( مهدی امينی خواه )

Name: The Third Wave - Moje Sevom - موج سوم
Story Line: This film compares the first and third generation of the 1979 revolution and investigates their respective concerns.

Name: Superstar - سوپراستار
Story Line: Kourosh is a famous actor. As he becomes more famous, he picks up bad habits and behaviours. One day at the film location he notices a young girl - no one knows her. At first glance, he notices something familiar in her, he doesn't know what it is. He follows her with curiosity and reaches to some realities in his past, which changes his life...
Actor: Elsa Firouz Azar ( السا فیروز آذر )
Fataneh Malek Mohammadi ( فتانه ملک محمدی )

Name: Endless Dreams - Khabhaye Donbaledar - خواب‌های دنباله دار
Story Line: Reihaneh who has eight years old, causes her lost teacher to be found and this leads to some events.

Name: The Death Carnival - Karnavale Marg - کارناوال مرگ
Story Line: When a genius inventor loses his pregnant wife due to the traffic caused by a street wedding, something snaps in his mind. Infuriated by the needless waste of his family's life, he starts putting his once brilliant intellect towards punishing those he believes responsible, eventually coming to target the very customs of his own country. A psychoanalytical crime drama that takes an in-depth look at matters of environmental sociology, 'Death Carnival' simmers with moody camerawork, strong performances and distinctive academic undertones. A fascinating piece of cinema.
Actor: Sharareh Dolat Abadi ( شراره دولت آبادی )

Name: Qeysar Forty Years Later - Gheysar Chehel Sal Baad - قیصر چهل سال بعد
Soil and Fire - Khak O Atash - خاک و آتش
The Night of the Incident - Shabe Vaghea - شب واقعه
The Sweet Life - Zendegiye Shirin - زندگی شیرین
Summer Grandmother - Tabestane Aziz - تابستان عزیز
Story Line: Hamid takes his grandmother to Mashhad to talk her into convincing his father to let him be a football player.

Name: A Man a City - Yek Mard Yek Shahr - یک مرد یک شهر
Hot Chocolate - Shokolate Dagh - شکلات داغ
Story Line: A coffee shop with its constant customers is managed by a young man. A young woman enters there and changes the peaceful atmosphere of the coffee shop.
Actor: Afsaneh Chehreh Azad ( افسانه چهره آزاد )

Name: Dog Silence - Sage Sokout - سگ سکوت
Story Line: This compelling performance narrates the story of a man who returns home with his pregnant wife after 20 years, to find his sister also there. The presence of the three in the house leads to events that...

Name: The Horses Behind the Window - Asbhaye Poshte Panjereh - اسب های پشت پنجره
The Deportees 2 - Ekhrajiha 2 - ۲ اخراجی‌ها
Story Line: In this sequel the deportees are now captured by the Iraqis and are living in a camp. On the other hand their families who are going to Mashad are imprisoned when their airplane is hijacked by some terrorists who want to take it to Iraq. In the camp also they have to deal with the Iraqis who are imprisoned them
Actor: Mina Jafar Zadeh ( مینا جعفر زاده )
Hesam Navab Safavi ( سید حسام نواب‌صفوی )

Name: Sweet Passion - Shoore Shirin - شور شیرین
Fighter Rooster - Khoros Jangi - خروس جنگی
The Book of Law - Ketabe Ghanoun - کتاب قانون
Story Line: Engineer Rahman Tavana, a government employee, falls in love with a Christian girl, Juliet Khamse, while working in an international mission. She converts to Islam, changes her name to Ameneh, and moves to Iran with Rahman. Once in Iran she finds that she cannot accept what she sees as contradictions between the actions of Iranian Muslims, including her husband and his family, and the teachings of the Qu'ran.

Name: When we're All Asleep - Vaghti Hame Khabim - وقتی همه خوابیم
Actor: Hesam Navab Safavi ( سید حسام نواب‌صفوی )

Name: Wind Blows in the Meadow - Baad Dar Alafzar Mipichad - باد در علفزار می‌ پیچد
Story Line: Shooka, a spirited, hardworking girl from an Iranian mountain village is to be married in an arranged marriage. Shokrollah, her neighbor with Down syndrome, has been head over heels in love with Shooka since they were children, and so Shokrollah's father buys his son's way into a marriage deal with Shooka's father. Enter Rafie, the tailor, and his daydreaming assistant Jalil, who falls for Shooka after overhearing her pour her heart out to her family. Determined to be with the bride to be despite her impending wedding, Jalil follows her over the mountain trails and invents ingenious ways to delay the wedding.

Name: Don't Close Your Eyes - Cheshmato Naband - چشماتو نبند
Mother Tongue - Zabane Madari - زبان مادری
Angels of the House of Sun - Hayat Khalvate Khaneh Khorshid - حیاط‌ خلوت خانه خورشید
Story Line:
In the backstreets of one of the poor districts of Tehran, in a very small house, everyday hundreds of women spend a few hours in the shadows of a safe shelter. Women, whose share in life is only suffering and humiliation.
Website: karafilm.ir

Name: The Hidden Property - Servate Khofteh - ثروت خفته
Auntie Cockroach - Khale Sooske - خاله سوسکه
Story Line: Inspired by an ancient Iranian tale, it follows a familiar plot: having swapped her mini-skirt for a skin-tight manteau, she dumps the poor Mr. Mouse and becomes engaged to an industrialist.

Name: Say This is Not a Dream - Begoo Ke Roya Nist - بگو که رویا نیست
Milk and Honey - Shir O Asal - شیر و عسل
Actor: Mohsen Ghazi Moradi ( محسن قاضی مرادی )
Seyyed Mohammad Ali Vaziri (سید محمد علی وزیری)

Name: The Secret of Taran Dessert - Raze Dashte Taran - راز دشت تاران
Red Garden - Baghe Ghermez - باغ قرمز
Story Line: Once abandoned by a successful architect, free-spirited single mother Elmira now hopes to remarry and secure a happy future for herself and her young daughter. But when her daughter is suddenly kidnapped, the authorities fear it could be related to a recent mysterious murder, and the future for Elmira and her family now looks very bleak indeed in this stirring mystery drama.

Name: Mizak - می زاک
Story Line: Charming drama set in a rural area of post-war Iran. This heartwarming story follows a thoughtful young woman who serves as a leader to the community and a seemingly naive young man who is smitten with a local girl. The film observes their customs and traditions in the tranquil setting of their natural environment. Despite the irreparable damage to their lives due to the war, the villagers remain warm-hearted and kind to those they encounter. The past haunts their lives, but their hearts remain pure and strong in war torn times.

Name: Doubt - Tardid - تردید
Story Line: Siavash is a young man whose father's mysterious suicide weighs heavily on his mind. His uncle is managing his father's estate and seeks to marry his mother, something Siavash is strongly against. Siavash is also in love with his cousin Mahtab, whose father is his uncle's councilor. As the day of the union approaches, Siavash suddenly realises his life is near-identical to that of Shakespeare's Hamlet, which in turn starts to raise questions about the true nature of his father's death...
Director: Varouzh Karim Masihi ( واروژ کریم مسیحی )
Editor: Varouzh Karim Masihi ( واروژ کریم مسیحی )
Writer: Varouzh Karim Masihi ( واروژ کریم مسیحی )

Name: Heiran - حیران
Story Line: Seventeen-year old Mahi doesn't expect to fall in love, but that's exactly what happens in this romantic drama. When Mahi meets Heiran, a young Afghan worker who has come to Iran for sanctuary, the pair form an instant connection. However, the couple must hide their relationship from Mahi’s parents, who are dead set against the relationship. Her oppressive father is particularly against the match, and the couple debate whether they should run away to Tehran to start a life together. This intensely moving drama examines the limitations of prejudice, and how it can stand in the way of happiness.

Name: The Morning Breeze - Nasime Sahar - نسیم سحر
Story Line: When three nefarious individuals enter a house to acquire a map to buried treasure, they find more than they bargained for in the form of a woman, Mina. Instead of giving them the treasure map, she relates to them a story from her past. As the hunters get more involved in Mina's story, they find themselves increasingly disarmed by Mina's earnestness. That is until Mina discovers the true identity of Jalal, a man she has recently developed feelings for. Exciting chase scenes and plush visual direction cement this fun, family-friendly romp.

Name: The Mouse - Moosh - موش
Story Line: The Americans have succeeded in toppling the government of Saddam Hussein. However, for Iraq's new invaders, removing the regime proves to only be the tip of the iceberg. Having done away with the Baathist regime in Baghdad, the Americans embark on a process of rebuilding Iraq's state institutions. Citizen Khaled becomes embroiled in political upheaval after witnessing a car bombing, and soon finds himself in such a state prison. There, he encounters the spirited Rahman, a member of the resistance movement. Khaled, having been manipulated by the media and his government, must decide whether standing up for humanity and freedom is worth the risk to himself and his family. An utterly gripping portrayal of Iraq's upheaval.
Actor: Shahram Haghighat Doost ( شهرام حقیقت دوست )

Name: There Is Nothing Behind the Door - Poshte Dar Khabari Nist - پشت در خبری نیست
Story Line: The lives of several different women intertwine in Shabnam Orfinejad's directorial debut. On one side is Leila, who, after receiving the order for custody of her daughter, makes her way to her husband's apartment. When there is no response at his door, she begins to fear something is amiss. Meanwhile, a young thief pressures his sister into helping him rob her elderly employer, but her unwillingness to co-operate may jeopardise the whole plan. Told in a series of flashbacks, contradictory events run in parallel as each character tells their own version of events: stories of crime, punishment, broken homes and vicarious redemption.
Actor: Shahram Haghighat Doost ( شهرام حقیقت دوست )

Name: Seven Minutes to Fall - Haft Daghighe ta Paeez - هفت دقیقه تا پاییز
Story Line: Domestic drama charting the course of a self-effacing Iranian couple as their ordered lives begin to fracture under the strain of work commitments, money troubles and the responsibility of family. Mitra and Nima are struggling to make ends meet, their relationship in desperate need of rekindling. But when Mitra's sister Maryam shows up on their doorstep, on the run from her estranged husband, their lives are tipped over the edge by the ensuing scandal. As Mitra and Nima reflect on their own lives and take sides against one another, events will come to a head as the weight of disloyalty begins to unravel a once perfect relationship.

Name: Twenty - Bist - بیست
Story Line: 'The Hall,' a space used for funerals and weddings, is due to close in twenty days, to the dismay of its workers. Due to dismal figures, unsympathetic boss Soleimani sends the workers home, depriving them of a chance to make a living. The team band together to try to convince Soleimani to keep the business going. A sobering look at the reality of what it means to lose a job.

Name: Extremists - Efratiha - افراطی ها
Story Line: A group of hapless criminals are in prison, desperate to get out. They join forces and eventually make it out of prison together. However, life on the outside isn’t as ideal as they had hoped. Raucous comedy starring Reza Shafiee-Jam.

Name: Two Sisters - Do Khahar - دو خواهر
Story Line: 'Two Sisters' follows the story of a young hustler who will stop at nothing to get what he wants. When he meets two beautiful sisters, Mina and Mahtab, he begins contacting both of them – in two disguises. As he masquerades as 'Amir' and 'Afshin,' things become increasingly complicated. Mohammad Reza Golzar’s dual performance takes centre stage in this comedic drama.
Actor: Mohammad Reza Golzar ( محمد رضا گلزار‎ )

Name: Nightmare with a Mask of a Dream - Kaboos Ba Neghabe Roya - کابوس با نقاب رویا
Story Line: When good friends Behrooz and Farshid chance upon the lovely young Nazanin in distress, they offer her assistance. But a difficult love triangle ensues as both become equally infatuated with her. While Nazanin takes to Behrooz, he initially pushes her away due to the stress of his father's recent arrest and the possibility of his family losing their home. When his feelings for her eventually become too great to ignore, Farshid's jealousy leads him to begin playing dirty for her affections. Will Behrooz be forced to give up the woman he loves or will Farshid's conscience get the better of him in time to save their friendship?

Name: Granaz - گراناز
Story Line: Much to the despair of his mother and his teachers, young Milad is perpetually late for school. Just as the formidable Mr Khan warns him to curb his behaviour once and for all, Milad encounters Granaz, an elderly lady unable to communicate in anything other than her local tongue. Milad vows to help her find her son, at the cost of getting to school on time. This enchanting light drama shows just how far a little kindness can take people, even when it comes at a sacrifice.

Name: A Very Close Encounter - Barkhorde Kheili Nazdik - برخورد خیلی نزدیک
Story Line: A car accident reveals Nahid and Nargess's dangerous games in this engaging drama. Through Nahid's diary, the story travels back and forth in time to justify events. Nahid, who has lost her trust in men, tries to convince Nargess that her husband Masoud is unfaithful. They end up placing a bet, and Nahid goes far to prove herself right by fabricating subsequent incidents. Events come to a head when Masoud discovers the truth. Filled with intrigue, this genre-blended mystery explores the unpredictability of life.

Name: A Lovely Stranger - Gharibeh Doost Dashtani - غریبه دوست داشتنی
Story Line: A struggling actor and his neighbor befriend a senile old man and hilarity ensues. The old man is convinced that his family are planning to conspire against him and recruits the two into an absurd partnership to help him. Through a series of ludicrous incidents the three unlikely heroes become close. This vibrant comedy with a classic slapstick feel brings laughs as well as heart. The bond that ensues will stay with them forever.

Name: Punishment - Keifar - کیفر
Story Line: Siamak (Mostafa Zamani) tries desperately to raise blood money to save his brother from death row. Siamak is robbed in the process, setting him on a path of discovery. As he tries to find the thieves who took the money, his brother's sinister secrets begin to reveal themselves, plunging him into a new world of danger and deceit. Still determined to dig deeper, his brother's crimes are the least of his worries when hidden agendas threaten to destroy the life he had hoped for.
Actor: Mina Jafar Zadeh ( مینا جعفر زاده )

Name: Eve's Shoulder Wound - Zakhme Shaneye Havva - زخم شانه حوا
Story Line: A film that tells the epic stories of women in and around the Iran-Iraq War: mothers, daughters and the mythological guardians of fire. As the country descends into all-out conflict, it is left to the Zohreh to pick up the fractured pieces of their communities. But in giving their warmth and soul to Iran, they find themselves opening fresh wounds, both of the spirit and the body, in this scintillating wartime drama.

Name: Doomsday Machine - Mashine Rooze Ghiamat - ماشین روز قیامت
Story Line: Soudabeh Moradian's documentary centers around the aftermath of war. Set in a psychiatric hospital in Iran, shortly after the end of the 8-year Iraq war, Moradian takes a look at the people who have 'survived'. Original footage is accompanied by painful monologues from the veterans who have forgotten nothing, providing the viewer with a rude awakening. 'Doomsday Machine' is a direct and honest portrayal of the lingering damage of its participants and the costs that recovering societies inevitably pay. In war there are no winners.

Name: A Man Who Ate His Cherries - Mardi Ke Gilas hayash Ra Khord - مردی که گیلاسهایش را خورد
Story Line: After enduring the difficulties of a long marriage, Reza and Zari are on the brink of separation. A factory worker, Reza is unable to come up with the money to return Zari's dowry, so instead formulates a plan. Remembering a colleague who was awarded compensation after losing his finger in an industrial accident, Reza finds himself presented with an enticing, though by no means painless, opportunity for financial gain. But this course of action might cost him more than just his finger.

Name: The Reward - Jaizeh - جایزه
Story Line: All that young Reza wants is a new bicycle. There is one in particular that he has his eye on, but its price is far too steep. Meanwhile, his father demands that Reza boost his grades, and vows to reward him for his efforts. Now, whenever Reza gets an A, his father presents him with 2,000 tomans. Will Reza make enough to get the bike he so covets? This thoughtful, innocent tale of childhood perseverance reflects on what money means to different people, as well as our motives for trying hard.

Name: The Silent Eastern - Sharghie Khamoosh - شرقی خاموش
Story Line: Classic singer Khatereh Parvaneh recounts her vivid memories in this short-length documentary directed by Farideh Kakavand. A delightful reminiscence with one of the most outstanding classic female singers the artistic society of Iran has ever witnessed.

Name: Whistling Under Water - Sot Zadan Zire Ab - سوت زدن زیر آب
Story Line:
'Whistling Under Water' is reflective, sometimes surreal, and occasionally optimistic look at misfortune. As a man and woman discuss the extreme woes of their own and other people's lives, they attempt to find some glimmer of sense within the chaos of life. Themes of love, despair and death are explored through short, thought-provoking narrative threads; some wonderful visual images make this poetical and philosophical glance at suffering a real intellectual treat.

Synopsis by IMVBox.cm

Name: Happiness Without Narcotics - Khoshhali Bedoone Arambakhsh - خوشحالی بدون آرام بخش
Story Line: In this amusing short film, a young aspiring artist tries to find love, success and happiness. Faced with indifference to his work, he enters a strange and comically bureaucratic art program – and immediately becomes Maestro 47-75, the greatest living artist in the world. But will his success bring him the happiness he wants, and is there something more sinister about his sudden success that he isn’t expecting?

Name: Exile Paranoia
Story Line: This short film compellingly expresses the feelings of loneliness, vulnerability and paranoia that can be felt by immigrants living in a strange city. Beautifully shot, and filled with metaphorical images, it follows the life of a young woman as she confronts her own isolation. Building towards a poignant and ambivalent climax, the vignette weaves together some of the different obstacles faced by people in a foreign land with haunting shots of the woman's living spaces, creating a profound visual effect that echoes her emotional state.

Name: Tea and Coffee Society - Anjoman Chai Va Ghahve - انجمن چای و قهوه
Story Line: Rose-Marie Kivijarvi's documentary explores the role of tea and coffee in the lives of Iranian people. Interviewing shop owners and enthusiasts, her film reflects on the pervasive presence of the two drinks in everyday life, and reveals the origin of traditions which revolve around them. Enjoyable for anyone who loves tea and coffee, it’s also filled with fascinating historical facts that will catch the attention of anyone interested in culture.

Name: Espandar - اسپندار
Story Line: This contemplative panorama of Iran's arid desert lands showcases the harsh beauty of the desolate landscapes. Nonetheless, a traditional, centuries-old way of life continues to flourish there. In the midst of ruins of ancient cities, the men harvest dates, play music and herd sheep, while the village women weave, knit and tend to their young. 'Espandar' offers a unique window into the soul of an isolated desert community.

Name: Persian Catwalk - کت واک ایرانی
Story Line: 'Persian Catwalk' explores the relatively unexplored fashion industry in Iran. The filmmaker discusses the history of Iranian fashion, including the trends that occurred over the years, as well as the resistance from the religious government. As a counterpoint, the film also follows Mahdis, a 20 year old Iranian woman with aspirations of becoming a model, a vocation mainly frowned upon in Iran. As we watch Mahdis's progress, we find ourselves rooting for her through her trials and tribulations. A deeply human film that questions where the line should be placed between tradition and contemporary living.

Name: We Shall Believe - Iman Biyavarim - ایمان بیاوریم
Story Line: Sorrow, war, stupidity, ignorance, time, difference... These are the main factors that condition man on Earth, and which poets try to transcend through the power of the written word. A world of freedom! This documentary explores the era of Iranian female poets and their revolution created through their powerful voices.

Name: Every Night Loneliness - Har Shab Tanhaie - هر شب تنهایی
Story Line: Attiyeh has made a career out of giving relationship advice to couples over her radio show. Every day she answers questions about family dynamics and safeguarding marriages, while behind the scenes she and her husband struggle with a problem of their very own, one that seems practically unsolvable. All her life she has been the one to give advice, and as she tries to come to terms with a costly and dangerous medical procedure, she finds she is now the one who desperately needs it...

Name: Quarantine - Gharantineh - قرنطینه
Story Line: A young guy Soheil is having a reluctant life. He depends on his rich father but one day he has a car accident which leads him to meet with a girl Somayeh. This changes the course of his life for ever.

Name: The Night - Shab - شب
Story Line: A police sergeant and the prisoner he's bringing to justice are stranded in the holy city of Mashhad during a snowstorm.

Name: A Light in the Fog - Cheraghi Dar Meh - چراغی در مه
Story Line: In this sumptuously visualised and wonderfully poetic movie, a woman Rana takes care of her aging father while waiting for her husband to return from the frontline. To pass the time she helps her father make charcoal and mend lanterns, a metaphorical search for a source of illumination in her life. On the day that Rahmat, a passing cyclist, gives Rana his bicycle light to mend, she starts to sense an end to the days of uncertainty and gloom, a silver lining waiting just around the corner. The film's elegant compositions and quietly powerful performances slowly envelop us in the widow's simple, poignant world. This exquisite debut recalls such masterpiece as Sohrab Sahless' 'Still Life'. An austere and mesmerising triumph.
Director: Panah Bar Khoda Rezaei (پناه بر خدا رضایی)
Editor: Panah Bar Khoda Rezaei (پناه بر خدا رضایی)
Writer: Panah Bar Khoda Rezaei (پناه بر خدا رضایی)

Name: Fox Hunting - Shekare Roobah - شکار روباه
Landing in Roam - Forood dar Ghorbat - فرود در غربت
Story Line: Foroud has left his work and saves Fereshteh from committing suicide but he is fired. At midnight, he sees a six-year old kid behind his door holding a letter. When he reads the letter, he finds out that the kid is his own son belonging to his abortive marriage in Germany. He once had a German wife who is now severely ill and has rendered the kid to Foroud. Foroud who is searching for a job and taking care of his kid, finds out that the kid has a heart disease and he should pay a significant amount of money for the treatment. He fails to provide the costs but he decides to save his child anyway so he has to use a gun to reach his goals.

Name: Empty Chair - Sandalie Khali - صندلی خالی
No Star - Bi Setareh - بی‌ستاره
Almagol - آلماگل
Imitator of Satan - Moghallede Sheitan - مقلد شیطان
Story Line: Jamshid Seif who is fired from NAJA (Police Forces of Islamic Republic of Iran), now is standing against the law. Using his experiences of the time he was an officer, he does some careful criminal activities without leaving any evidence. With cautiousness and delicacy, he takes photos of his victims before he goes to perform his plots. His last victim is a business manager of a large company who is also being pursued by a young detective because of his illegal activities. Jamshid finds out that his new victim is also targeted by a police officer so he puts the young police officer, too, in his list of victims. Unlike the previous operations, he faces some wise reactions which delay his plot.

Name: A Time to Hesitate - Zamani Baraye Derang - زمانی برای درنگ
10 Digits - 10 Raghami - ده رقمی
Story Line: In this comedy drama we follow the antics of thief Firooz, or '13', as he is known by others, due to his incessant bad luck. When Firooz happens upon an abandoned house and steals an antique carpet, his fortune once again crumbles - the carpet's origins are not as straightforward as he first believed. An encounter with beautiful carpet enthusiast Nazi complicates things further. A unique blend of comedy, mystery, romance and drama, this film offers something for everyone.
Actor: Reza Fieze Norouzi ( رضا فیض نوروزی )

Name: Don't Put Your Foot On the Ground - Pato Zamin Nazar - پاتو زمین نذار
The Morning of the Seventh Day - Sobhe Rooze Haftom - صبح روز هفتم
Actor: Shahram Haghighat Doost ( شهرام حقیقت دوست )

Name: A Blessing in Disguise - Tofighe Ejbari - توفیق اجباری
Story Line: Tofigh-e Ejbari is a day-in-the-life of a superstar, Reza, and all the pluses and minuses that such degree of fame brings with it in terms of dealing with friends, family, fans and general public.
Actor: Mohammad Reza Golzar ( محمد رضا گلزار‎ )

Name: In Love with Leily - Majnoone Leyli - مجنون لیلی
Story Line: It is a story of five different episodes about a valentine day present which rounds from hand to hand.
Actor: Mohammad Reza Golzar ( محمد رضا گلزار‎ )
Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: Invitation - Davat - دعوت
Story Line: A film about how attitudes dissimilar families against abortion.

Name: Face to Face - Chehreh Be Chehreh - چهره به چهره
The Robbery - Serghat - سرقت
Khatereh - خاطره
Four Claws - Charchangooli - چارچنگولی
Actor: Mina Jafar Zadeh ( مینا جعفر زاده )

Name: Lover - Deldadeh - دلداده
Story Line: A rich girl returns to Iran after years to get married and several men try to marry her for her wealth.

Name: Tehrani Boy - Pesare Tehrooni - پسر تهرونی
Story Line: Soroush Tehrani recently came back from America and his dad is pressuring him to get married. But due to his 5 failed relationships, he doesn’t want to marry. His dad threatens him to get married and in the process he meets a girl.

Name: Awakening - Bidari - بیداری
Canaan - کنعان
Story Line: Mina has decided to leave her older husband Morteza after ten years of marriage. Next Monday will be her divorce date, which means her first step towards her goal; immigration. However, the arrival of her older sister, Azar, together with the illness of her mother in law is causing her trouble. To her surprise, meanwhile, she finds out she is pregnant.

Name: Checkmate - Kish O Mat - کیش و مات
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: A Night in Tehran - Shabi Dar Tehran - شبی در تهران
Crook - Tigh Zan - تیغ زن
Story Line: Twenty years after their relationship ends, Atta and Nazanin reconnect. Atta, now a taxi driver, is completely besotted with cars, while Nazanin is now obsessed with dogs. However, this only scratches the surface of their vast differences. As they become embroiled in a complicated series of car chases and twists, it is uncertain whether the two will put aside their misgivings about one another. A comedic drama with plenty of thrills, this film offers something for all audiences.

Name: The Wall - Divar - دیوار
Story Line: For the young and fearless Setareh, there are no walls or boundaries she cannot overcome. Determined to provide for her family, Setareh takes a job as a bike rider in a theme park, following the tracks of her late father. When she becomes the first female to ride around 'The Wall', a wooden cylinder-shaped structure, the authorities intervene to prevent her from taking her rightful place on the wall of fame. With the successful show on the verge of being cancelled, Setareh struggles for her voice to be heard. An adventurous philosophical debate into gender equality.

Name: The Song Of Sparrows - Avaze Gonjeshk Ha - آواز گنجشک‌ ها
Story Line: When an ostrich-rancher focuses on replacing his daughter's hearing aid, which breaks right before crucial exams, everything changes for a struggling rural family in Iran. Karim motorbikes into a world alien to him - incredibly hectic Tehran, where sudden opportunities for independence, thrill and challenge him. But his honor and honesty, plus traditional authority over his inventive clan, are tested, as he stumbles among vast cultural and economic gaps between his village nestled in the desert, and a throbbing international metropolis.

Name: There's Always a Woman in Between - Hamisheh Paye Yek Zan Dar Mian Ast - همیشه پای یک زن در میان است
Bitter Sugar - Ghande Talkh - قند تلخ
Story Line: Ambitious teen Parsa wants nothing more than to prove his skills at a karate training camp with his team. However, a severe diabetes diagnosis makes this far from straightforward. As Parsa comes to terms with his condition and daily insulin injections become routine, he realizes his dream may not become a reality. Parsa’s worrying father disapproves of his determination to go to camp, but Parsa’s mother understands how important his goal is to him. She is determined to help him, no matter what risks are involved. A story of a mother’s sacrifice, 'Bitter Sugar' is a moving drama about how far parents will go to ensure their children’s happiness.

Name: White Sneakers - Katooni Sefid - کتونی سفید
Story Line: Kind-hearted school teacher Amiri has just started at the prestigious Saadat Academy, and he sets out to train the school's football team. All is well until he is taken prisoner by a rival team. He has to escape in order to be with the children, but has an accident that deletes his memory along the way. The task at hand is to regain his memory in order to lead his team to victory. A touching look at a teacher's dedication to his students.

Name: Among the Clouds - Dar Miane Abrha - در میان ابرها
Story Line: Malek is a young luggage carrier who works at the Iran-Iraq border. One day, due to strange circumstances he meets Nora, a beautiful but mysterious woman from Iraq. As Malek's affection develops for Nora, he discovers that the girl is involved in some illegal activities, which includes smuggling people across the border. In order to gain her trust, Malek starts to help her, putting himself in serious danger, and embarking on a journey that will bring him straight to the doorstep of adulthood. 'Among the Clouds' is a touching film about first love and the naivety that comes with it.

Name: As Simple As That - Be Hamin Sadegi - به همین سادگی
Story Line: 'As Simple as That' is the touching portrait of an under-appreciated and unfulfilled woman's loneliness. Tahereh goes about her day, quietly attending to the demands of family and neighbors while her own low spirits go unnoticed. As her sense of isolation becomes more profound, even the brief glimpses of happiness she catches through her children seem to mark her search for meaning in her own life. The film captures Tahereh’s emotional state with an understated finesse. Celebrated at multiple film festivals across the world, this is a film of great poignancy and beauty.

Name: The Songbird - Torgheh - طرقه
Story Line: A documentary following four women from northern Khorasan, as they tell the story of theirs lives through their relationship with music, and their tar, a small guitar-like stringed instrument. One of them, who was put in jail to protect her drug-addict husband, only returned to find that he's remarried, the woman describes what her music meant to her at different points in her life and what playing her tar means to her now. Even though they suffer many social prejudice and segregation on a daily basis the film depicts how music soothes them and they manage to release their pain through music.

Name: My City, Pizza - Shahre Man, Pitza - شهر من پیتزا
Story Line: While a wide range of delicious and well-known traditional foods are available in Tehran, pizza has become one of the most popular things to eat. This light-hearted, amusing and fast-paced documentary offers a kaleidoscopic view of Iranian society by examining eating habits in modern Teheran. Young and old people, progressive and conservative people, all come forward to tell the viewer how their identity relates to the popularity of the Italian fast-food.

Name: The Castback - Enekas - انعکاس
Story Line: Shahrooz is suspicious to his wife Nasim and leaves her after a while. Nasim informs him in a letter of the sudden meeting with her former suitor named Sina. In the meantime, Shahrooz is meeting with a very beautiful girl named Fereshteh in Isfahan and assumes that everything is balanced. But this time, it's Nasim who can't forgive him.

Name: Elixir and Dust - Kimia va Khak - کیمیا و خاک
Story Line: It's 1979. Iran is on the verge of revolution. As the last flight to leave the country prepares to board, the chaotic destinies of six disparate individuals become inexorably intertwined. Among them are a wounded revolutionary and his wife, a young clergyman, a dangerous courier, a man searching for his lost love, and the son of a political prisoner hoping to start a new life abroad. Against the turbulent backdrop of political upheaval, director Abbas Rafei paints a picture of life in transition, of hope and desperation, unlikely meetings, and the willingness to leave everything behind in pursuit of a greater goal.

Name: Across the River - Aan Souye Roodkhane - آنسوی رودخانه
Story Line: A soldier fighting in the Iran-Iraq War awakens after an intense period of fighting. Finding himself the only one left alive in the aftermath, he must attempt to make contact with the rest of the army, but an enemy sniper watches his every move from across the battlefield. Scavenging the ammunition he needs, the survivor is able to capture his opposite number, but with no food or water, the men have no choice but to trek across the desert together, encountering along the way a mysterious cameraman with no memory of where he came from. As the journey takes them to some extraordinary places, the former enemies begin to realise they have more in common than they first thought, and through the eyes of the amnesiac cameraman, we are presented with a touching, humanistic view of war and conflict.
Director: Abbas Ahmadi Motlagh ( عباس احمدی‌ مطلق )
Writer: Abbas Ahmadi Motlagh ( عباس احمدی‌ مطلق )

Name: Heart Broken - Delshekasteh - دل شکسته
Story Line: the story of two young college students from different social classes and families who have to be in the same group and accept each other.

Name: Tambourine - Dayere Zangi - دایره زنگی
Story Line: Parisa Bakhtavar's light-hearted drama is a film full of colorful characters, and largely consists of pacy, dynamic vignettes. Linked together by the illegal satellite dishes installed on the roof of an apartment block, the vignettes wittily glimpse into the very different lives of people living in or visiting the block on a single day. Centering on the luckless Mammad's efforts to fix and install satellites amidst the chaotic behavior of residents, and the mysterious Shirin's dealings with Mammad and the residents of the building, Tambourine is a thoroughly enjoyable romp.
Actor: Mohsen Ghazi Moradi ( محسن قاضی مرادی )
Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: The Featherless Peacock - Tavoushaye Bipar - طاووس های بی پر
Story Line: The story of a woman named Tavoos who has a special job but after the death of her husband, her life face to challenges.

Name: Loose Rope - Risman Baz - ریسمان باز
Story Line: Two young men from an Iranian village are given a seemingly simple task: to bring a large, wounded cow across the country and deliver it to Tehran within twenty-four hours. As the men travel cross country and enter the big city, cow in tow, they are faced with sights they have never before seen, drawing crowds of smiling girls, officious traffic wardens and bemused spectators in this unconventional road movie. Director Mehrshad Karkhani paints a gentle picture of the divide between rural and urban life in this wonderfully human tale of two wandering souls approaching their journey's end.

Name: Mikael - میکاییل
Story Line: In this quizzical drama, Mournes eagerly awaits the return of her soldier son, Mikael. Together with Mikael's deaf fiancee Naghmeh, Mournes happily tidies up her rural house and makes preparation for his arrival. Shortly after, a soldier is seen in the village knocking on her door, and Mournes joyfully spreads the news that her son has returned. However, things take a turn for the mysterious when it transpires that no one has actually seen Mikael in person. Has he really come back? Or do we see a mother who is unable to let her son go?

Name: Hello Mother-in-Law - Madar zan Salam - مادر زن سلام
Story Line: A father whose daughter is in an unsuccessful marriage decides to take different measures when it comes to the marriage of his other daughters. He sets out some conditions for potential suitors, with hilarious consequences. Charming family comedy.
Actor: Mohsen Ghazi Moradi ( محسن قاضی مرادی )

Name: Lady of the Roses - Banooye Gole Sorkh - بانوی گل سرخ
Story Line: 'The Lady of the Roses' tells us the story of a dream come true - the dream of creating a vast rose garden in the dry and hot climate of Kerman, to replace poppies with roses and opium with rosewater. Thereby, Homayoun Sanatizadeh and his wife, Shahindokht, provided employment for 1500 families in a deprived area. Mojtaba Mirtahmasb takes us to see the stunning rose fields and the process of extracting the essence of roses.

Name: Hello to Love - Salam Bar Eshgh - سلام بر عشق
Story Line: After an unexpected visit from his estranged uncle, restaurant singer Nardar is suddenly arrested and framed for robbery and manslaughter charges he hasn't committed.  After his release, Nardar's life goes from bad to worse when he is fired from his job and risks losing his home unless he finds money. How far will Nardar go to protect his happy life? This drama contains plenty of suspense and compelling performances from Amin Hayaei and Niki Karimi.

Name: Mr Seven Colors - Aghaye Haft Rang - آقای هفت رنگ
Story Line: An attempted robbery becomes terribly botched when would-be thief Hooshang happens upon more scandal and intrigue than he bargained for. When he hides the money in Akbar Khamran's pocket, it becomes evident that Hooshang has bitten off more than he can chew in this comedy drama.

Name: Bleeding Heart - Delkhoon - دل خون
Story Line: Bleeding Heart is an absorbing death row drama revolving around the moral dilemmas of redemption and the unforgiving trauma of loss. When public defender Delaram is charged with taking on the case of Emad, it immediately puts a strain on her marriage. With Emad awaiting execution for murdering his wife, Delaram's husband cannot accept her role in his defence, and their differences about the case ultimately cut right to the heart of gender roles in modern Iranian marriages. As the case progresses, Delaram’s growing sympathy for the repentant Emad and her complex involvement with his family draw her headlong into a much more complex problem of life and death.

Name: A Span of Heaven - Yek Vajab Az Aseman - یک وجب از آسمان
Story Line: Mohsen lives a life of poverty, and sells flowers to passing motorists to support his family. His father, meanwhile, makes a living selling second-hand clothes. After a particularly gruelling day when his father's stock is confiscated, Mohsen prays to God for a better life. However, he gets all he wishes for and more when his prayers are answered in the form of an angel. The benevolent apparition tells his that he will grant him one wish, and after a lot of deliberation, the boy asks for a “span of heaven” to call his own.
Actor: Mohsen Ghazi Moradi ( محسن قاضی مرادی )

Name: Felicity Land - Saadat Abad - سعادت آباد
Story Line: A gripping drama giving an insight into the real lives of three well-off Iranian couples who get together for a birthday party. As idyllic as their lives appear, each couple bears their own sordid secrets. As the party progresses, cracks begin to form, accusations fly and it becomes apparent that all is not as it seems. As this enthralling story unfolds we learn more about the contrast between deceit and truth in relationships behind closed doors.

Name: Minus 18 - Manfi 18 - منفی 18
Story Line: Gripping drama following Maryam, a young woman, frustrated by the constant fighting of her parents. Deciding she has had enough, she leaves the house one night and wanders around the streets until she hears the sound of a beautiful singing voice coming from a house. Yet when she falls in love with the young man she finds there, it’s not quite the happy ending she hopes for. Maryam and her new love must confront some tense and potentially deadly obstacles before they can hope to be together.

Name: Sky is Safe - Aseman Amn Ast - آسمان امن است
Story Line: Mojgan Ilanlou's award-winning documentary is a multi-faceted portrait of a family making the most out of life and their various passions, including paragliding. They succeed in finding everyday happiness, despite the dark shadow of the Iran-Iraq War looming over their past.

Name: Taab - تاب
Story Line: Director Pooyan Shahrokhi's biographical documentary about poet Samad Behrangi, 'Taab', is as much a touching portrait of the man of letters as it is an expose of his life as a politically and socially aware writer. Samad Behrangi (1939 - 1967) was an Iranian Azerbaijani poet, author, translator and short story writer, as well as a teacher and social critic. He is famous for his children's books, particularly 'The Little Black Fish'. Influenced by predominantly leftist ideologies that were common among the Iranian intelligentsia of his era, his books typically portrayed the lives of the children of the urban poor and encouraged the individual to change his/ her circumstances by her own initiatives.

Name: Of Men and Motorcycles - An Mard Motor Darad - آن مرد موتور دارد
Story Line: Shahriar Siami Shal's documentary reveals the tenuous day to day life of the motorcycle taxi drivers working in Tehran. Following Abbas Karimi, 'Of Men and Motorcycle' provides insight into a job fraught with danger, and which provides an unstable income. Delving into Abbas's personal story as he looks for more stable work, the human element of the film is emphasised through touching glimpses into a man who only wants to provide a better life for his young children.

Name: The Lake that Was - Daryache-ee Ke Bood
Story Line: Oroomieh Lake, with a circumference of more than 400 kilometers, is located in the Northwest of Iran. Its beauty is so captivating that it used to attract droves of Iranian and foreign tourists. Now a shadow of its former self due to lack of rainfall, several wells and underground water resources, along with a number of dam constructions are causing concern. Oroomieh Lake will soon dry up. Director Pejman Mazaheripoo skillfully narrates the lake's history, when people carelessly enjoyed it at their leisure, ignoring the consequences of its demise.

Name: Behind the Wheel of Life - Poshte Farmane Zendegi - پشت فرمان زندگی
Story Line: 'Behind the Wheel of Life' is a short film about Nasri, a divorced mother who drives a taxi to support herself and her son. Revealing her frustrations and loves in equal measure, Sahar Salahshoor's documentary follows Nasri through a day in her life, exploring the importance of religious faith, friendship and, of course, her beloved car in sustaining her independence. The result is a poignant story, told through Nasri’s own accounts and footage of her daily dramas, of the ups and downs of a single mother making her way in the world.

Name: Between Two Dreams - Mabein Do Roya - مابین دو رویا
Story Line: This film provides an insight into the bleak life of a young woman, who is pregnant with an unwanted child. Living alone in an apartment building, she seeks guidance from a neighbour to help her come to a solution about the baby that mustn't be born. The darkness and bleak nature of the film represents the mindset of the protagonist, and it is only when she finally finds solace that the film transports the viewer to serenity. The film is an interesting and controversial tale.

Name: My Little Country - Vatane Koochake Man - وطن کوچک من
Story Line: Abbas Mohammadi's documentary tells the story of self-funded schools set up for Afghani children who are forced to seek refuge in Iran. Paid for by parents and taught by women educated at Iran universities, the schools operate on a shoe-string budget, but the film explores how they offer a vital sense of hope and belonging to its pupils. Touching footage of lessons combine with interviews of children to bring a vivid insight into their plights, and the inspirational role the schools play in their lives.

Name: Night Bus - Otobuse Shab - اتوبوس شب
Story Line: 'Night Bus' gives us a vivid depiction of gritty warfare by following a group of Iranian soldiers who fight on the frontlines in southern Iran. After detaining a group of Iraqi POW's, they attempt to transport them to the prison camps. However, the prisoners manage to trick the Iranian soldiers. An interesting film that explores the relationships between Iraqi and Iranian soldiers in the midst of war. 'Night Bus' taps into the wider political issues of the day.

Name: Pay Back - Tasvie Hesab - تسويه حساب
Story Line: Ziba and three of her prison cohorts, recently released from a Tehran prison, settle in an out of town doctor's house posing as house sitters and embark on a get rich quick scheme. Ziba's plan for the women is a scam involves kidnapping unsuspecting male drivers them after one of the women uses her feminine guiles posing as a pedestrian. The women then kidnap and extort money from the men at gunpoint. Meanwhile, Sara battles drug addiction, while another's sister's abusive husband fights with her and threatens the whole scheme. The women seek a kind of moral justice but will they persevere in a man's world?
Actor: Elsa Firouz Azar ( السا فیروز آذر )

Name: Solitude - Tanhaee - تنهایی
Director: Hojjat Ghasemzadeh Asl (حجت قاسم زاده اصل)
Writer: Hojjat Ghasemzadeh Asl (حجت قاسم زاده اصل)

Name: The Deportees - Ekhrajiha -  اخراجی‌ها‎‎
Story Line: The movie is the story of a gang of men who decide to participate in Iran-Iraq war, also known as First Gulf War, which lasted from September 1980 to August 1988. The main character, Suzuki, who is there to satisfy his beloved's father that he is worthy of marrying his daughter, goes through some moving experiences in the war and his character changes to a level that he even tries to sacrifice himself to save the others in the war. The movie ends by his martyrdom.
Actor: Mina Jafar Zadeh ( مینا جعفر زاده )

Name: A Hat for Baran - Kolahi Baraye Baran - کلاهی برای باران
Story Line: Baran hires Ebi In order to grab Pirooz's attention and encourage him to marry her.

Name: Four Fingered - Chahar Angoshti - چهار‌انگشتی
Bodyguard - Mohafez - محافظ
Director: Mohammad Javad Kaseh Saz (محمدجواد کاسه ساز)
Writer: Mohammad Javad Kaseh Saz (محمدجواد کاسه ساز)

Name: Houra's Night - Shabe Houra - شب حورا
Mahya - محیا
Familiar Territory - Khake Ashna - خاک آشنا
Empty Hands - DastHaye Khali - دست‌‌های خالی
Actor: Alireza Kamali Nejad ( عليرضا كمالی نژاد )

Name: The Last Knot - Gereh Akhar -  گره آخر
Story Line: The feature debut of Lafafiyan Hassan, 'Last Knot' stars Pejman Bazhegi as Reza, a young designer recently returned to Iran with a rug design set to take the European market by a storm. But when an accomplished engineer is murdered, with Reza's business partner the only suspect, best laid plans are thrown into jeopardy. Reza's design plans go missing, and as the police investigation continues, one family's hidden past will come to light. A tense crime thriller with many twists and turns, 'Last Knot' is a film that will keep you guessing right until the credits roll.

Name: The Gentleman Suitor - Khastegare Mohtaram - خواستگار محترم
The Trial - Mohakemeh - محاکمه
The Other Wife - Zane Dovom - زن دوم
Story Line: A recently married couple face the intrinsic dynamics of a couple's relationship during personal turmoil. Themes of love, exploration and the symbolism of marriage flow throughout. The bleak, isolated winter setting which was once a getaway for the couple now begins to mirror the very cracks and frosty coldness present in their own lives. The Second Wife portrays the highs and lows of the reality of marriage, but will love prevail for this couple or is their romance destined to be tortured forever?

Name: Housemate - Hamkhaneh - همخانه
Story Line: Mahsa is a young university student struggling to juggle her studies with a part-time job. But when she's suddenly evicted from her home, things get worse, and her chances of finding an affordable place to live seem impossible. Until, that is, her work-friend Hanieh comes up with an intriguing opportunity. Hanieh’s relative, Ms. Fakhri, needs someone to look after her house while she travels, but would not permit a single woman to live there alone. Desperate, Masha decides to fake a marriage, and a chance encounter with Jamshid provides the opportunity for a fake husband to assist her. As the pair attempt to make the con seem real, farce and misunderstandings ensue in this romantic-comedy.

Name: The Lost Share - Sahme Gomshodeh - سهم گمشده
Story Line: Zeinab's eldest son Tarlan has yet to have children after six years of marriage; so when his wife Senam gets pregnant, Zeinab and everyone else is overjoyed. When the baby is born with a rare medical condition, things take a difficult turn for the family. Secrets about Senam's past are about to be unearthed that could change everything. Zeinab's simple life becomes complicated. She must find a new way to live. An emotional drama about one family's search for a peaceful existence.

Name: The Santoor Player - Santouri - سنتوری
Story Line: Ali is a well-renowned santoor player and music teacher whose concerts are the talk of the community. He also secretly nurtures a heroin addiction, and supports his habit by playing at weddings and parties after he was disowned by his wealthy and reputable family. The film charts his decline into despondency as his addiction grows increasingly worse and takes a sizable toll on both his career and personal life. The movie even ventures into gritty shantytowns and the haunts of homeless drug addicts. 'Santoori' is an emotional and intensely watchable drama about one man's downward spiral and the agonising steps he must take towards redemption. Starring internationally acclaimed actress Golshifteh Farahani, Dariush Mehrjui's incisive drug addiction movie is also a must-see for Bahram Radan's brilliant performance which won him the Best Actor Award at the 2007 Fajr International Film Festival.

Name: Wintery Sleep - Khabe Zemestani - خواب زمستانی
Story Line: Three sisters find themselves trying to cope in the wake of their parents' death. One of the sisters, a young factory worker, finds herself faced with the prospect of marriage when a colleague shows his interest. Her older sister is crippled but largely responsible for the household and her younger sister is vibrant and feisty. Their vastly contrasting personalities make for interesting dynamics in the home that they share. The bond of sisterhood is at the heart of this charming drama.

Name: Petition for God - Esteshhadi Baraye Khoda - استشهادی برای خدا
Story Line: This film tells the story of a man who is suffering from an incurable disease. After a 20-year absence he returns to his native village, hoping to find his wife whom he needs to ask for forgiveness. Biography by IMVBox.com

Name: Half For Me Half For You - Nesf Male Man Nesf Male To - نصف مال من نصف مال تو
Story Line: Finding someone with whom you can share all your secrets may seem like a wonderful dream, but for Pouneh and Sepideh, that is exactly what they've found. The very best of friends, Pouneh and Sepideh share many of the same interests and fashion sense, but questions about their respective families reveal they may have more in common than they first thought: namely their father Bahram. Now the burden of choice is on him, Bahram's siblings urging him to reveal the truth of his double marriage, while his daughters encourage him to keep the secret hidden.
Director: Vahid Nikkhah Azad ( وحید نیکخواه آزاد )

Name: Do You Have Another Apple? - Baz Ham Sib Dari? - باز هم سیب داری؟
Story Line: In an unspecified dystopia, a tyrant rules with an iron fist. To maintain control over the people, he employs 'Dasdaran', dangerous, scythe-wielding warriors who obey his orders without question or qualm. But at last the day has come where a hero will rise from the masses to challenge the Dasdaran and free his people from subjugation and slavery. The only problem is that this hero is completely incompetent! 'Have You Another Apple' is a bold, surrealistic comedy from director Fazli Bayram that brilliantly subverts traditional movie tropes with hilarious effect.
Music: Ali Reza Babak Ghorbani ( علی‌ رضا بابک قربانی )

Name: The Magical Generation - Nasle Jadoi - نسل جادویی
Story Line: Babak is more than just an unemployed engineer living with his parents in his 20s. He possesses a supernatural sense of hearing, so strong he can hear through solid walls and over great distances. But Babak is not the only one with bizarre, unexplained powers. A group of extraordinary individuals begin to emerge and find each other. Will they learn to use their powers for anything other than their own selfish means? With experimental sequences and innovative camerawork, director Iraj Karimi takes a whimsical look at a band of youths brought together through their abilities, but bound by their lack of purpose.

Name: The Earth Child -  Farzande Khaak - فرزند خاک
Story Line: After waiting a long time for her lost lover to return, Mina comes to believe he is expecting her in a foreign land. Unable to wait anymore, Mina decides to take a leap of faith and begins a journey through the mountains; though the road she takes is not an easy one, her love for him keeps her going. She is aided in her quest by Goana, a kindly old woman, who helps her to overcome the difficulties in her path, and a mutual bond soon forms between them in this bittersweet love story.
Director: Mohammad Ali Ahangar ( محمدعلی باشه آهنگر )
Writer: Mohammad Ali Ahangar ( محمدعلی باشه آهنگر )

Name: My Father's Bones - Ostokhoonaye Babam - استخوونای بابام
Story Line: In this farcical drama, a family has gathered for the first time in 52 years. The reason: to divide their deceased father's wealth between themselves. After travelling to Mashhad, they discover that the departed Haj Mahmood Ghorbani has left the majority of his fortune to his second wife, of whom there is no trace. This puts a spanner in the works for Ghorbani’s first wife, who is eager to get her hands on the money she feels she is due. The family must therefore band together to look for Ghorbani’s second wife. An enjoyable comedy with plenty of laugh out loud moments.

Name: Women Are Angels - Zanha Fereshte And - زنها فرشته اند
Story Line: In an attempt to fulfil their ambitions, three young women find themselves in the company of some wealthy playboys, complete with their luxury cars and business scuffles. While trying to break into the vast world of opportunity available in the big city, they find themselves entangled in a dangerous web of intrigue. As they face a new, dark world of mistrust and betrayal, they find themselves turning against each other.

Name: Parkway - پارک وی
Story Line: Directed by Fereydoun Jeyrani, and starring Bita Farahi and Mohamed Reza Sharifinia, 'Parkway' is an exhilarating and sensual cinematic experience set in Tehran. Part horror, part thriller, the film chronicles the energetic tribulations of young couple, Noushin and Kouhyar. On the run from the law, they travel across busy urban spaces and dart through tight twisting backstreets to evade capture.
Actor: Nima Shahrokh Shahi ( نیما شاهرخ شاهی )

Name: Kalagh Par - کلاغ پر
Story Line: When the likeable Reza finally gets a job as a newspaper photographer, there is just one problem. He got his act together too late and the woman he intended to marry, Roya, is now engaged to Masoud. Not someone who lets a little thing like that get in his way, Reza soon teams up with Sara, a former fiancé of Masoud. The two spurned lovers set out to split the new couple up, laying mischief and mayhem in their path in this charming and thoroughly enjoyable romantic comedy. Boasting a great soundtrack there is lots of fun to be had in this caper.
Actor: Mohammad Reza Golzar ( محمد رضا گلزار‎ )
Hesam Navab Safavi ( سید حسام نواب‌صفوی )

Name: Barefoot in Paradise - Pa Berahne Dar Behesht - پا برهنه در بهشت
Story Line: 'Barefoot In Paradise' tells an emotionally engaging story about a clergyman who decides to fulfil his military service in a medical institution. This institution, incidentally, specialises in taking care of patients with an incurable disease. The film consists of beautifully constructed cinematography, which reflects the spiritual theme that underpins the entire journey.
Actor: Amir Kave Ahanjan ( امیر کاوه اهنجن)

Name: Relations - Ravabet - روابط
Story Line: Ahmad, a sociopathic psychiatrist, aspires to become a successful writer, drawing his inspiration from Hemingway, Chandler, Tolstoy and even his own patients. Fuelled by the resentment he feels for his wife, Ahmad manipulates the people that surround him in an attempt to understand the human condition. Events take a dark turn when Ahmad holds a patient captive with the intention of using him as a subject for his upcoming story.

Name: Elegy - Marsieh - مرثیه
Story Line: Set against poetic images of a train trip, Iranian emigrants discuss what their fathers meant to them.

Name: Kites Know No Chastity
Story Line: This inventive and witty short film explores themes of sexual betrayal, the restrictions of marriage, and the ideal of a pleasure-seeking life of lust. As a group of young adults chat, argue and talk to the camera about their views, the conflict between being in a relationship and having individual freedom is unfolded insightfully. Full of surreal images and humor, 'Kites Know No Chastity' shines a refreshing candid light on some of the greyer areas of love and lust.

Name: Friend's Place Enemy's Place - Jaye Doost Jaye Doshman - جای دوست جای دشمن
Story Line: A vagrant man named Ahmad travels the streets with his performing monkey, Zebel, living off the pittance they can scrape together. Ahmad is an outcast from society and shares a unique bond with Zebel, who knows only the company of his human friend. However, when his master dies, Zebel must venture out into the wild by himself. The close-up shots of Zebel's face and reactions endow him with real personality, and make this story surprisingly moving and heartfelt.

Name: Night Shift - Shifte Shab - شیفت شب
Story Line: Mahmoud Kameli's short film 'Shift Shab' presents us with a small part of a female sweeper's life when she takes over her husband's job after he is no longer able to work. Kameli manages to convey a powerful message about selflessness and unconditional love to his audience with his depiction of a woman who will do anything for her husband.

Name: Party - Mehmani - مهمانی
Story Line: This understated, lackadaisical drama sees a grandmother ferried across the alleyways of a city by her young grandson to visit her daughter's grave. The opening shots show pieces of wool being tossed onto a trolley and the stirrings of a busy marketplace. Then the boy arrives to collect his silent grandmother, on a makeshift cart. Sauntering overhead shots and soft sitar music contribute to the meandering sense of 'Party', as the boy struggles over bumpy back alleys to finally reach his mother's grave.

Name: Freedom in the Fog - Azadi Dar Meh - آزادی در مه
Story Line: Filmed by Iranian director Nasser Saffarian, this intriguing short portrays the lifestyle of a Spanish woman living in Washington D.C. as she protests the American occupation of Iraq. Residing in a tent directly outside of the White House, Conception Picciotto is a constant presence amongst the tourists and visitors to this landmark. Yet this is much more than a documentary about an eccentric and determined woman. As Picciotto tries to turn the 4th of July celebrations into a protest against U.S. imperialism, the film brilliantly illustrates the gap between the ideal of freedom of speech and its reality.

Name: Behind the Scenes: Housemate - Poshte Sahneh: Hamkhaneh - پشت صحنه همخانه
Story Line: This documentary follows the crew of Mehrdad Farid's romantic comedy 'Housemate' through the journey of producing the film. Fascinating behind the scenes footage shows key scenes being made, while interviews with cast and crew shed light on the process of filmmaking as a whole. Interviews also delve into the concern raised by the film about the problem of undergraduates finding affordable accommodation in Iran.

Name: Thirsty - Teshneh - تشنه
Story Line:
An eleven minute documentary film that navigates through the lives of individuals and families, living in the outskirts of Iran. The film is a documentation of the people’s everyday activities, exploring everything from the preparation of meals, to how the locals engage with their culture and with each other. Iranian music is played throughout the short film, projecting a clear sense of national identity. Thought-provoking and evocative, the film invites the viewer into a harsh and difficult reality.

Synopsis by IMVbox.com

Name: Wedding Dinner - Shaame Aroosi - شام عروسی
Story Line: Vandad Maher and his wife Mitra have inherited a bankrupted factory while someone proposes their daughter, Gandom, who is a student. The man who has proposed is a university professor called Parsa. Parsa'a family is a wealthy and respected family but his father, Sonbolzadeh, is also bankrupted. The two families expect to solve their financial issues by the marriage of their children,
Actor: Mohammad Reza Golzar ( محمد رضا گلزار‎ )

Name: The Emperor and Us - Emperator va Ma - امپراطور و ما
Story Line: A documentary centering the works of legendary Japanese filmmaker Akira Kurosawa from the point of view of Iranian film critics and filmmakers and three of Kurosawa's colleagues. This documentary explores Kurosawa's major films, discussing his artistic and narrative approaches in detail. The film also briefly manages to show the recognition of Kurosawa's work in Iran.

Name: Shameless - Gis Borideh - گیس بریده
Story Line: Mariam is a young girl growing up in Iran. Although she is quite innocent, her conservative father keeps thinking that she has relations with other boys which leads to violence leaving no other choice for Mariam but to go to court and send her father to jail. In a patriarchal society this film is the first of its genre showing violence at home and the fact that children can actually sue their parents over such matters.

Name: The Third Day - Rooze-Sevvom - روز سوم
Cease Fire - Atash Bas - آتش بس
Story Line: Instead of tackling difficult issues like battle of the sexes, emancipation of women, equal rights of both genders in the society and marital problems through a serious and no-nonsense manner, the Iranian director, Tahmineh Milani, chose to approach these matters through a comedy. The movie delves around Sayeh, a successful and strong-willed female engineer who was on her way to file for divorce from her chaotic marriage with the equally confident and chauvinistic husband, Yousef.
Actor: Mohammad Reza Golzar ( محمد رضا گلزار‎ )
Elsa Firouz Azar ( السا فیروز آذر )

Name: Under the Peach Tree - Zire Derakhte Holu - زیر درخت هلو
Story Line: For years members of a strange family have been predicting their time of death in their sleep taking place at 5 p.m. When an old man from the family has a dream about his time of death, he summons his son and puts a condition on his will stating that he is to marry off the old butler of the house otherwise they can not inherit his wealth.

Name: In the Name of Father - Be Name Pedar - به نام پدر
Story Line: This film is about a father and his daughter, who has been injured from the mines from Iran-Iraq war.

Name: Havana File - Parvandehye Havana - پرونده‌ هاوانا
25th Hour - Saate 25 - ساعت ۲۵
Actor: Afsaneh Chehreh Azad ( افسانه چهره آزاد )

Name: Unfaithful - Bivafa - بی وفا
Story Line: A young boy and girl belong to a different social class, unwittingly, take a common path to bring about new things.
Actor: Mohsen Ghazi Moradi ( محسن قاضی مرادی )

Name: The Shadows - Sayehha - سایه ها
Nothing is Going On in the City, There is - Dar Shahr Khabari Nist, Hast - در شهر خبری نیست، هست
Paranoid - Oham - اوهام
Western Doll - Aroosak Farangi - عروسک فرنگی
The Lover - Ashegh - عاشق
Taxi Driver - Ranandeh Taxi - راننده تاکسی
The Hidden Sense - Hesse Penhan - حس پنهان
Story Line: Amir works in advertising, and his wife, Simin, is a psychiatrist. They are a successful couple, and appear to be emotionally close. But in reality, they have many problems with each other, and are somehow drifted apart. One issue they’re facing is not having a child. Simin has become pregnant once, but has had a miscarriage, and doesn’t want to try for having a baby again.. But Amir insists . Later on, they get to know one of Simin’s patients, Bahram, who has the same problems with his wife, Neda. The two couples are in the same improper state, and by getting close with each other they have some interesting events coming up their paths.

Name: Twilight - Gorg O Mish - گرگ و میش
Vertigo - Sargijeh - سرگیجه
Marriage, Iranian Style - Ezdevaj Be Sabke Irani - ازدواج به سبک ایرانی
Story Line: Shirin leads a peaceful life in Iranian good middle-class, until the day her uncle Saeed asks her father to hire her in his travel agency. She finally decides to work. Her destiny changes, as she meets a young and attractive American, who goes to the agency to buy a plane ticket for Shiraz, the city of roses and poets.
Actor: Hesam Navab Safavi ( سید حسام نواب‌صفوی )

Name: Peace Among The Dead - Aramesh Dar Miane Mordegan - آرامش در میان مردگان
Story Line: Within the gardens of a cemetery in south Tehran, an elderly woman lives peacefully among the dead. But when some chance events leave her wandering around lost in unknown parts of the city, a sad adventure into the unfamiliar world of the living begins. Looking for the house of her friend, where she knows she will be safe and welcome, she must confront a chaotic place she no longer understands. And she may lose everything she has.

Name: Kobra's Decision - Tasmime kobra - تصمیم کبری
Story Line: Sirus Hasan Poor's beautifully shot family drama tells the story of a young girl, Kobra, who is forced to leave her mother and her favourite horse in order to help with her mother’s money problems. Reluctantly sent away so that she can be taught to weave by an old lady in a distant village, Kobra soon starts to enjoy the company of her lovely teacher. But when she’s accused of ruining the carpets she weaves, she’s sent back home to her mother. Waiting to return, she dreams of being reunited with her horse. But her attachment to her teacher has become strong … and Kobra is left with a difficult decision to make.
Editor: Varouzh Karim Masihi ( واروژ کریم مسیحی )

Name: Eternal Kids - Bachehaye Abadi -  بچه های ابدی
Story Line: Preparing for her marriage to Saeed, Negar finds out that her soon to be husband has a moral obligation to his mentally handicapped brother. She must decide whether to accept the circumstances and share her life with a third person or move away.

Name: Left Handed - Chap-Dast - چپ دست
Actor: Mehdi Amini Khah ( مهدی امينی خواه )

Name: M for Mother - Mim Mesle Madar - میم مثل مادر
Story Line: A harrowing story of the long-term consequences of the Iran-Iraq war. A couple expecting a child are forced to make an impossible decision after being exposed to chemical weapons. They discover their unborn baby has inadvertently become a victim of war after being diagnosed with birth defects. As their relationship becomes more and more fraught, we see their journey in dealing with their tragic situation and the harsh reality that the devastation goes beyond the war.
Actor: Sharareh Dolat Abadi ( شراره دولت آبادی )

Name: Crossroads - Taghato - تقاطع
Story Line: As the days of several different people unfold, their separate lives are about to become linked by a tragic car crash which kills two women. Affected by their involvement in the accident in different ways, neither Amir or Mr Naseri will ever be the same again. How will the tragedy affect their relationships with those around them in this absorbing drama?
Actor: Mohsen Ghazi Moradi ( محسن قاضی مرادی )
Afarin Obeisi ( آفرین عبیسی - صغري عبيسی )
Elsa Firouz Azar ( السا فیروز آذر )
Sharareh Dolat Abadi ( شراره دولت آبادی )

Name: A Good Time For Tragedy - Vaghte Khoobe Masaeb - وقت خوب مصائب
Story Line: Tribute documentary by Nasser Saffarian about influential poet and screenwriter Ahmadreza Ahmadi, the leading figure in Iran's New Wave Poetry movement. As Ahmadi provides insights into his life, the importance of knowing himself and his abilities, and the vital connection between sorrow and poetry, accolades pour in from the cultural community to emphasis the significance of his work. Artists, directors, critics and musicians alike line up to honour Ahmadi’s achievements, providing a sense of its power and discussing the influence it had upon them.

Name: The Tender Moment of Sand - Vaghte Latife Shen - وقت لطیف شن
Story Line: A mysterious stranger is writing emails to the beautiful but troubled Alma every day. An old gravedigger shares similar experiences. Their fates are interwoven, and as the parallels between the characters intensify, truths about them rise to the surface. Farid Mirkhani presents us with a well-thought out film with a non-linear structure, the use of different narrators and a variety of sophisticated camera angles.

Name: Foreign Souvenir - Soghate Farang - سوغات فرنگ
Story Line: Romantic comedy with a unique plot line. When happy newlywed Julia comes to live in Iran with her husband, Farhad, she is in for a big shock. Farhad's first wife and child are waiting at the airport for him! Unable to speak Farsi, the distraught Julia flees in a taxi driven by Ferry, who takes a liking to her and gives her a place to live. Yet with romantic competition from his friend Manooch, Farhad searching for Julia, and Julie hiding a secret of her own, things have only just begun to become complicated.
Actor: Hesam Navab Safavi ( سید حسام نواب‌صفوی )

Name: The Red Card - Karte Ghermez - کارت قرمز
Story Line: 'The Red Card' focuses on one of the most complicated and controversial criminal cases in Iran's judiciary history. It follows the trail of 34-year-old woman Shahla Jahed, who in 2002 was arrested for the brutal murder of Laleh Saharkhizan, the wife of famous Iranian footballer Naser Mohammadkhani. In the film, director Mahnaz Afzalli powerfully conveys the circumstances surrounding the trial, including public responses to the murder, and the long-time love affair between Jahed and Mohammadkhani which led to the murder. Scenes from the court sessions, and honest moments of confession that bring taboos out into the open add to the drama of this fascinating documentary.

Name: One Night - Yek Shab - یک شب
Story Line: When Negar arrives home after a long day at work, she discovers that her mother is expecting a visitor that evening. She is forced to spend the night away from home and begins to wander the city. Three men with three different stories teach Negar new lessons about family, relationships, people and life. Niki Karimi's film will take you on a journey into the dark nights of Tehran through the eyes of a young girl.

Name: Mainline - Khoon Baazi - خون بازی
Story Line: Picking up from her highly successful 'Under the Skin of the City', the mother of Iranian cinema Rakshan Bani-Etemad returns to her artistic city Tehran to document the plight of its drug dependent population. Narrating the spiralling relationship between a mother and her addict daughter, we are presented with all faces of poverty and desperation, as the drugs put an emotional and financial strain on the family. Adopting hand-held camera work, Bani-Etemad continues her realist visual style in this gritty study of urban life.

Name: The Guest - Mehman - مهمان
Story Line: Amir wants nothing more than to escape: generally from his father, by leaving the country, and more immediately from a car full of angry men that is chasing him. However, Amir's plans are ruined when he causes a car accident while trying to avoid the pursuing car. The victim, an elderly man, is left in a coma. Amir finds his own life put on hold as he deals with the aftermath of the crash. When Amir meets the victim's son Hassan, a furious outlaw who suffers from a heart disease, Amir must reassess his values on life and fleeing responsibility.
Actor: Hesam Navab Safavi ( سید حسام نواب‌صفوی )

Name: Distraught - Shoorideh - شوریده
Story Line:
When the tenacious Doctor Mahyar encounters the young woman Zarir after a failed suicide attempt, he grows determined to drag the girl back from the brink. Zarir, however, is dangerously unhinged, and as she becomes steadily fixated on her doctor, Mahyar is forced to pull out all the stops to treat her, despite his family's fear and distrust. However, soon he finds himself at the centre of a whirlwind of chaos, one which could threaten his existence as he knows it.

Synopis by IMVBox.com

Name: The Affair - Havoo - هوو
Story Line: Landowner Ata stays at his uncle's in the countryside while on business. There, he meets childhood friend Maryam. The two form an instant bond. However, thanks to family meddling, the news soon reaches Sepideh, his wife. Before long rumors fly about Ata's infidelity. As the family bicker about how to handle the situation, Ata’s concern is for his young son. Gentle comedy peppers this bittersweet drama.

Name: The Day Looms - Rooz Bar Miayad - روز می آید
Story Line: Gripping drama focusing on the struggle of one couple, Forough and Jalal, to come to terms with their lives after the 1979 revolution. Hoping to escape the trauma of the past five years, which Forough spent as a political prisoner and Jalal spent in hiding from the security forces, they retreat to a quiet spot in the mountains to collect their thoughts and ponder the next move. Their past however catches up with them when they encounter an unassuming local who Forough suspects to be the man who routinely tortured her during her captivity. A dark examination of moral justification and the tempting prospect of vengeance.

Name: Good Night Commander - Shab Bekheir Farmandeh - شب بخیر فرمانده
Story Line: After an unsuccessful marriage, young Maryam thinks of committing suicide in a way which would at least be of some use to others. She thus enters the Iran-Iraq war as a reporter. She is surrounded by suffering and pain and her time spent in the devastated desert landscape, armies spilling over from one side to the other depending on which has the upper hand, totally changes her vision of the world. 'Good Night Commander' describes the terror of war as seen through the eyes of a fragile woman who manages to overcome her thoughts of suicide on the battle field and eventually chooses life over death.
